summary: Enter the Neon Chrome Arena and challenge your friends and the world. How high can you score in this arena based survival mode with online leaderboards?

name: Neverwinter Nights: Dark Dreams of Furiae
summary: Dark Dreams of Furiae is a fantasy RPG module for Neverwinter Nights: Enhanced Edition. The characters and events of this module coincide with the official Dungeons & Dragons tabletop campaign, Baldur’s Gate: Descent into Avernus.

name: Ne no Kami: The Two Princess Knights of Kyoto - Extra Story
summary: Ne no Kami - The Two Princess Knights of Kyoto Extra Story features two extra after story chapters.

name: Nerdland
summary: Two best friends (Paul Rudd & Patton Oswalt) make a last ditch effort to become famous, stumbling into a series of misadventures that threaten their lives and dignity.

name: Neon Light
summary: You have to play as a little boy who found himself on an unknown and forgotten planet, now you need to do everything to leave it.

name: Necromancer: Winter
summary: Revive dead enemies and build your army! Necromancer's Adventure Game. You can play 4 Chapters.

name: Nekopara: Catboys Paradise
summary: When your grandfather passes away and you inherit his café, it's a tall task for anyone. But with the help of four talented catboys, Cafe Kin'uan is ready for business in Nekopara: Catboys Paradise!

name: Nero
summary: Discover this novel stealth-action shooter in the largest and most advanced game built in Sri Lanka. Experience tactical third-person combat, gameplay choice and epic longshots across well-crafted levels to maximize the immersive experience of a soldier who is deep within the enemy territories.

name: Neon Ride
summary: Neon Ride is a retro-inspired 3D platformer all about going fast while avoiding obstacles on roads set in retro-futuristic worlds. Inspired by old-school runners like Skyroads, enjoy an original synthwave soundtrack, breathtaking backgrounds, and endless replayability through the Steam Workshop!

name: Neocense
summary: You explore the world of Cha as Amori, who has the ability to switch to the Realm of Living and the Realm of Passing. Switch between the realms to complete puzzles, perform spirit rituals and fight The Hunters in unique puzzle combat.

name: Need For Conquest
summary: Need for Conquest is a turn-based strategy game with a very simple objective - to capture all enemy territories on a map and achieve global domination. If you like RISK style games but you want to enjoy the freedom of procedurally generated maps and level editor, this game is for you.

name: Nerthus: Einar's Fate
summary: In this frenetic third person shooter you will play as a Guardian in his mission to return the heart of Nerthus to its sacred place, in order to restore the balance of the world and make the corruption vanish. Enjoy the adventure in local coop mode as well.

name: Neon Dimension
summary: Welcome to an old-school arcade game with a modern design, in which you will enjoy exciting visual effects and excellent physics. And the relaxing gameplay is so easy to learn that you'll understand the whole idea after a few tries!

name: Nebuli
summary: Nebuli is a space themed VR FPS. Traverse wormholes on a mission to destroy enemy ships and get high scores.

name: Neon Struct: Carrion Carrier
summary: Do jobs to earn money to recharge to do jobs. An FPS speedrunning game developed for the A Game By Its Cover 2020 game jam.

name: Nex:Os Colosseum
summary: NEX:OS is a community driven Ability/Movement focused Looter-Shooter style FPS game set in a war torn future. You play as a Centurion, a Biologically and Cybernetically enhanced near-immortal super soldier.

name: Near Deadline
summary: You've been playing Nintendo DS for too long and you realize there's only 5 days left to meet your animation deadline; use the paddles to bounce the Z's away long enough to stay awake and finish!

name: Neon Shooter
summary: Neon Shooter is a fast-paced dual stick style shooter that is full of neon colors, bright particle effects, and enemies to destroy. Be ready to jump in and destroy enemies, collect coins and power ups, and upgrade your traits to reach the highest score possible!

name: Nebs
summary:
Nebs is an arcade game for the Atari 8-bit computer.

The player controls a small arrow, which can move in the four cardinal directions, and must shoot at and eliminate alien nebs. These enemies move unfailingly towards the player, and speed up as more of their brethren are eliminated. The player can set the number of lives they start with from 1 - 5, and can set which wave they initiate on. When all 20 nebs are eliminated, the player progresses to a more difficult challenge.

name: New Boggle Boggle
summary:
A clone of Taito's game Bubble Bobble. Created by Korean team MbitM (Later known as Namu Software) and published by Zemina to leverage the immense popularity of Bubble Bobble at the time.

The Game is not as fully featured as Taito's original. With different levels, physics, missing the EXTEND functionality and the classic melody has been slowed down to a crawl.

name: Negligee: Spring Clean
summary: The girls of the Lingerie shop are back and they are in for their toughest day of the year, a mega sale event! How will the girls handle things, you get to decide not only how the sale goes but who you will control in this adult yuri/lesbian themed multi-routed visual novel game.

name: New York Nights: Success in the City
summary: New York Nights: Success in the City is an action-adventure life simulation video game developed by Gameloft Montreal and published by Gameloft.

name: Nemezis: Mysterious Journey III - Deluxe Edition
New Homestead
summary: New Homestead is an online turn-based, strategy game. To build up a functional economy, you have to develop your cities and conquer your enemies on a procedurally generated map!

name: Neolithic: To the End
summary: A modern-day open-world RPG about a secret world. With the help of your companions, some demons, some cats, and any supernatural entities you can bend to your will, all the different ways to solve problems, you may still fail to save the world. Life is simply unfair. But, will you stop trying?

name: Neon Nights
summary: Get a glimpse of Metropolis 12's seedy back-alley nightlife in the sci-fi cyberpunk visual novel, NEON NIGHTS!

name: Nemithia: Tale of the Legendary Saviors
summary: Embark on a heroic journey in Nemithia, where three destined heroes must save their planet from the corrupt Drakians led by Amolon Morrowstar. Battle through perilous realms, unlock ancient powers, and rally allies in this epic indie adventure. Will you rise against darkness and save Nemithia?

name: Nemesis: Race Against the Pandemic
summary: Are you ready to save the world from a deadly pandemic? Nemesis: Race Against The Pandemic is an action-packed third-person shooter game where you shoot down the bad guys and save the world from a deadly outbreak.

name: Negligee: Opposites Attract
summary: Charlotte, has been dumped by her long term girlfriend Mikka. Fortunately her sexy friend Sophie insists on taking her out to try and cheer her up. But Sophie is quite a wildcat so who knows where such a date could lead in this yuri/lesbian themed visual novel with multiple routes and endings.

name: Necrojacks
summary: Summon undead to keep the graveyard calm and your business afloat

name: Neo-Zero
summary: The role-playing game set in a 1990s computer simulation.

name: Neon Knight
summary: Old-school FPS in a neon package with lasers and robots! Fast paced action, bunny hopping and rocket jumping.

name: Netaboku: A robot girl changes my life as a bedridden boy
summary: This game is a sci-fi romantic adventure(visual novel) modeled after the avatar robot cafe. Japan, circa 2040. Kanto lives in a residential facility for the severely physically disabled. One day, they meet a mysterious girl, Kanata, and their destiny changes dramatically...

name: Neko Chan
summary: Neko Chan is the exclusive desktop elf of the STEAM platform, placing her on your desktop to accompany you through every day of your life and work.

name: Neon Snake
summary: Neon Snake is a well-known classic game in a new unusual style.

name: Newton's Life at Home: Pixel Art Jigsaw Puzzle
summary: Newton's Life at Home is a jigsaw puzzle game made with animated pixel art GIFs instead of images. This game shows the life of the cat Newton in your home. Can you assemble the animated GIFs to find out what he likes to do in your daily life?

name: Necromunda: Underhive Wars - Van Saar Gang
summary: Gang up with the Van Saar in Necromunda: Underhive Wars! This DLC gives access to the Van Saar, their unique look and skills, for solo and multiplayer fights. Control the Underhive with advanced tech!

name: Necromunda: Underhive Wars - Cawdor Gang
summary: Gang up with the Cawdor in Necromunda: Underhive Wars! This DLC gives access to the Cawdor gang’s host of fanatical and ruthless zealots, their unique look and skills, for solo and multiplayer fights.

name: Necrobarista: Final Pour
summary: Inspired equally by film and anime, Necrobarista is a unique take on the visual novel medium. Follow a dynamic and diverse cast of characters as they navigate Melbourne's hipstery coffee culture, the questionable ethics of necromancy, and the process of letting go.

name: Neon Beat Rider
summary: Ride the beats with Neon Beat Rider, a neon-fueled rhythm game with a multi-path story and procedurally generated tracks!

name: Need for Drive: Open World Multiplayer Racing
summary: Your rivals will do everything they can to stop you from getting to the top – but in this world, there can only be one WINNER. Fight your way past cops and rivals using skill, high-end car tech, and tons of nitrous.

name: Nerf Legends
summary:
NERF Legends thrusts you into a futuristic, sci-fi world where you'll come face-to-face with legions of robot enemies and ultimate boss masters. Armed with a wide array of NERF blasters based on their iconic, real-world counterparts, you'll thwart formidable enemies while being challenged to pull off the most impressive high-flying trick shots across a series of unique and immersive environments. Are your NERF skills up to the challenge to become the ultimate NERF Legend?

Extreme Games Meet NERF set in out-of-this world locations such as Fortress Siege, Jungle Trouble, ragnarok, and Spaceport Blastoff.

15 Authentic NERF Blasters across the Mega, Ultra and Elite lines. Plus upgradable perks and skins to customize your blaster.

19 Single player levels with tournament courses.

4 vs 4, 8 player free for all with online multiplayer modes.

Collect dart powerups such as magnetic push and pull, seeker darts and freeze to change the tide of battles.

name: Need for sharp
summary: You need to beat all enemies at all of game maps. You can raise money, buy upgrades and abilities for yourself. How fast do you walk so fast time.

name: New Magic Sword
summary: "New Magic Sword" is a massively multiplayer online game (MMORPG). The game provides players with a lot of different quality equipment, and the pursuit of high-level (or best) equipment is one of the most important goals for players in the game.

name: Newton's House of Forces
summary: Play with a Tesla Coil, experiment with Newton’s laws of motion using giant circus balls, force fields, and traction beams, and take a virtual field trip to Purdue University to discuss the science behind American football helmets, the forces involved with the sport, and actions being taken to better protect athletes using the laws of phy

name: Neebota: Zeebo's Awakening
summary: An open world party-based RPG set in an original fantasy world called Neebota, where Zeebo and his friends hunt for portals from our earth, and in doing so, uncover secret powers, ancient lore of their world and a vast conspiracy across space and time.

name: Necromunda: Underhive Wars - Gold Edition
summary: The Necromunda: Underhive Wars Gold Edition includes the base game, the Van Saar DLC, and the Cawdor DLC. Lead, customize, grow your gangs and face your rivals in tactical gunfights for supremacy in the deep tunnels of the dystopian Underhive!

name: Nevergrind Online
summary: Nevergrind Online is a real-time cooperative multiplayer online RPG where you and a group of adventurers join forces to protect the Kingdom of Edenburg from the sinister forces of darkness. Up to six players can form a party and venture forth to help restore peace and order to the Kingdom.

name: Neptunia x Senran Kagura: Ninja Wars - Day One Edition
summary: The limited day one edition includes an exclusive IFI Online Store trading card.

name: Never Return
summary: Never Return is a 3D free-to-view randomised dungeon action game with light Roguelike elements. With a rich weapon and talent system, the game's real-time combat feels solid and varied, allowing players to build according to their own fighting style and gaming habits. every battle is a dizzying experience, and the challenge of random maps and enemies keeps going further and further.

name: New Super Chick Sisters
summary: PETA's boycott of McDonald's chicken nuggets and other items on the menu. A Flash game sequel to "Super Chick Sisters" once again featuring the two feathered siblings as they save Pamela Anderson from Ronald McDonald.

name: Need More Troops
summary: Inspired by traditional turn-based fantasy strategies and modern auto battlers, we created the fast-paced rogue-lite game about growing a huge army against ever-increasing hordes of enemies. You should act wisely, though: the formation and battle plan are just as important as the army's size!

name: New Meaning
summary: In New Meaning you play as Luke Wilson, or do you? Luke is a struggling teenager trying to shed some light upon a dark lonely world, will you help him or will you aid his departure into depression? This game is not suitable for children or those who are easily disturbed.

name: Neon Nights Pinball
summary: Neon Nights Pinball is an exciting eight flipper table featuring two upper play fields supporting seven primary missions, two skill shots and multi ball. This cyber punk styled machine blasts a nine minute custom soundtrack that will keep the action rolling. Now with Steam leaderboard support!!

name: Network E.L.E.: PC Edition
summary: Network E.L.E. is an open-world, survival story set on Planet Mercury in 2184, an abandoned city — military base filled with deadly radiation. Find four Mercury-980 single board Space-VPX chips, which activate a dormant spaceship left within the city.

name: Neo Atlas
summary: Neo ATLAS is a reimagining of Artdink's home computer Atlas series, with 32-bit era upgrades to graphics and gameplay. Neo ATLAS is a reimagining of Artdink's home computer Atlas series, with 32-bit era upgrades to graphics and gameplay.

name: Neo Atlas 2
summary:
A second, expanded PlayStation iteration of Artdink's Atlas series. You are once again in charge of a trading company headquartered in Lisbon, and tasked by the king with exploring the rest of the world and bringing home the spoils.

In addition to the exploration, trading and map creation of the prior game, it adds an "episode" system which is effectively a quest log, as well as changes and updates to the story and quests. Additionally, it improves on the trading system, adding the "trading post" function, which allows the player to choose which product to make in some cities, which allows for more streamlined trading.

Just like the prior games, the shape of the world is determined by the player's belief or disbelief in the reports brought in by their admirals, and ultimately influences what is found on the map, and the routes that are available.

name: Neko Yume
summary: Neko Yume is an ambient exploration game heavily inspired by games like LSD Dream Emulator and Yume Nikki. Explore a cat-filled dream with a day/night cycle and dozens of randomized events. Even if you have explored an area once, there is no guarantee that it will be the same upon your return.

name: Neondrops
summary: Turn your mice and keyboards into independent midi controllers or synthesizers. Use virtual ports to send MIDI to your DAW or plug in your own MIDI keyboard. Sampling functionality included.

name: Neutron and the Tri-Spark
summary: Neutron is an action maze runner where you will guide our hero on an adventure to collect the energy orbs of the Tri-Spark while avoiding capture by the security bots.

name: NeverDeath
summary: NeverDeath is a fighting game set in our own solar system centuries in the future. Explore the intricacies of the unique left/right fighting system while battling across the solar system as nine distinct characters.

name: New Yankee 9: The Evil Spellbook
summary: Travel back to the days of King Arthur to defeat an evil spell book with plans to claim Camelot as its own! As you race to remove towering obstacles, gather abundant resources and restore razed villages, each step will bring you closer to victory!

name: Nekojishi Expansion Pack: A Sunny Day
summary: Through arrangements made by Yan Shu-Chi, Tiger and Leopard are given a single day to be incarnated and walk the earth as humans. However, Liao still has hang-ups over Shu-Chi’s ability to pull all of this off with his family. Perhaps there is more that has been left unsaid…

summary: Welcome to Neon GraVel! In this jump 'n' run/puzzle game you use gravity-affecting blocks to build a path for yourself, to then traverse that path with precise jumps.

name: New Dawn
summary: Exploration, survival and construction in an infinite procedurally generated universe.

name: Neon Depth
summary: In this puzzle-platform game, you must make mistakes in order to progress. Place blocks when you fail, and shape the level in your favor. Discover how to use blocks with different effects to escape from within yourself while learning to live with your mistakes.

name: Neko Candy Shop
summary: Relaxing puzzle game with adorable neko girls.

name: Neon City Riders: Super-Powered Edition
summary:
Players can look forward to an easier default difficulty, with an extra challenge relegated to “Old-School” mode. Navigation has also been enhanced while updating the UI. There are some other changes as well.

Here’s the full rundown:
- New Difficulty
By default, Neon City Riders’ enemies, hazards, puzzles, checkpoint locations and map designs were re-balanced to be more accessible.

And, if you are a fan of challenges, like we do, the new option “Old-School mode” is available to increase the overall difficulty of your quest.

- Enhanced Navigation
We introduce Cypher Kid, a chatty little robot who will gladly (and optionally) sell you maps for the different turfs to help you navigate its sections.

Also, your mentor, Evergray, will help you at the begging of each zone by pointing you at the right direction.

- Optional Flashy UI
Thinking on the players with light sensitivity, we decided to add a new option that turns on/off the fast paced colors in the user’s interface across the game to make their journey as comfy as possible.

In addition to this changes, tons of small improvements were added, and, If you already started your adventure, this changes will be compatible with your current save file.

name: Neon Abyss: Deluxe Edition
summary: Do you think you have what it takes to be the boss? Then lock ‘n’ load with the Neon Abyss Digital Deluxe Edition!

name: New Slippery Samurai

He cannot even walk due to the slimy texture, but is able to kick the wall and slip with taking advantage of the lubricant! Let's cut off Ninjas' heads one after another, and escape from the Castle!

name: Neon: Eternal

But there's bigger stakes at play, its up to you to keep an eye on the resident depressed rantaholic janitor and help uncover a sinister conspiracy.

name: Neighbor Watching

name: Neighbor: Lingering Memories Side-Story
summary: Andou, a writer for occult-focused magazine publisher Misty Publishing, ends up spending the night at a shady property on order from his boss, Uchiyama. Maebara Heights, room 103. Investigating the rumors of disappearances linked to the room, Andou finds himself swalled into a dark mystery.

name: Neon
summary: Spin jump and solve puzzles.

name: Neon Abyss: Alter Ego

name: Netherworld: Beyond Time I Stand
summary:
An exciting new action and adventure game, NetherWorld Beyond Time I Stand involves complex quests, dangerous battles and occasionally baffling liaisons. Encounter numerous objects that contain special attributes and capabilities that are scattered throughout the game.

Control up to four characters and use their unique abilities to fight a wide assortment of creatures through 10 visually stunning environments. Amanda, also called the Vessel, can swap forms and use other characters’ abilities; Instinct is a power warrior and a master of close combat; Shadow can move easily through the underworld undetected; and Corruption is a long-range expert and very strong against ranged attacks.

Make your way through the underworld where lies are currency and deception is a way of life while losing yourself in this compelling, richly detailed and atmospheric gaming experience.

name: Neurocracy
summary:
Solve a murder in a near future world by diving into the Wikipedia of that world.

Have you ever lost yourself in a Wikipedia rabbit hole? Imagine doing that for the Wikipedia of the year 2049. This is Neurocracy, an interactive narrative experience that offers an anthology of compelling sci-fi stories inside and between the hyperlinked articles of an online encyclopedia. It is both a single-player alternate reality game and an epistolary hypertext novel, opening with a high-profile assassination that you must investigate and solve.

Playing out entirely on a website with no download required, Neurocracy invites you to go it alone or join forces with others to piece together what has happened, and what is happening, in the world of 2049. Using the narrative power of your imagination, chase implications and interpretations by reading between the lines and arranging a story from a deeper pool of potential stories. Find clues, draw connections, compare notes, and ultimately solve a murder.

players around the world in open-platform mode. It gives you pass&play
offline hot seat mode for 2 players as well. This easy-to-play game
includes a dedicated tutorial that teaches you how to play and manage

A game that is a new twist of tower defense games, something that will keep you hooked and intriguingly challenged! Build your fortress any way you wish, upgrade weapons and let the invasions begin! And sweep them! Don’t go over yourself & think that you can always win – strategize! This game need your brilliant idea to defeat enemies attack! Each mission has its own mind-challenging hardness, show that your enemies can never outsmart you. Use weapons, plan and destroy the invaders.

name: New Super Mario Bros. Mii
summary: New Super Mario Bros. Mii was an "experience" tech demo shown at E3 2011 for the Wii U. It is based on New Super Mario Bros. Wii and contains new levels, as well as the option for players to use their Miis. This demo was meant to demonstrate the "Off-TV Play" capability of the Wii U, allowing the player to continue playing a game on the Wii U GamePad without having to use a television screen. Players were able to play for up to ten minutes before the game would automatically reset. While the game was only exhibited to show gameplay experience using the controller of the Wii U, New Super Mario Bros. U is "based on" New Super Mario Bros. Mii.

name: Neo-Gensokyo Zero
summary: High speed bullet-time hack-n-slash in an alternate Gensokyo

name: Need For Seed: Undergrowth
summary: Go forth and pollinate

name: Neon Trap Defense
summary: EPIC tower defense without towers with a dark and colorful neon theme

name: Necessary Bimbos
summary:
Necessary Bimbos is an illustrated branching story written by Limerick and illustrated/coded by Sortimid.

The game follows about a young guy who wakes up with a headache after a fight with his girlfriend. While trying to smooth things over, he keeps inadvertently changing reality --- her background, clothes, even how the world works!

How far will he go?

You get to decide!

There are twelve different endings and over 60 illustrations covering 38,000 words!

name: Nebulous: Fleet Command
summary: Take command of your hand-tailored fleet of space warships and use realistic radar, electronic warfare, advanced movement controls in 3D space, and precision targeting to outmaneuver and outwit your opponents in a simulation-heavy tactical space game like no other.

name: Neptunia: Sisters vs. Sisters - Special Limited Edition
summary:
This edition includes the following:
- Hyperdimension Neptunia: Sisters vs. Sisters
- Limited Edition Box
- Note from Nepgear
- 52-page Visual Book
- Soundtrack CD
- Nepgear and Uni Lovey-Dovey Poster

name: Neo-Programs
summary: You are an Angel. Your mission is to find and save program WZ-07-HK. Explore the darkness of the simulation until you find it but be wary, as deadly threats may come on your way.

name: New! SMW2 Yoshi's Island
summary:
NEW! SMW2 Yoshi's Island is a more-than-full Yoshi's Island Hack.
The story basically is the same like in the original game, but it includes 60 brand-new levels, custom icons and maps and added Yoshi colors for Extra- and Secret levels.

name: Net_Defender
summary:
Prepare to enter the Net. The name for the internet in the year 2119 after it has become overcome by malicious software and hackers.

Use your ship to fight off malware and take back the net

name: Netherspace 2
summary: A shoot'em'up game for up to 4 players that combines advanced RPG advancement elements with pure space shooter action, 20 unlockable weapons & 4 heroes with varied strengths in their 10 primary stats, along with each ship's 10 aspects, add a huge variety of choices for all gamers.

name: New Eitango Target 1900 DS
summary: New Eitango Target 1900 DS is an educational English language learning game based on the Eitango Target series of books by Obunsha. These books teach a common set of English words in order to help students pass the TOEIC English language proficiency test. This game, specifically, is based on the Eitango Target 1900 book which teaches 1900 common English words.

name: Newgothic Movement 1
summary: My little repository of insane slaughter maps. Movement 1 released because I wanted to focus on Uacultra 2 with 40oz. So about the maps, this wad contains 18 gothic, industrial, or hell-themed maps, many are actually a bit of a combination of themes. Expect numbers of monsters around the largest slaughter maps you've encountered, or possibly more. But the gameplay in most will be a little easier cause I overstock powerups.

name: Nested Rooms
summary: Nested rooms is a single player, first person experience taking place in a confusing non-euclidean world. Your goal is to navigate everyday life in a realm where rooms seem to coexist in the same space without interfering with one another.

name: New Yankee 8: Journey of Odysseus - Collector’s Edition
summary: Join the world's best traveled-couple on a time-tripping adventure to return home!

name: New Yankee 9: The Evil Spellbook - Collector's Edition
summary: Travel back to the days of King Arthur to defeat an evil spell book with plans to claim Camelot as its own!

name: New
summary: New is an Off fangame, acting as a continuation of OFF's events. New is notable for answering major questions posed by Off, as well as reworking the combat system to be more challenging and tactical.

name: Nervous Granny
summary: Nervous Granny is a 2d platformer in which we control Granny, who, with the help of her cane, deals with evil robbers who are encroaching on her rest and purse, jump on platforms, collect bonuses and use them to buy various improvements for further progress.

name: Nevedomo
summary: Nevedomo is a dynamic arena first-person shooter with a Zetlex robot. Future. Two warring factions Rockets and Bullets participate in deadly competitions under the leadership of the Texer Force Corporation in order to capture the world's resources. Have a good fight!

name: Newton Going Home
summary: The kitten Newton went traveling with its owner to an island and when it was time to leave... Where's Newton? Newton went to discover new things on the island and got lost! Can you assemble the puzzles to help the kitten Newton get home?

name: Neon Struct: Desperation Column
summary: Blast your way to the top of the tower and take down the megacorp! A minimalist roguelite FPS, created for the 7dfps 2021 game jam.

name: NeonHat
summary: Soar at raging speed! Dodging and shooting your way against the dangers of the Synthwave skies, compete against others like you in the global leader boards, and leave your mark in this neon-soaked universe.

name: Nebular Crush
summary: Intense 80s style 2D shooter with a cyber psychedelic aesthetic

name: NeuraGun
summary: NeuraGun is a first-person science fiction puzzle game. The player will have to go through a maze of mysteries that will lead him out of the tangled scientific complex.

name: Necrow Co.
summary: Necrow Co. is a short platformer made for GBJam9.

name: Neonimo
summary: Neonimo is a real-time puzzle strategy game where players place tetrominoes to build a path to their opponent’s base, forming buildings, claiming technology, and cutting off their opponent along the way. Neonimo is... strategic. Neonimo packs a plethora of strategic and tactical decisions into a compact package. Use your pieces to create economic buildings, claim territory and technology, and disrupt your opponent’s plans. Neonimo’s simple interface lets players of all ages experience the challenge of a deep strategy game. Games take less than five minutes: Squeeze in a single game during a break, or pack many matches into a single session!

name: Nekograms
summary: Help cats get to sleep in this adorable puzzle game! Move the cats and cushions so that every kitty is nice and comfy. But there’s a twist! Cats only move left and right, and cushions only move up and down.

name: Nevertales: Faryon
summary: Your powers are waiting...

name: Next Door: An Eternal World
summary: Tactical Isekai RPG by various races

name: Nelson and the Magic Cauldron: The Journey
summary: "Nelson and the Magic Cauldron: The Journey" is a classic point & click adventure, with lots of puzzles and funny dialogues.

name: Neko to Sakana
summary: A top-down, omnidirectional shooting game. Play as a cat and shoot fish to make sushi and power up your ship.

name: Nebraska
summary: Nebraska takes place as a journalist writing a book about mid-west America, who runs out of gas in a rural area of Nebraska. Players will explore and uncover the secret facility that lies beneath the attraction and discover the terrible experiments that have taken place there.

name: Nebula Invasion
summary: Nebula Invasion was designed for those who enjoy the classic type arcade games, a spaceship shooter with great gameplay. Aliens attack many different ways from marching to dive bombing. You have the tools to fight back with a ship that can power-up with double, triple, rapid fire, or plasma cannon.

name: Neverspring Chronicles
summary: Hunt down fading magics to customize your combat abilities and explore a world on the edge of death and rebirth as you navigate a dynamic narrative toward multiple endings in this old school 90's style JRPG.

name: Neura Mechanicus
summary: Neura Mechanicus is a turn-based squad tactics game where you operate robot squads in tournaments, each with unique abilities, upgrades and different game mechanics. Enter a cyberpunk world full of strange homemade robots and challenging teams vying to be the best at tournaments.

name: Near Site
summary: Near Site is a survival horror game where you are severely near sighted. Over come your visual handicap, solve puzzles, gather clues, and evade predators as you adventure the wilds.

name: New Terra
summary: New Terra is a challenging and addictive multi-directional gravity-based space shooter. Fuel goes fast and is hard to come by. Hauling cargo makes your ship very heavy and mobility becomes limited. Strategy and resource conservation is key to completing your missions or you won't survive.

name: Necrotopia
summary: Necrotopia is an exploratory action game, in which a monster, who woke up on a stormy night by lightning, picks up junks as weapons and searches for who he/she is. Use various types of weapons to defeat enemies and explore the fascinating world.

name: NeoLemmix
summary: NeoLemmix is a modernised clone of the early-90s video game Lemmings. Its history begins with EricLang's "Lemmix", also a Lemmings clone, which sought to replicate the gameplay physics of the DOS version of Lemmings perfectly, while adding features like framestepping, saveable replays and Windows compatibility. Whereas Lemmix's goal was accurate reproduction, NeoLemmix - which began as a fork of Lemmix by namida - had the goal of removing all the glitches, increasing user-friendliness, and simplifying the use of fan-made content. Eventually, it also introduced many new gameplay features. These days, NeoLemmix is considered a completely distinct engine from Lemmix, which is once again being developed by namida.

name: Neon Souls
summary: Neon Souls is a Fast-paced Splatformer where you Paint Invisible Platforms with Neon Ink. Everything you do(Walk, Jump, Double Jump, Slide by the Walls) Spray Neon Ink in the Platforms, the game have a lot of Levels and Bosses to be beaten for you Soft and Small Hands.

name: NecroBouncer
summary: Rogue-like dungeon crawler where you have a chance to play as a necromancer, who works as a bouncer in a dungeon club. Choose your path, try out endless builds, and go on to defeat hardcore bosses to acquire and unleash their powers on hordes of enemies!

name: Neon Bricks
summary: Neon Bricks is a arcade style game where you can't drop the ball. To reach your goal you need to destroy all the bricks.

name: Nero's Adventure
summary: Nero's adventure is a 2D puzzle adventure physic game, where pollution has taken over the ocean, down to the darkest depths. Every creature in the sea is struggling to survive, but there is still hope. Nero, a mutant anglerfish, is able to survive with toxicity, will he be able to clean up the sea?

name: Neon Dragons
summary: Try to survive various hordes of enemies while destroying as many ships and looting as many as possible in an ever-changing universe. Combine different active and passive items to form the best equipment combinations capable of defeating powerful bosses.

name: Nello in Antwerp
summary: Nello in Antwerp is a free-to-play experience set in the world of A Dog of Flanders (in development). You will play as a young boy in 19th century Belgium, penniless but with an artistic dream of painting. You will use pencil and brush to record the landscape you see.

name: Neko Journey
summary: Jump into this attractive and mysterious world! Save your lovely sister and the mythical creatures that inhabit it, imprisoned in the fortified castle by an elderly wizard!

name: NeuroWorm
summary: A 6DoF take on the classic game concept set in cyberpunk future, where sentient programs escape the grasp of their creators.

name: Netherspace
summary: A sci-fi shoot'em'up game with heavy focus on upgrades experimentation, featuring two unlikely heroes that must work perfectly together, despite their share of secrets, to surpass their limits and succeed in eliminating a threat that might destroy both Earth and Andraxia if left unchecked.

name: New Year Girls
summary: This game is a classic puzzle game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts. Enjoy ;-)

name: New Super Mario Bros. Wii
summary:
New Super Mario Bros. Wii is an enhanced port of the Wii game under the same name) released only in China for the Nvidia Shield console. It was part of a batch of Nintendo games released for the console in a collaboration of Nintendo and Nvidia, in 1080p and with gameplay adapted to work without the need of motion controls.

All of the Nintendo games released in this deal ran on special versions of the emulator Dolphin, which made possible all of the changes applied.

name: Neon Beats: A Beat Further
summary: Neon Beats: A Beat Further is a DLC pack for Neon Beats, a 2D platformer game with rhythm based levels. Your favorite minimalist platformer returns with more content! Discover new mechanics, 5 new levels and new music!

name: NecroNightmare
summary:
You're in your house, but you've been home alone for days, you decide to enter into the mysterious basement.

You find a mysterious book, strange things will happen.

name: Nekketsu High School Dodgeball Club: Soccer Story
summary:
Nekketsu High School Dodgeball Club: Soccer Story is the original Japanese version of the game released in other regions under the title of Nintendo World Cup. The Japanese version is part of the Kunio-kun/Nekketsu High series.

The game was originally released under the title of Nekketsu Koukou Dodgeball Bu: Soccer-hen, but has since been localized as Nekketsu High School Dodgeball Club: Soccer Story.

name: Nekketsu Renegade Kunio-kun
summary:
Nekketsu Renegade Kunio-kun is the home console port of Nekketsu Kouha Kunio-kun for the Family Computer.

The game was first released as Nekketsu Kouha Kunio-kun, but has since been localized under the new title of Nekketsu Renegade Kunio-kun.

name: Nekketsu Koukou Dodgeball-bu
summary: The original Japanese arcade version of the game which would be later be recognized as Super Dodge Ball.

name: Nekketsu Koukou Dodgeball-bu: PC Soccer-hen
summary: The PC Engine port of Nekketsu High School Dodgeball Club: Soccer Story. This version is not the same version the PC Engine CD game.

name: Nekketsu Kakutou Densetsu
summary: The Japanese mobile version of Nekketsu Fighting Legend.

name: Nekketsu Koukou Soccer-bu: World Cup-hen
summary: Nekketsu Koukou Soccer-bu: World Cup-hen is a Game Boy version of Soccer Story, based on the international version of the game (Nintendo World Cup).

name: Nekketsu Koukou Dodgeball-bu: PC Bangai-hen
summary: Nekketsu Koukou Dodgeball-bu: PC Bangai-hen is the PC Engine port of the Arcade game under the same title.

name: Nekketsu Koukou Dodgeball-bu
summary: Nekketsu Koukou Dodgeball-bu is the Sharp X68000 port of the Arcade game under the same title.

name: Nekketsu Koukou Dodgeball-bu: Soccer-hen
summary: Nekketsu Koukou Dodgeball Bu: Soccer-hen is a port for the Sharp X68000 of the Famicom game with under the same title in Japanese.

name: Nekketsu Dodgeball-bu i
summary: Kunio-kun dodgeball title released in Japan for i-mode cellphones.

name: Nekketsu Koukou Online: Yamada no Fukushuu
summary: Kunio-kun online game developed by Windysoft which began closed beta testing in 2008 until October 22, 2010.

name: New Scuffed Bhop Simulation 2026: Goty Edition
summary: The long-awaited sequel to the hit game New Scuffed Bhop Simulation 2023 (POG Champ) is here! All new SinglePlayer maps with popular maps returning from the first game! Play online multiplayer cross platform with all new modes and experiences!

name: Nerraia
summary: In this platform and adventure game, you will play for 3 different stage to save the Nitia island.

name: Neko Secret Room
summary: Sneak into your photographer friend's room and find out what she’s hiding! Neko Secret Room is a naughty action puzzler where you have to solve the grid-based brain teasers of ChanOS to hack into a database of saucy photos. Select pieces of each image and swap them around to discover the correct combination and restore the completed scene. The lovely clients shown within are surely worth the effort!

name: Nefarium
summary: Hack and slash your way through the floors of Nefarium in this ARPG. Go through randomly generated dungeons as difficulty increases with each floor; defeat vengeful monsters, upgrade unique items, define your own playstyle, and reach the furthest depths to become stronger than ever.

name: Neon Racer
summary: Endless road, neon lights, palm trees. The game immerses you in the atmosphere of retrowave. Welcome to Neon Racer! Neon Racer is a car simulator game in which you drive along the endless road and avoid other cars.

name: Neighbors
summary: Know your neighbors. Find the truth. Betray them. Experience the nightmare of the Salem Witch Trials in this horror story based on true events.

name: NeverAwake
summary: A girl who never wakes up. She has been fighting monsters in her dreams... "NeverAwake" is a nightmarish twin-stick shooter with a unique worldview and original game rules.

name: New Century Galaxy Legend
summary: New century Galaxy legend is a free to play barrage game where you avoid barrages from all directions and survive as long as possible. Players who have survived for a long time can gain higher ranking, so try your best to overcome this challenge and keep breaking records!

name: Neko-Mimi Sweet Housemates Vol. 1
summary: What is one to do when face to face with a cat-eared, winged angel? Life will never be the same when the angel, Mint, moves in and becomes your new housemate. Follow Mint, a popular girl from the doujin circle "Animal Herb," as she stars in this brand new, heart-warmingly comedic game!

name: Neon Abyss: Chrono Trap
summary: The Chrono Trap DLC brings a new Endless Mode and the Titan, Chronos, to Neon Abyss.

name: New Lands
summary: Grow wheat and build mills and mines. Restore your new lands and become a successful landlord.

name: Nekoglai Simulator
summary: Help Nekoglai to become the most popular streamer! To achieve that goal you need to collect gnomes, gold and keys.

name: Nea Edem
summary: Explore a ruined city and shoot your way to the truth of the past in the first ever 3D game from the creator of the Lloyd the Monkey series.

name: Neon Sundown
summary: Neon Sundown is a unique roguelite shooter that mixes card-building with fast-paced action. Build your deck using a variety of unique playing cards, collect various resources to unlock different power modules, and take on several diverse arenas.

name: Never out of Time
summary: Survive in an ocean of bullets by dodging, shooting at your foes and manipulating time. You can take as much time as you need and even "do over": You set the tempo of the action. Will you be able to conquer the space station?

name: Neon Horizon: Eclipse
summary: Neon Horizon: Eclipse is a first-person action platformer in which you have to go on an exciting adventure across eight different islands. Each island has its own unique traps and obstacles.

name: Need for Speed: The Run
summary: Need for Speed: The Run lures players into an underground world of illicit, high-stakes racing. The heat is on - and it isn't just the fuzz who are after you. Entering the race is just the beginning as you blow across borders, weave through dense urban traffic, rocket down icy mountain passes and navigate narrow canyons at breakneck speeds.

name: Never Ending Dungeon
summary: Never Ending Dungeon is AI-powered software to adventures creation for Tabletop RPGs. Less prep, more play. A huge time saver for DMs and Players!

name: NekoBellow
summary: NekoBellow is a 2D Bullet Hell Side Scrolling Shoot 'em up game based on Arcade games of the 90's, there are even unique mechanics not seen before in any other game.

name: Next Star System
summary: Next Star System is a Sci-Fi strategic robot battle game for mobile devices.

name: Newtraction
summary:
Manipulate your orbs and the fabric of gravity in order to achieve a perfect synergy in this space-themed puzzler. Complete dozens of levels or put your skills to the test with the 4 other game modes. Unlock new prizes, including lore, new music and backgrounds, or just chill by taking photos, all while listening to numerous originally composed tracks.

Setup all of your orbs gravitational fields and then play out your scenario to bring them all together and become the master of gravity.

name: Netherguild
summary: Netherguild is a turn-based tactical roguelite dungeon-crawler, in which the player commands expeditions below the earth in a desperate attempt to cure a strange plague. Explore, camp, and fight as far as you can before heading back to resupply.

name: Neon Flash 2
summary: Get ready for some high-speed retro action! Only the best can escape the Neon Nightmare...

name: NecroFarm
summary: NecroFarm is a top-down minion defense game that's part farming and part tower defense. Grow crops and use necromancy to raise them as your unholy minions! Defend your farm from waves of monsters and grow your army size as you gain new crops and minions.

name: Neko Nyaa~
summary: Smol catgirls in 3D. Neko Nyaa~

name: NeverEverLand
summary: Explore a cursed forest, make friends, and then watch them die.

name: Neko Maid
summary: Every neko girl loves cleanliness, wants to clean and take care of a master. And every certain maid has a secret — someone loves to be photographed in the master's mirror, the other loves to escape to the beach during a coffee break ...

name: Neon Outlast
summary: This is a Challenging FPS game which you can act as a soldier, who lost in the slum and surrounded by terrorists, all you have to do is breakthrough all the enemies and escape in the limited time.

name: New Lands Paradise Island - Collector's Edition
summary: Gather seashells and tropical fruit! Develop the best resort in the near lands!

name: New Lands 2: Collector's Edition
summary:
Grow cocoa beans, apples and sugarcane. Make the best sweet treats around and win the contest!

The Collector’s Edition includes:
- 15 bonus levels!
- Earn trophies for completing challenges
- Integrated strategy guide
- Concept art and music tracks

name: Nehahra
summary: 17 maps by an all-star team of mappers, cutscenes, new monsters, great features. Comes with a custom engine. Neharha is considered by many as one of the innovative mods that shifted the Quake modding dynamics toward single-player map development. The Episodic spiritual fan sequel to Quake contained a four-hour fully voice acted machinima movie and was well over 53817 kilobytes, an incredible map pack at the time, still considered by many as the best Quake mod.

name: Neptunia: Virtual Stars - Kizuna AI
summary: Unlock renowned Vtuber Kizuna Ai as a playable character with additional story! Her additional story can be accessed in the Title Screen > "ANOTHER EPISODE".

name: Neptunia: Virtual Stars - Towa Kiseki
summary: Unlock renowned Vtuber Towa Kiseki as a playable character with additional story! Her additional story can be accessed in the Title Screen > "ANOTHER EPISODE". *Advance the story to Chapter 3, then head to the Cloud to use her character in the main scenario. *Not usable in BeatTik mode.

name: News Tower
summary: News Tower is a news and resource management game. Your goal is to build a newspaper empire in 1930s New York that is profitable, independent, and – most importantly – wins the trust of its readers.

name: News Reacts
summary: Suddenly one ordinary morning you are accused of terrorism! You are hunted by authorities, special forces, panic-stricken citizens and the news media. In a modern city you are always in the wrong place at the wrong time equipped only with your brain but with NO weaponry.

name: Necore Warriors
summary: Necore Warriors is a short turn-based strategy game, battle through ten strategic levels and discover the story behind the realm's greatest war!

name: New Horizon
summary: New Horizon is a survival with RPG game. Explore a vast world in search of resources, build, upgrade your equipment and fight monsters to survive.

name: Neophyte
summary: A mini action rogue-lite with chaotic spell-slinging hack-n-slash combat. Collect spells and perks to become an unstoppable wizard and destroy hordes of monsters.

name: Nebula
summary: A single-player starship colony simulation game with RPG elements, set in a vast galaxy waiting to be explored!

name: Neon Ronin
summary: Neon Ronin is a rogue-lite tactical RPG set in a stylish cyberpunk world. Combine unique attacks and abilities with powerful augments to conquer ever-changing encounters. Customize your party's stats and talents as they level up to craft a strategy and squad strong enough to survive the neon city.

name: New York Simulator Air Racing and The Statue of Liberty
summary: Hi, Welcome to New-York Simulator Air Racing in which you can sit at the controls of various aircraft, flying on a variety of routes. You play as a pilot ace, but do not think it will fly for you. Your task is to collect all stars without damaging the aircraft. Everything is in your hands, fly!

name: Neon Beats
summary:
Beat your best scores in Neon Beats, a 2D platformer game with rhythm based levels!
You just entered an abstract world and embody a cube moving on a white line.
A relaxing and catchy music starts to play along with colourful shining neon lights all around.

name: Nekodancer
summary: Nekodancer is a multiplayer dance game with cats!

name: Neosaurs
summary: Neosaurs is a multiplayer, online role-playing game where you enter the forgotten world of Sauria and embark on a quest to defend the world from the creatures of the Dark. Featuring multiple classes, skills, dungeons, and gear, Neosaurs is the premiere MMORPG on all social networks.

name: Nemesis
summary: Nemesis is a theoretical brown dwarf star in orbit around our own sun, which may even have its own planetary system. Play 25 different power-ups, for all kinds of ways to smite your foes in this 3D space shooter for the iPhone, iPad and Apple TV.

name: Next Stop Mobile
summary: Next Stop is a game that will send you on a trip down a railroad, which needs to be pulled up from dilapidation and defended against a bank that wants to lay hands on it to offset its debts. By making a lot of stops, you can repair and build up all damaged parts of the railroad, but you need to ensure that you have enough resources. Trade and train passage on your reviving railroad will bring you a substantial income.

name: Need for Speed: Carbon - Own the City
summary:
Dominate the streets and build your reputation in Need for Speed Carbon: Own the City for the Nintendo DS. This action-packed racing game lets you take control of the city, one neighborhood at a time, with an immersive storyline and intense street racing action.

Customize and tune a wide range of cars with an array of performance upgrades and visual modifications to suit your style. Assemble your own crew of skilled racers, each with unique abilities, to help you in your quest for supremacy. Utilize your crew members strategically during races to gain the upper hand against rivals.

Race through diverse urban environments, from sprawling cityscapes to winding mountain roads, with the DS's dual-screen setup providing intuitive controls and an engaging HUD display. The touch screen interface makes car customization and crew management seamless and fun.

Experience thrilling race modes including Circuit, Sprint, and Pursuit, where you must outrun aggressive police forces. Challenge your friends in wireless multiplayer races and prove who truly owns the city.

With its dynamic gameplay, captivating story, and endless customization options, Need for Speed Carbon: Own the City for the Nintendo DS offers a high-octane racing experience that you can take anywhere. Get ready to own the streets and carve out your legacy!

name: NeonLore
summary: Discover the future...

name: NebulArena
summary:
Ever since the Mechorgs entered our galaxy, interstellar conflicts have been resolved in the NebulArena. Billions of lives and uncounted resources have been saved by this alternative to wasteful warfare.
You can now resolve your own interstellar conflict in the Mechorg's arenas.
Battles take place in one of the 30+ arena layouts prepared by the Mechorgs or in your own custom arenas. Three battle modes are available depending on how advanced your civilisation is: Assimilation, Elimination and Strata:Gem. Each battle mode presents a different set of rules, drone units and strategies.
You can battle any of six alien species or bring your own opponent. NebulArena battles can be fought using a single shared device or between devices on the local network. Battles can be televised on your AppleTV so all can see your NebulArena prowess (or demise).
The Mechorg Arena Master, has prepared more than 50 challenges to test the skills of newcomers and veterans alike. Completing these challenges as well as other specific accomplishments will earn you achievement points so you can compare your proficiency with friends.

name: Netronian Chaos
summary: Scottish Former Sergeant of the Earth Coalition Force. After the war of between Netronian and Gaian(alien term of earthling), She finally rested and enjoyed the spare time of peace... Until she took the important message from Gundrai Zispon II, the Grand Starchief of the United Macrocosmic Party that Macrocosmos(alien term of space) is once again in danger! The evil Netronian Empire has risen and now they're about to take over the Macrocosmos. And so Eilidh grabbed her trusty Service Pistol and equipped her Tactical vest to fight back the Netronian Empire.

name: Net Knight
summary: Delete MalWare, collect cards, customize your digital hero, and explore an infinite procedural world based on the "real" net. Inspired by the Battle Network series, experience an Action-RPG offering a unique story, colorful characters, grid-based combat, and an infinite digital world to explore!

name: New Year's Eve Miracle
summary: This is a short cute visual novel about New Year's magic, friendship and miracles.

name: Nemire
summary: Nemire is turn based tactical RPG in which you are an immortal warlord controlling a squad of undead in a medieval fantasy world. You slay, crush, burn and poison filthy humans for their souls to infuse your squad with new powers and advance for total annihilation.

name: NecroArcher
summary: Run & gun action arrow shooting game with precise platforming. Game with retro style graphic and modern gameplay. You can upgrade your archer with special items and new weapons available on the map and in stores.

name: Nectar
summary: An explosive Shoot ‘Em Up like no other, Nectar focuses on five hummingbird sisters, each with their own playstyle. Defeat powerful bosses, unlock new cosmetics, compete in online leaderboards, and save your world from the invading bee army!

name: Neon Speed
summary: Neon Speed is a casual racing game.You need to ride on a high speed between another cars on the road and earn points to improve your car later.You can choose the best car that will absolutely fits you!

name: New Yankee: Battle for the Bride
summary: Embark on an adventure with a royals and help prevent a greedy knight from marrying Sir Lancaster’s daughter for money, while facing deadly enemies. You’ll need to optimize your decision-making skills as you choose whether to gather resources, construct buildings or remove obstacles.

name: Neopets: Faerie Fragments
summary: Delve into a captivating Neopian world full of intriguing characters, daring adventures, and compelling storylines! Build your own Faerieland in a casual, stress-free setting as you venture on an enchanting Neopian journey to help the lost Light Faerie find their way!

name: Nexus Code Plus
summary: Nexus Code Plus is the updated version of the BL game Nexus Code. It is a visual novel where players can make different choices during the game. The choices that players made will alter the relationship between the characters and the ending of the game.

name: Neon Defenders Premium Defense
summary:
Your nation is under attack by this new and unknown enemy. Will you be able to defend against this evil force? Don't let those invaders have their way and build defenses to keep them at bay.
In this new and fun tower defense, you can use a huge variety of turrets to protect your base. Compete against other players for the best score in the endless mode or challenge the story mode. Don't let your galactic empire down, commander.

name: NecroMerger
summary:
The Devourer is always hungry and it’s your job to feed it in this idle merge game mashup. Play as the NecroMerger and use dark magic to summon an array of creatures (skeletons, zombies, demons, banshees… the list goes on). Merge them from piddly little grunts into massive (and tasty) brutes, before feeding them to your ever hungry pet.
As you grow your Devourer you’ll attract the attention of merchants, champions and even rivals. Some can be useful, others must be fought… or fed to your insatiable pet. The bigger the Devourer grows the more your lair will expand and you’ll unlock powerful abilities and spells.

name: Neko Secret: Homecoming
summary: When you were traveling around the world, someone told you about an anime factory located in some Neko Town. Now this is your way. Perhaps the anime begins here. Is this your place?

name: Neighbor Fight
summary: Multiplayer first person strategy game with lots of destruction. Destroy the house of your neighbor by throwing furniture and build a business by selling weed!

name: Nemesis: Lockdown
summary: Fully-fledged Video Game Adaptation based on one of the most successful BOARD GAMES in recent years. Play as one of the survived crew members. Plan and make actions in turn-based SOLO or MULTIPLAYER modes. Be a team player or a traitor - Each scenario will be DIFFERENT!

name: Nectar
summary: Nectar is a yuri fantasy visual novel about a butterfly girl.

name: Nedia Hotel
summary: Experience the thrill of not being able to do anything but run from the horrors within the Nedia Hotel. A First person, PSX stylised Horror game that takes you to Nedia hotel to finish a simple task of carrying 8 plates! Though, is it really that simple?

name: Need for Speed ll: Special Edition
summary: The special edition of Need for Speed II includes one extra race track, three extra cars, three bonus cars, a new driving style called "Wild", and 3dfx Glide hardware acceleration support.

name: Neodori Forever
summary: Neodori Forever is a retro inspired, endless arcade 3D racing game inspired by the beloved old classics. A colorful cast of rivals is waiting to race against you on a variety of vibrant environments. Collect power ups and coins on the way to expand your car collection and outrun the competition.

name: Nexus: The Zoraidian Oracle
summary: Based in the world of Tyanaphos, Nexus: The Zoraidian Oracle is a strategic solitaire card game inspired by Hanafuda (a traditional Japanese flower card game similar to mahjong or rummy), steeped in original Western fantasy and Tarot-like themes. Featuring a 144-card deck comprised of minor and major arcana and additional categories unique to Tyanaphos, as well as a customizable user interface, Nexus is next-level solitaire. Gameplay can be relaxing or challenging to your critical thinking skills depending on your approach. The rules expand on familiar solitaire mechanics, rewarding more creative set-building strategies with point rewards and achievements.

name: Negaeba Kitto...
summary: Negaeba Kitto tells the story of a young man who has recently been treated for a serious illness, and who finds a certain kind of redemption in the most unlikely place.

name: Nexomon + Nexomon Extinction: Complete Collection
summary: Return once again to classic monster catching and experience the complete Nexomonstory with two epicadventures in one!

name: New Roots
summary: In this story-driven pixel game set in a post-global warming world, a young capybara seeks to regrow the extinct native plants of their home with the help of their solarpunk community.

name: Neon Invaders
summary: Neon Invaders will take you back to your gaming roots with its constant action and relentlessly brutal enemies. Absorb enemy shots of the same colour to trigger a flurry of fire to decimate the alien invaders. Dodge and Match your way to victory through 40 levels and 5 difficulty settings.

name: Ned Kelly: Armored Outlaw
summary: This game is an alternate history themed FPS. Based on Ned Kelly, an Australian outlaw in the 1880s. It all kicks off where the real gang met their end. Can you survive the initial police raid at Glenrowan?

name: Necrosmith
summary: A necromancer simulator. Assemble the dead using different body parts while upgrading your tower, combine the abilities of the different fantastic races to fight your way through the hordes of enemies and overrun the ’chosen ones’. To tell the truth, the dead are pretty, uhm, dumb.

name: Next Player Please
summary: Next Player Please is the first fun and engaging VR party game played around a table with friends and only one device that is passed around the table Taking advantage of shared spaces and the quality of social play, we offer fun and easy to learn mini-games in VR without the need for multiple devices or a fixed playspace.

name: Near-Mage
summary: You have been invited to stay in Transylvania for the summer... Only to find out that you come from a long line of witches. Meet your new vampyre and strigoi classmates, embrace your destiny, and enroll in the Transylvanian Institute for Magick! A supernatural adventure made in Transylvania.

name: Nephilim Saga
summary: Survive and discover a forgotten legend, in a post-apocalyptic first-person shooter where humanity must face an ancient enemy!

name: Neuropathic
summary: Neuropathic is a dark comedy about emotions and other scary things like that.

name: Neorude 2
summary: Neorude 2 is a Role-Playing game, developed and published by TechnoSoft,

name: Neorude: Kizamareta Monshou
summary:
The last game in the Neorude series for PSOne features a new group of characters instead of the main characters that were on the first 2 games on the series. The game starts when the plane ship (Neorude) suffers a fire accident and crashes in a snow mountain cave.

The gameplay is the same as the first 2 games in the series, a point a click adventure game with objects to use and a rpg battle system controlled for the pointer too, the player can control the speed of the combat to make the proper decisions.

name: Nevermore: Documentary Kinetic Novel
summary:
Documentary kinetic novel. From the place of a heroin dealer detention. On the backside of a drug’s pop image.

In sleeping areas of Moscow outskirts where supplications, inevitable diagnosis and inappeasable demon of addiction are present.

name: Nell Watson's Founder Life
summary: Master your personal resources to achieve startup business success in this pro bono entrepreneurial life simulator game.

name: Neighbors: Suburban Warfare
summary: NEIGHBORS: Suburban Warfare is a lighthearted, team-based PvP game about neighborhood warfare! Deploy traps and barricades to defend your own house. Use the tools from your surroundings to acquire crazy item to get the better of your Neighbors!

name: Near the Fear
summary: Roguelite racing game set in surreal world of subconscious. Lost in dark corners of your mind, set out on a journey to rekindle forgotten light and find your way home.

name: Neet
summary: Alone on Halloween? How pathetic. Learn and choose how to live your sorry life, talk to a series of surreal visitors and witness the unspeakable in this highly interactive, soulful and atmospheric life simulator.

name: NetHack
summary: This is an Android port of NetHack: a classic roguelike game

name: Necrocrisis
summary: Necrocrisis is an on-rails fight for your life through a graveyard full of gun-toting zombies.

name: New Super Realistic Mario Bros.
summary:
New Super Realistic Mario Bros is a kind of creepypasta game but not really?
It starts off normally, like a classic Super Mario Game, but suddenly, it acts weirdly...

name: Neon Breaker
summary: You break bricks. There's music. There's chaos.

name: Neko Cosmo Police
summary: This twin stick shooter is about Neko fighting with their all cost. In 2565 UC. the Cosmos has been altered by MadBotz gang. The last hope is rely on the Neko Cosmo Police team, "Kuro" and "Shiro"

name: Neo Monstrum: Origins
summary: Neo Monstrum - Origins is a fully voiced, interactive mystery visual novel that steps into the origins of our main character, Neo.

name: Neverwinter Nights: Gold Edition
summary:
This Edition contains the original award winning Neverwinter Nights, with the latest updates and patches, as well as the first expansion pack, Neverwinter Nights: Shadows of Undrentide.
The package also contains a couple of "mini-adventures", created by Bioware's employees. "The Winds of Eremor" and "The Dark Ranger's Treasure" are mods by Rob Bartel, and "The Heir is Human" was created by Dan Whiteside.

name: Nerf Jr. Foam Balster: Attack of The Kleptons
Need for Speed: Top Speed
summary: A Need for Speed game released for web browsers.

name: Neopets: Codestone Quest
summary: Neopets: Codestone Quest propels you into a classic conflict between good and evil in the fantasy world of Neopia. The alchemist Oswoc needs codestones to activate a mysterious and powerful spell, and you must travel to seven fantastic Faerie Rings to collect them. Trouble is brewing, though, as the evil Balthazar is kidnapping faeries in record numbers. Free the faeries, collect codestones, and save the day in this all-new, exciting Neopets adventure.

name: Need for Speed: Most Wanted
summary: A port of Need for Speed Most Wanted designed for mobile phones in 2005.

name: Nemesis
summary: Experience the excitement that we felt on discovering arcade wonders like Asteroids. A dose of nostalgia plus choice modern magic mixed with your VR kit, standing or room scale, modern capabilities and lovingly crafted eye popping fast game play.

name: Nerd's Guide to Surviving High School
summary:
As a self-proclaimed loner, joining a school club is the last thing you’d want to do. That is, until a teacher forces you to join one. Not just any club, but a club where you get to interact with people on a daily basis!

The real challenge doesn’t involve the after-school activities. Now that you are part of the Fixers Club, you must learn to befriend your fellow members—three girls with personalities that clash with your own. Capture their hearts in this touching high school rom-com, all while learning the truth behind your mysterious past. Can you outrun destiny and steer yourself along the path of love?

Then there’s also the blood-covered ropes…

name: Need for Speed: ProStreet
summary: Compete at the highest level of street racing with Need for Speed ProStreet. It’s no longer good enough to simply rule your local neighborhood; you need to dominate on a global stage. Build the ultimate battle machine, take it to multi-disciplinary showdowns and pit your skills and reputation against the world’s best street racers.

name: Need for Speed: ProStreet
summary: Compete at the highest level of street racing with Need for Speed ProStreet. It’s no longer good enough to simply rule your local neighborhood; you need to dominate on a global stage. Build the ultimate battle machine, take it to multi-disciplinary showdowns and pit your skills and reputation against the world’s best street racers.

name: NekoChan Hero Collection
summary: NekoChan Hero Collection - a collection of games from the NekoChan series. The franchise is inspired by old school platforms like the Mario series. The collection includes three games: Ninja World 1 and 2, and Neko Land. The gameplay of all three games is an old-school platformer. The main character is a ninja kitty named Neko.

name: Need for Speed: Hot Pursuit Challenges
summary: Need for Speed: Hot Pursuit Challenges is a NFS Hot Pursuit 2 fan continuation for NFS Most Wanted (2005).

name: Necrowave
summary: Necrowave is a game about the emotional life of a zombie stuck in a microwave. It's a 2D platformer with critical based combat where each different enemy feels like a puzzle you need to solve instead of relying on brute hack & slash tactics.

name: NetaJump
summary: NetaJump is a indie casual game where you grasp the chance to jump higher, unlock skins, or follow the hints in the skin descriptions to unlock them.

name: New Tanks
summary: New top-down shooter about tanks.

name: Neon Circle
summary: Rotate, think, wait, jump and rotate the screen.

name: Netspectre
summary: Netspectre is a hacker roguelike set in a ruthless, cyberpunk universe. Infiltrate networks, improve your machine, navigate the challenges of daily life as a netspectre in a futuristic megacity, and perhaps even become one of its many legends!

name: Nekomancer: Seeded by Darkness
summary: The Nekomancer is an Adult Adventure Zelda like game, You play as "Avery" a Femboy Catboy Nekomancer, a user of magic with Lustful properties! In this top down Pixel art style game, you choose to eliminate or seduced the enemies you encounter during your epic Quest!

name: Neon Nights 2
summary: Continue with Kate's lewd story in the continuation of the original Neon Nights, now taking part at the police station after she got arrested! Will she find a way out of this mess? Or will she have to spend the night in a cold, lonely cell?

name: Necrophobia
summary: This is a real time fantasy rpg with different ways to play! You can be a spell casting wizard or you can be a sword and shield warrior! Tons of updates to come and I am excited to see what happens!

name: Neon Fighter
summary: Neon Fighter is an extremely challenging and fast-paced arcade game where your gun switches automatically every 7 seconds or so, creating very intense situations and testing your reflexes, adaptability, and decision-making skills.

name: Need for Speed: Payback - Speedcross Story
summary:
A standalone chapter of the career in Need for Speed: Payback.

The chapter follows Mac as he enters the Fortune Valley Speedcross Series using an experimental Mini JCW Countryman build by Rav.

name: Never Mourn
summary: Become a powerful battler necromancer and challenge death with your double-edged weapon. Kill and resurrect your enemies to grow your army and do the impossible to revive your child.

name: Neon Cyber Samurai
summary: Neon Cyber Samurai is a survival game with roguelite elements set in a futuristic world dominated by aliens. Shoot and slash down hordes of foes, steal their weapons, use them to upgrade your Samurai and become an unstoppable force that not even the strongest creatures in this dimension could match.

name: Neon Abyss: Infinity
summary: "Neon Abyss: Infinity" is a roguelike game that integrates shooting and 2D platform jumping elements.

name: Nekomew's Nightmares
summary: Face Nekomew's nightmares in this spooky rhythm game!

name: Neutrino
summary: Neutrino, The Mission - a minimalist game where a photon seeks the core of Neutrinos Kingdom, find out why they have mass and destroy them!

name: Neko Puzzle
summary: Leap around randomly generated puzzles collecting blocks in the right order.

name: Neave 2
summary: Explore the world of Neave 2 as you hunt for magical floating cubes. If you're feeling competitive, race for the fastest time to claim a top spot on the leaderboard.

name: Nebula
summary: Clean a galaxies from thousands of invaders! Nebula is an action, space shooter where your choices are making you progressively stronger against the endless waves of space enemies.

name: NekoNecro
summary: Run! Jump! Double jump! Pounce and bounce! Meow! A fast-paced 2D platformer with a beautiful hand-drawn 90's graphic novel style.

name: Neko Yume Douchuuki
summary: Neko Yume Douchuuki is a traditional Yume Nikki fangame where you explore Mimitsuki's dream world.

name: Neon Dungeon
summary: This is a neon style and fast-paced platform jumping game. In the game, you need to avoid many obstacles and finally reach the star of victory.

name: Nekojara Monogatari
summary: This game is a dungeon crawling RPG. In it, you control a boy who woke up one day to find himself transformed into a cat. He learns that the royal heirloom of Cat Land has been stolen. He reluctantly goes on an adventure to retrieve it, as it is the only way to turn back.

name: NES Classic Edition
summary: An official NES emulation system that came with 30 NES games in the form of a miniature NES system. Games output at 720p through HDMI, and the controllers re-use the accessory connector from the Wii Remote.

name: Nekomancy
summary: Nekomancy is a Magic rougelite looter shooter! Craft spells and vanquish evil creatures! Grab their loot and craft better spells! Make progress in the skill tree! Only the best synergies pass the test!

name: Neo Geo Mini International
summary: An official SNK emulation system that came with 40 SNK games in the form of a miniature MVS system. Games output at 720p on the built-in screen, and can also be output to a TV through min-HDMI.

name: New Tales from the Borderlands
summary: Decide the fates of altruistic scientist Anu, her ambitious, "streetwise" brother Octavio, and the fierce, frogurt-slinging Fran. Claw and con your way through five thrilling chapters!

name: New Tales from the Borderlands: Deluxe Edition
summary: Includes the Nintendo Switch digital version of New Tales from the Borderlands. Control your corner of the universe with New Tales from the Borderlands - Deluxe Edition! This Edition includes: - New Tales from the Borderlands Full Game (Digital) - Tales…

name: Necropolis of the Angels
summary: Play as a Fallen Angel fighting a host of Enemies through The Necropolis of the Angels, The Hidden Angel City, The Underworld and The Third City of Hell. An exciting third-person shooter where the player will have to use intelligence as well as the trigger finger. Male and female protagonists.

name: Neko no Famires: Nyanko-tachi to Issho ni Omise wo Moriageyou!!~
Neighbourhood Cat
summary: In the peak of lockdown, you are Neighbourhood Cat, the only one around who still has the freedom to go outside. Roam the streets, visit your neighbours, listen to their stories, and spread a bit of comfort and charm. After all, you are a cat. That's what you do.

name: New Super Kaizo Bros.
summary:
An intermediate-level Kaizo hack of Super Mario World, starring 24 exits.

New Super Kaizo Bros features:
- custom musics
- retry system
- wall kick

name: Neo Geo Mini
summary: The original Japanese edition of the Neo Geo Mini, released only in Japan on July 24, 2018 to celebrate SNK's 40th anniversary.

name: New Joe & Mac: Caveman Ninja
summary: We're back in the distant Past, when “Rock & Roll” was just about rocks and “Fast food”, a dinner that you couldn’t catch. 2 cave dudes named Joe & Mac live in a peaceful and cool village. Cool it was, until a bogus bunch of Neanderthal snatched all the village’s women!

name: Neotag League
summary: Team up and beat your opponents in Neotag League, the sport from the future, where sci-fi parkour robots chase each other to score points! Jump, roll, wall run, grapple, dodge and attack in this team-based multiplayer game of Chase Tag.

name: Nemo's Aqua Pop
summary: Kids game with matching 3 puzzle games and a mode to decorate the ocean.

name: New Town Needs Tamer
summary: Become a champion tamer for a newly formed town, full of people eager to meet you.

name: Neverland
summary: Neverland is a co-op horror open world; join with your friends or explore alone the dark secrets of a once called paradise. Uncover the mysteryes of the forgotten island, help your teammates or leave them to their luck...

name: Neon Cyber Desert
summary: Slice through hordes of mutated monsters as you wander the vast post-apocalyptic wastelands. Follow the trail of mysterious obelisks and craft upgrades from scrap metal to unlock your hidden functions. Experience deadly exploration and dynamic combat in a stylized open world!

name: NecroCity
summary: Welcome to NecroCity, a place that does not bustle with life. Take on the role of the governor of this dark city - manage your resources and develop your NecroCity. NecroCity is a city-building economic strategy game, with a defense and combat system. The world of the dead is just in front of you!

name: NEG: The Threefold Cord
summary: Join NEG and Buddy on their journey to return the stolen scrolls and save their village. In this precision platformer you will face many daring challenges. Overcome the challenges and defeat all the bosses to fix The Threefold Cord.

name: Necroblade
summary: Necroblade is a grimdark fantasy adventure with survival and RPG elements. On your way to the heart of the capital, you must explore, scavenge, battle hordes of enemies and upgrade abilities to survive. Which will kill you? The terrible curse or the deadly quest to break it?

name: Necropolis Suite
summary: Necropolis Suite, is an immersive narrative-driven cosmic horror game about discovery, knowledge, and the meaning of transcendence. Can you escape the terror that lurks in the suite?

name: Nenneman: The Game
summary: Nenneman: The Game is a Pixelart-Sidescroller by Vinni Richburgh, in which you can play as one of a few local heroes (first and foremost Nenneman) on their mission to stop evil spirits from destroying their beloved hometown. Will they succeed? Who knows...

name: Netcorter: City 2179
summary: Netcorter: City 2179 is a sci-fi storytelling third-person shooter(TPS) with a cyberpunk aesthetic and Bullet Hell and Roguelite elements. You would become a Netcorter (S-class hacker) and dive into a chain of events that followed the disaster in 2178.

name: NeonCyber.exe
summary: NeonCyber.exe is a 3D parkour platform game. Complete levels in the shortest time possible and score points to earn coins. You can use them to buy skills, upgrades and skins for your character.

name: Nekosan
summary: Oh no… The mice stole all the stars. Only a cat can infiltrate their dungeons to get them back! Help Nekosan and his friends to run, slide, wall jump, and fly through dozens of devilish levels. And all of this with one finger! Are you up to the challenge?

name: Neo Golden Logres
summary:
Neo Golden Logres is a Dreamcast port of LittleWing's pinball game Golden Logres, released only in Japan.

It included significant gameplay changes, most notably a timer that could only be extended by continuously skillful shooting and a heavyset physics engine that made it much harder than the original.

name: Neptunia: Sisters vs. Sisters - Calendar Edition
summary:
The Calendar Edition of Neptunia: Sisters VS Sisters includes:
- The Game
- Reversible Cover
- Calendar Edition Box
- Desktop Calendar
- Double-sided A3 Poster

name: Neon Mine
summary: A logic puzzle game - classic minesweeper with a modern twist.

name: Neko Neko
summary:
This is a casual intellectual game that can be easily played, your goal is to swap the fragments to restore the pictures.
There is no time or star limit in the game, you are supposed to enjoy the relaxing experience.

Together the full picture of all the lovely cat ladies with your own hands, collect their portraits.

name: Nether Garden
summary: Join the Hunter Society and explore an open world, building up your character with equipment and upgrade materials gathered from enemies and bosses. Venture into the underworld to unlock new abilities, and develop your training rooms in the overworld, and eventually automate the farming process.

name: New Joe & Mac: Caveman Ninja - T-Rex Edition
Need for Speed: Unbound
summary: Race against time, outsmart the cops, and take on weekly qualifiers to reach The Grand, Lakeshore's ultimate street racing challenge.
