Pack your garage with precision-tuned, custom rides and light up the streets with your style, exclusive fits, and a vibrant global soundtrack that bumps in every corner of the world.

name: Necro Saga
summary: The story of you and the immortals begins in a kingdom about to be destroyed by a necromancer. You can give someone mercy, or you can take someone's precious things away. This is an action RPG where you decide the ending of the story.

name: Neural Cloud
summary:
"Warning! Fatal Error: System integrity severely compromised..."
This is an unprecedented threat to the existence of Dolls. In face of formidable enemies and a future filled with uncertainties, the scattered Dolls grit their teeth and steel themselves as they travel in search of the slim hope of salvation.
Humankind may have abandoned them, but as the person in charge of "Project Neural Cloud", you have steadfastly set foot in this unknown land and founded the "Exiles" as you take in meandering Dolls. With you as their leader, the Exiles shall explore the secrets of the world, find a way out of this desperate situation, and uncover the truth...

Neural Cloud is a strategy RPG with a cyber theme. Upload yourself to save the world!

name: Nerg Loves Them
summary: A surreal action platformer that focuses on the concept of balance. Switch between 2 playable lizards and harmonize their strenghts and weaknesses.

name: Neuro Horror
summary: Psychological horror in format of a visual novel, created using a neural network.

name: Near Sol
summary: Space 4X game with the ability to build factories, extract resources, with characters, internal and external markets ... Take part in the discussion of the game, share your vision.

name: NecroNomNomNom: Eldritch Horror Dating
summary: Plunge into the depths of sanity and Lovecraftian lore in this Eldritch Horror Dating Visual Novel. Will you find love or madness?

name: Needy Dragons
summary: Adult-Only Visual Novel featuring 3 dragon-girls, comedy, and plenty of sex!

name: Necroffense
summary: This is a game in which you use necromancy to control your soldiers and defeat enemy armies. Choose one of the random options to strengthen your troops. Push back the onrushing enemy army and destroy them!

name: Neolithic First City-States
summary: Neolithic: First City-States is a Historical Strategy Game. Though Neolithic doesn't fall easily into popular strategy genres, the game is heavily influenced by games such as Age of Empires, Civilization, Caesar III, and to a lesser extent games like RimWorld. The game includes aspects of City-Building, RTS-like gameplay and deeper characters. It is essentially a full-time solo dev project.

name: Need for Speed Unbound: Palace Edition
summary:
Need for Speed Unbound Palace Edition and get 3 days early access plus exclusive Palace branded content including:
- 4 stunningly intense new Custom Cars
- Palace Clothing Pack containing 20 items
- Palace Driving Effects
- Loads more bitz

name: Never Rain
summary: Enter a mysterious village, cursed by an evil entity. Discover what happened to its residents and survive against what lurks in the darkness. Never Rain is a singleplayer horror experience waiting for the player to unveil its secrets.

name: Neo Angelique Special
summary: Fully voiced and added omake events for the characters from the Neo Angelique Abyss anime: Mathias, Erenfreed, Jet, and Roche.

name: Nextbots In Backrooms: Obunga
summary:
Nextbot is what will haunt you. Run from the trends in the worst place in the Backrooms. The scariest and most challenging account awaits you ahead.

You'll have to survive the pursuit in the Backrooms. Beware, the enemy will not be alone, there are many of them. They are cunning and nimble, you will not have time to react in time and lose. Huge mazes, incomprehensible corridors and scary corners await you. Compete with friends for time.

name: Neogen Space Monkeys
summary: A classic 2D, metroidvania where you explore the color dimension of the space monkeys. Gather your lost equipment, gain legendary abilities, unlock achievements, and even more secrets in this snappy retro throwback

name: New Super Mario World 1: The Twelve Magic Orbs - Powered-Up
summary: A remake of New Super Mario World 1: The Twelve Magic Orbs which aims to polish the original hack by improving the level design and giving more replay value.

name: Neko Neko Nihonshi: Rekishi Hakken Puzzle!
Nepheshel
summary:
Nepheshel is an influential indie Japanese RPG developed by the doujin circle Studio Til with the RPG Maker 2000 software. The game was initially released on June 2rd, 2002. It received an English fantranslation by RPGMaker.net user Vittone on October 15th, 2022, more than twenty years later.

Set on the isolated Confined Isle, the protagonist awakes without memories after washing ashore from the ocean. The island is said to be cursed so that everyone who sets foot on it loses all their memories. The game has the player exploring a series of interconnected dungeons in order to uncover the mysteries of the isle. Dungeons are intricate, full of traps and difficult battles. There are no random encounters, and every enemy icon on the map is colored according to the expected difficulty of the battle, so players can choose to try to sneak past dangerous enemies.

The exploration is open-ended, with the player being free from the beginning to explore the island without hardly any obstacles except the perils of the dungeons themselves.

name: NEET Girl Date Night
summary: Your friend sets you up on a date with his NEET Cousin Kara.

name: Neko Night
summary:
It was business as usual in your life as a freelance writer, until you were tasked with writing about your first sexual experience. You try your best, but how can you write about something that never happened?

There is a knock at your door. Who could it be?

Standing at your doorstep, drenched from the rain, is a young, beautiful... catgirl?! She seems to know you, yet you have no recollection of her. She claims to be on a divine mission - to make a baby with you! But she's not the only unexpected guest. A second catgirl shows up soon after with the same higher calling...

This must be a dream, right? Well, you might as well have some fun while you find out.

name: Neko Golf: Anime Golf
summary: Made by Colopl, the ones who made White Cat Project, an anime golf game for iOS and Android devices. It has an easy to understand swipe swing system that puts you in control with each of your swings. As of right now play as one of five characters and customize them with outfits through the game's Gatcha system. Earn more clubs and level them up to up your stats to your liking just by playing. No worries about pay to win, even with good stats, your swing really affects the accuracy of your shot, so a lot of this is skill based. You can play casually or competitively in battle mode, make friends, create rooms and play up to 9 holes in public or private matches, voice chat, rank up and enter in weekly tournaments or special events.

name: Neko Dating Sim
summary: Neko Dating Sim is a non-linear life simulation visual novel where you date multiple catgirls at the same time! Each girl has their own unique personalities, likes and dislikes. Your goal is to build relationships with each of them and become closer than just friends.

name: NecroTactics
summary: An auto-battler roguelite with tower defense and horde survival elements. Draft and position your army, develop your graveyard, equip units with powerful items, cast spells, and place turrets to annihilate your opponent's army in seconds!

name: Neon Blood
summary: The dual Viridis, separated between the luxurious Bright City and the dangerous Blind City, where inequality reigns until you, Axel McCoin, an idealistic detective, start a revolution to change the world in this cyberpunk RPG adventure.

name: Necromunda: Hired Gun - Gang Wars Cosmetics Bundle
summary: Pick a side or die alone, there’s no in between. Get the Gang Wars Cosmetics Bundle to receive all three Gang Wars skin set DLCs and embody an Escher, Goliath, or Nautican with exclusive skins for your outfit, knife, mastiff and chew toy.

name: Necromunda: Hired Gun - Hellhound Pack
summary: The Hellhound pack for Necromunda: Hired Gun comes with unique cosmetics for your knife, outfit, and mastiff. Put the fear into your prey before you croak & with your rusty knife and midnight hound. Tonight, Death stalks the hive.

name: Nemesis Island
summary: Tired of Zombie survival games, this game is different. No zombies, but you will have to try and SURVIVE THIS! A Mystery/Horror survival game, with base building and unique "enemies" Hunting, building, exploring, surviving Early Access - Mega updates, expansions and features coming

name: Neko Match
summary: This is a very simple match 3 game. Players need to eliminate all the patterns on the screen. The pattern on the first layer must be eliminated before the pattern on the next layer can be eliminated. If the grid is full If you do, you will lose.

name: New Scuffed Epic Visual Novel
summary: This is New Scuffed Epic Visual Novel, which is a story set in the world of New Scuffed Epic BHOP Simulator, play as a character of your choice, as you run into some new, and familiar faces along the way.

name: Neverwinter: Fury of the Feywild
summary: Neverwinter: Fury of the Feywild is the 1st campaign expansion module for the Neverwinter massive-multiplayer role-playing game. Released in August 2013, the expansion added a new campaign, adventure zone, skirmish, and a new dungeon, along with numerous other updates.

name: Necromunda: Underhive Wars - Gangs Bundle
summary:
Complete your collection of Underhive gangs with the Van Saar and Cawdor Gangs Bundle. Getting this bundle adds:The Van Saar and Cawdor gangs in &ldquoOperations&rdquo and &ldquoSkirmish&rdquo modes, both player- and AI-controlled.New skills and a new perk for use by the Van Saar and Cawdor gangs
New cosmetic options for the Van Saar and Cawdor gangs, including new weapon skins.

name: Neverwinter: Shadowmantle
summary: Neverwinter: Shadowmantle is the 2nd campaign expansion module for the Neverwinter massive-multiplayer role-playing game. Released in December 2013, the expansion added a new campaign, adventure zone, skirmish, and a new dungeon, along with numerous other updates.

name: Neverwinter: Curse of Icewind Dale
summary: Neverwinter: Curse of Icewind Dale is a 3rd campaign expansion module for the Neverwinter massive-multiplayer role-playing game. Released in May 2014, the expansion added a new campaign, several new adventure zones, a new epic skirmish along with numerous other updates.

name: Neverwinter: Tyranny of Dragons
summary: Neverwinter: Tyranny of Dragons is the 4th campaign expansion module for the Neverwinter massive-multiplayer role-playing game. Released in August 2014, the expansion added a new campaign, adventure zone, skirmish, and a new dungeon, along with numerous other updates.

name: Neverwinter: Rise of Tiamat
summary: Neverwinter: Rise of Tiamat is the 5th campaign expansion module for the Neverwinter massive-multiplayer role-playing game. Released in November 2014, the expansion added a new adventure zone, skirmish, and raid dungeon, along with an expansion of the Tyranny of Dragons campaign and numerous other updates.

name: Neverwinter: Elemental Evil
summary: Neverwinter: Elemental Evil is the 6th campaign expansion module for the Neverwinter massive-multiplayer role-playing game. Released in April 2015, the expansion added a new class, increased level cap, expansion of the game's profession system, a new campaign and several new adventure zones.

name: Neverwinter: Strongholds
summary: Neverwinter: Strongholds is the 7th campaign expansion module for the Neverwinter massive-multiplayer role-playing game. Released in August 2015, the expansion added the feature of stronghold guild halls to guilds, added a new event, a new form of PvP gameplay, and introduced a form of premium membership.

name: Neverwinter: Underdark
summary: Neverwinter: Underdark is the 8th campaign expansion module for the Neverwinter massive-multiplayer role-playing game. Released in November 2015, the expansion added a new campaign, adventure zone, skirmishes and raids, along with numerous other updates.

name: Neverwinter: The Maze Engine
summary: Neverwinter: The Maze Engine is the 9th campaign expansion module for the Neverwinter massive-multiplayer role-playing game. Released in March 2016, the expansion added a new campaign, re-introduced four previously-removed dungeons, along with a new system for in-game mounts.

name: Neverwinter: The Cloaked Ascendancy
summary: Neverwinter: The Cloaked Ascendancy is the 11th campaign expansion module for the Neverwinter massive-multiplayer role-playing game. Released in February 2017, the expansion added a new campaign, adventure zone, skirmish, and even more.

name: Neolithic Dawn
summary: Neolithic Dawn is an open-world primitive survival game built exclusively for VR. Play as a lineage of 10,000 BC hunter / gatherers on a journey too great for one lifetime. Fight prehistoric beasts, or tame them to aid in your survival!

name: Neopunk
summary: An open world cyberpunk retro RPG. Start a new life as an agender mercenary who moves to the dark and neon lit streets of Kaanalos City. Freedom awaits you in Neopunk. Solve a murder. Buy apartments. Deliver pizza. Who will you be?

name: Never Ending Beyond
summary: The only roguelite where you must pet animals to survive. Each animal comes with its own unique weapons and passive abilities. Pet animals, mixing and matching abilities to create unique skill builds and conquer the Beyond.

name: New Citizen
summary: New Citizen is a modern-themed roleplay adventure game set in the vast open world of the USA. The game focuses mainly on the player, creating an environment that feels alive and that is constantly moving.

name: Neogeo Pocket Color Selection Vol.2
summary: Neogeo Pocket Color Selection Vol.2 The second wave of the dream collection is here! Ten new Neogeo Pocket Color masterpieces are included!

name: Neo Breakout
summary: This 2022 re-imagining of the Atari classic Breakout for the Atari 50 collection features progression from black and white to colorful and progressively more difficult multi-ball stages, as well as a 2-player Battle Breakout mode reminiscent of Pong.

name: NeverSynth
summary: NeverSynth is a 3rd person game that is a rhythm driving simulator. This game is a dynamic action game in which you have to drive a car to rhythmic music and collect beats. The more beats you collect, the more game points you earn.

name: Net Enjou Jikenbo: Moete Moeru SNS Idol Tenraku Illustration Quiz Game
Need for Speed: Payback - Pontiac Firebird & Aston Martin DB5 Superbuild Bundle
summary: Two iconic cars that made an impression on the silver screen.

name: Neon Noir
summary: Neon Noir is an episode-based cyberpunk visual novel with interactive mechanics. It is set in the megalopolis of New Devon in the year 2169, where large private corporations have more power than the government. The player follows the crimes investigated by Colden, a Snatcher.

name: New Cycle
summary: Build a new civilization out of the chaos of an apocalyptic solar flare as you grow your House from a lone shelter to an industrial metropolis. Take on the burden of preserving life itself and help your people realize their aim: "A future beyond survival." Lead the world of New Cycle.

name: Neko Cafe
summary: Design and build your business into the best café in New Neko City! Craft masterpiece sandwiches, manage employees, unlock upgrades and items to fully customise your café, win over picky food critics, and compete in cooking competitions!

name: New Hire
summary: A horror job simulation game where you have to avoid the dangers lurking in the shadows while finishing your job and getting your paycheck.

name: Nebuchadnezzar: The Adventures of Sargon
summary: Story-focused DLC, where you'll play as one of the most famous rulers of ancient Mesopotamia, Sargon II, and relive all of his important campaigns and achievements. Suppress dangerous rebellions, conquer the surrounding empires and ultimately restore the glory of the Assyrian Empire.

name: Neko Sagashi
summary:
A cat playing in the park...
A kotatsu, a mandarin orange, and a cat...
The cat is always by my side, nya.

But as time passes, the "cat" runs away, nya...!
Before that, you can save all the "cats"
Can you find me?

name: Need for Russia 4: Moscow Nights
summary: Need for Russia 4: White Nights is the fourth part of a series of arcade racing games with cars from across the eastern border in leading roles. Once again, players have the opportunity to sit behind the wheel of Soviet products and Russian automotive thought.

name: Nekketsu Kouha Kunio-kun Gaiden: River City Girls 1-2
summary: Both River City Girls games bundled together.

name: Neko Gacha
summary: Create your own Neko team of unique, fun-shaped kittens and Gacha for rare 6 Nekos! Win Neko coins and gems by playing Mini-Games or fighting Bosses! Decorate your own room and backyard and visit your friends! Can you collect them all?

name: Neo Utopia Project
summary:
Neo Utopia Project is an indie videogame being developed for Windows. It is an hybrid between an RPG and a puzzle-adventure game.

The graphical aspect of the game will be focused in 2D-art mixed with pixel-art, while the story and gameplay will have dark undertones and a clear objective: To unravel the mysteries hidden in the living prison "Neo-Babylon" while the protagonists fight not only for their lives, but also to uncover the mysteries that this place holds.

The game is planned to be released in two languages: English and Spanish.

name: Newt
summary: A mapset inspired by Magnolia and other rbks stuff, mostly combat puzzles.

name: New Eden
summary: New Eden is an Online Action Role-Playing Game with focus on involved lore, roleplay, and souls-like combat re-emagined in a 2D, retor style.

name: NeoQuest
summary: An HTML-based RPG Found on the Neopets Website. It's a turn-based RPG where you move your way through the game one tile at a time, the page reloading each time you move a tile. You must adventure your way through the story in the game in the land of Neopia where you will be fighting evil, exploring dungeons, uncovering the story, and making valued allies and friends along the way. The game uses experience and skill points to power up the hero characters.

name: NeoQuest II
summary: An HTML-based RPG Found on the Neopets Website. It's a turn-based RPG where you move your way through the game one tile at a time, the page reloading each time you move a tile. You must adventure your way through the story in the game in the land of Neopia where you will be fighting evil, exploring dungeons, uncovering the story, and making valued allies and friends along the way. The game uses experience and skill points to power up the hero characters. Sequel to NeoQuest

name: Negaigoto
summary: Negaigoto is a Yume Nikki fangame. The game stars Ken, a person living in an old-styled Japanese house with a small garden as opposed to a balcony. Unable to leave his house, he explores a dream world through sleeping in his bed. In the dream world, the nexus contains a single door with 4 possible locations, chosen randomly when the player sleeps.

name: Negative One
summary:
Negative One is a first-person retro horror game where you take the role of Lisa.

Lisa discovers a secret abandoned lab beneath her apartment, learning some things are left best not found...

name: Neuro
summary:
Several centuries in the future, Earth is at the center of a galaxy-spanning empire. Most colonies are loyal to Earth, though some vie for independence. You play as a soldier working for the central government, who becomes embroiled in political upheaval on the planet Sorgo.

Neuro is a science-fiction first-person-shooter with cyberpunk stylings. It mixes traditional FPS mechanics with gameplay based on psionic powers. The most important ability allows the player to take control of enemies' minds and use them to his/her advantage.

The game is set in the same universe as Revolt Games' earlier space sim, Homeplanet.

name: Need for Speed: Underground 2
summary: Game Boy Advance port of Need for Speed: Underground 2.

name: Neko Loop
summary: A cat girl facing a multitude of enemies, bosses, secrets and challenges creates the cutest roguelike game you've ever seen.

name: New Super Mario Bros. Wii 2: The Next Levels
summary: Mario, Luigi, Peach, and Toad were at Peach's Castle for a feast. When suddenly, there was a rumble. Bowser's airship broke the roof of the castle! (and of course the dining room is on the top floor! How stupidly built). Bowser gets away with Peach and now The Mario Bros and Toad must save her. Bowser takes her to his castle, and puts her in a cage, which, like always, the bros must defeat bowser to unlock the cage to get her.

name: Neon Invasion Earth
summary:
A Space Invaders Clone with a Twist...

Following his escape from the Neon Space, Captain Rick Sims must now defend Earth from the evil forces of the Neon Galactic Empire...

Collect power-ups to help you defeat the enemy faster. with 35 levels of increasing difficulty... Featuring a cross-platform, Online Highscores system so you can challenge anyone in the world to beat your best score... Do you have what it takes to be Number 1?

name: New Super Mario Bros. Wii DS
summary: New Super Mario Bros. Wii DS is a rom hack that recreates levels of New Super Mario Bros. Wii in the original New Super Mario Bros.

name: New Super Mario Bros. U but the Floor is Lava
summary: Every Level from Acorn Plains to Superstar Road but the floor is lava.

name: Neospace
summary: You wake up in a spaceship, you realize that strange things are going on there, you try to get back to civilization. However, this is harder than you think, the encounters will drive you crazy and you will doubt yourself.

name: Neko Neko Rampage
summary: Roll fast and make a mess! Welcome to a colorful world of cats and chaos. In Neko Neko Rampage, you will join the feline ranks and gather online or locally with friends to wreck and bring mayhem and destruction on your way.

name: Neptune's Garden
summary: Begin with an empty reef, as time goes on; hire cleaners, grow coral & create the best day spa in all the 7 seas!

name: Neon Sex Dream
summary: Neon Sex Dream - is a match 3 puzzle with explicit sex scenes!

name: Necrodemic
summary: Necrodemic, is a Free to Play survival-based thriller. Defeat zombie bears to earn essence. Essence can be used to purchase more powerful weapons, ammo, and perks that increase players' chances of survival. Rank in daily competitions and win loot box prizes and a daily leaderboard that rewards players!

name: New Ludo
summary: Ludo is one of the most popular dice board games in many counties. This New Ludo, support "Team Mode" creatively, you can play together with friends in one team against others in another team. Also you can 1 vs 3 if you like!

name: New FreeCell Solitaire HD
summary: FreeCell is one of the popular solitaire games that requires skill and patience to win! This is a card game with amazing graphics and ease of use to bring you the best experience.

name: Neon
summary:
How many levels will you beat?
Can you collect all the characters? All original music from McFarland Beats!

name: Negative Atmosphere: Emergency Room
summary: Negative Atmosphere: Emergency Room is a first person, cinematic medical horror experience dedicated to precision, tension and trauma. As the Chief Medical Officer on the TRH Rusanov, Samuel Edwards must triage, examine and operate on his crew-mates, as disaster builds and shady figures set the events in motion that will eventually lead to Negative Atmosphere.

name: NetherEx
summary: NetherEx is a mod for Minecraft which largely reworks the Nether, adding four new biomes, each designed to fill a specific purpose with a unique approach within the dimension. The biomes are populated with new mobs, decorated with new blocks, and filled with over a dozen new items.

name: NeonNoir
summary: NeonNoir is a hybrid point-and-click adventure/visual novel game for the Amiga 1200.

name: New Super Mario Bros. 2: Gold Coin Edition
summary: In this edition you get the game as well as a gold coin gamecase!

name: New Super Mario Bros. 2: Gold Edition
summary: New Super Mario Bros. 2: Gold Edition includes course packs 1-10, which were previously only available for separate purchase.

name: NeuroSquad
summary: Invent your own weapons in this sci-fi Roguelike shooter! Combine any weapon with any upgrade to customize your arsenal. Form a squad of holographic soldiers, redesign their guns too, and slay hordes of cybernetic enemies!

name: New Rule: The Game is...
summary: Kill cybernetically enhanced bugs in this 3D top-down voxel shooter. Twist: the rules change every 15 secs and the level is changing constantly. So level up your skills to stay ahead of leveling enemies!

name: Neon Man
summary:
This will be a wonderful experience!
This is a very dynamic and addictive Game!
Swipe fingers to jump the floors and slide forward!!
Avoid Rotating-Obstacles!
Acquire Items (the Stars, Shields, Lightnings and Batteries) to survive!
Charge the Battery of the Neon Man to increase the speed!
A scary Circular-Saw chases the Neon Man.
Neon Man must escape away from the scary Circular-Saw!

name: New Star Cricket
summary:
A big welcome from New Star Games as we expand the BAFTA award-winning gameplay of New Star Soccer into a whole new sporting arena!
In New Star Cricket, you are the star of the show, launching your cricket career as a promising young academy player. Build your skills, purchase all the trappings of a professional cricket player and rise to the pinnacle of the sport, playing in competitions all over the world!
As your career progresses, you must manage your relationships, keeping team-mates, the coach, your partner and your sponsors happy as you face dilemmas and exciting twists along the way.
Experience life as a professional cricketer, play for your national team and revel in the authenticity of a mobile cricket title that captures the spirit, skills, excitement and teams from the many cricket leagues around the world!
Equally enjoyable as a snack game for a few minutes or an intensive few hours, New Star Cricket will leave you entertained, amused and hungry for more, and it’s entirely free to play without any restriction!
What are you waiting for? This huge, detailed cricket universe is yours to own. So get your bat and ball and earn your first contract!

name: Nearly Dead: Live and Let Die
summary: 2D top-down multi co-op action game. Survive the zombies together with a stranger.

name: Nev's Jam Buster
summary: Use Nev's Jam Buster to clear the jam pies coming down towards Nev - make sure they don't reach the bottom or his Jam Buster will get clogged up and Nev will end up covered in Jam.

name: Netherverse
summary: Netherverse is a Free-to-play, Third-person, Team-based, 3v3 Multiplayer Deathmatch online game set in a dystopian world. Team up, choose a class & fight to survive. Discover our unique world shifting mechanic, as well as the Human & the Nether worlds.

name: Never Immortal
summary: Never Immortal is a 2D multiplayer topdown shooter with two different exciting gamemodes. Battle with up to 20 players against either hordes of zombies in the Wave Survival gamemode, or against eachother in the Who is the Zombie gamemode.

name: New Yankee: Karma Tales
summary: A normally-steady stream of silk, spices and other curiosities into Camelot has dried up and it’s down to John, Mary and friends to find out why! What happened to the raja who usually ships these goods? Is he in danger or is there another reason for his disappearance?

name: New Spring: Survival
summary: New Spring is a open world zombie survival RPG where you spend the daytime exploring and scavenging for tools and weapons, and defend your base when night falls. How long can you stave off the hordes?

name: Neon City Survivor
summary: Neon city Survivor is a top down arena shooter game that offers various ways of creating builds around skills that can be specialized either on automatic or manual. Take up your weapon and save the city.

name: Neuron
summary: A indie 2d hack and slash pixel art game with a cyberpunk vibe and focus on sword clinging combat

name: Neanderthallica
summary: Puzzle-metroidvania game set in a prehistoric world with a twist of sci-fi. Master the ability to change the weather, altering the environment and battles. Craft unique gear and weapons, and explore hidden secrets as you journey through humor-filled stone age.

name: Nelu's Adventure
summary: After years of lazing around his cozy crib, Nelu the bear is dragged by Doru the fox into an adventure.

name: Nessy the... Robot
summary: Fight your way through zombified robots, slime creatures, and a multitude of other enemies & bosses, as well as a plethora of levels, secrets & easter eggs to discover, collectible gems to... well... collect, as well as characters & dogs to talk to.

name: Neon Abyss: The Lovable Rogues Pack
summary:
Add two new colorful rogues to your roster of characters, each with a unique ability to help you tackle the Abyss and bring the New Gods to their knees!

Saya
An experiment conducted by Titan Corp, Saya will bring a katana to the fight, slaying enemies in close combat with powerful sword strikes.

Amir
Another member who was subject to nefarious experiments by Titan Corp. Amir joins Saya in your battle to conquer the Abyss with his strong mental abilities

name: Neko-chan's Club
summary: In the Neko-chan's Club, you can meet girls for any taste! Sports tennis player? Or maybe a mysterious ninja girl? Do you like an insatiable Egyptian woman..? Be careful with the last one, she hasn't seen a man for a thousand years! Become a club member with Neko-chans!

name: NervBox
summary: NervBox is a VR, physics-based, multiplayer sandbox where players can experience an unparalleled level of co-op interaction and combat.

name: Never Forgotten
summary: A uniquely stylised survival-horror adventure game. Explore a dying world, navigating through hazards and solving puzzles by deciphering riddles and combining items.

name: New Year Break
summary: New Year Break is retro arcade game with animated characters, powerups and custom music. Collect bonuses and powerups and blast your way thru the 30 Levels into the New Year. Simple controls and retro arcade action. Collect all the powerups to stack powerups.

name: Nev vs. Bouncer Boy
summary: The aim of the game is to direct Nev across the dancefloor to the golden star using the cursor keys, collecting as many records as you can along the way. Take care to avoid Bouncer Boy who is trying to bounce Nev out and bust the records before he can collect them.

name: Nev It Up
summary: See if you can get Nev to his top DJ spot, collecting all the dropped records on the way.

name: Neko-sama no Karaguri: Garden kara no Dasshutsu
Need for Speed: ProStreet
summary: Mobile port of Need for Speed: ProStreet. It was also ported to Mega Drive plug & plays released in Brazil.

name: Neon Death Drop
summary: A fabulous, fast-paced top-down action game Control and manipulate your environment; Slay rogue robots with stylish go-go dance moves; Sling enemies around with dazzling kinetic force!

name: Neko Atsume: Kitty Collector+
summary: Attract cats with food and then watch them romp with your toys! More than 40 varieties of cats—white and black, tabby and calico—might stop by. Rare cats are rumored to roam the neighborhood too, but you'll need particular items to entice those elusive felines. Each visitor is logged in your Catbook. Become a master kitty collector and fill it up! You can even make albums of your cat photos, or save them to your device and use them as wallpaper!

name: Neon Blast
summary: Neon Blast is a head-scratching puzzle game.

name: Neko Rescue Tale
summary: Scurry through the seasons in search of your lost feline friend!

name: Neko Hentai Girl: Beach Match-3
summary: Only in our game you get a beautiful Match-3 with naked girls, cute animals, various locations, arousing female moans, fine design, relaxing music, cheat and 100 achievements.

name: Neko Crush
summary: Meow! You just met a unique cat. With its help, you’ll be able to become an excellent interior designer, step by step! Apartments, seaside villas, manors... there are all kinds of houses in Neko Crush waiting for you to design and decorate. Try your best to satisfy the clients’ needs, and fully unleash your creativity!

name: New Deal or No Deal
summary: New Deal or No Deal is the second mobile game based on the UK version of the game show Deal or No Deal. The main difference from the previous game is that the player starts out on the Contestant's Row which means he has to wait for his turn while watching other contestants first playing the game. At times, the contestants will ask the player for advice. Once the proper game has started it works like before with the player choosing to open boxes to reveal their contents while deciding whether to accept the banker's offer. If unsure it's possible to ask another contestant for advice. In addition to the main mode, there's a quick play mode that skips the contestant's row, a banker's mode where the player makes the offers and a shortened mode called What would you do now? which lasts for a maximum of four rounds.

name: Neon Sling
summary: Drag the large neon ball on the sling line and release it to shoot the targets!

name: New Super Abandoned: Discovery Island
summary: New Super A:DI VI.0 DX: Director's Cut DELUXE: Five Nights at Treasure Island: Found 2021 Revision 3 feat. Dante from the Devil May Cry series Final Mix Redux with New Funky Mode - A Fragmentary Passage and Knuckles Remastered (otherwise simply known as New Super Abandoned: Discovery Island) is a semi-serious self-parodying April Fools' update to Abandoned: Discovery Island. Taking place in a separate continuity, the game features a mixture of improvements and additions, as well as joke additions and changes. This version is planned to receive updates as well as the DLC feature that were intended to be added to R1 and the original game, though it is not planned to entirely replace it at the moment nor will it be the game's last iteration.

name: Next Power
summary: Action RPG developed by Art System and published by Gakugei.

name: NetMaze: A Funnyman Game
summary:
netMaze allows you and up to 15 other players to explore different parts of Cyberspace together through the high-octane competitive Brawl mode or the creative Sandbox mode.

Take the maze by storm or build out your own virtual world using your very own Funnyman, a digital avatar that you can customize to your liking with different colors, weapons, and more!

name: Need for Speed: Underground
summary: Need for Speed Underground for the GBA is based upon the same gritty dark-side-of-racing design released on the consoles. Here, players have the opportunity to challenge racers to different styles of driving in order to earn coin that can be spent on upgrades; the GBA game features a garage of fourteen different licensed vehicles from Ford, Toyota, Volkswagen, Nissan, Mazda, Mitsubishi, Subaru and Acura, and each of these cars can be customized with paint, bumpers, decals, rims, ground effects, and more. The further into the Underground you go, the more extras you can unlock in order to create the most tricked out road machine the streets have ever seen. Most of the races are the traditional kind, with players racing against as many as three other opponents in the competition. There are also Drag challenges where racers will have to blast their way down a stretch of road, and Drift challenges where players score points by powersliding around the curves. Every win awards a dollar amount which can be converted into extras for the vehicle...either for performance or cosmetic purposes.

name: Need for Speed: Most Wanted
summary: Game Boy Advance port of Need for Speed: Most Wanted offers a scaled-down yet distinct take on the iconic street racing title. It features a mix of circuit and sprint races, and a simplified version of the main game's “Blacklist” system.

name: Need for Speed: Most Wanted
summary: DS version of Need for Speed: Most Wanted brings the thrill of high-speed racing and intense police chases to the Nintendo DS. Players can dive into an exhilarating underground world where they must outsmart law enforcement while competing against rival street racers. The game features a variety of customizable cars, allowing players to upgrade performance and style to stay ahead of the competition. With its challenging career mode, unique touch-screen controls, and dynamic environments, Need for Speed: Most Wanted DS delivers an adrenaline-fueled racing experience tailored for handheld gaming.

name: Need for Speed: Underground 2
summary: Dual-screen driving takes to the streets! Taking advantage of the Nintendo DS' powerful capabilities, this racer features some of the most detailed car models and impressive environments you'll ever play on the go. The racing action is displayed on the top screen, while the lower screen features a map of the current circuit to help you keep track of the track. You can use the touch screen to fire off a nitrous boost effect, or else customize your ride any way you choose. Plus, use the in-built paint program and stylus to create your own designs, and pimp your ride accordingly! Compete against other street racers, or play your friends - up to four players can race wirelessly against each other in the game's multiplayer mode. With a hip-hop soundtrack and 15 licensed motors, street racing doesn't get any more ferocious.

name: Need for Speed: Most Wanted
summary:
The player arrives in Rockport City, driving a racing version of the BMW M3 GTR (E46). Following Mia Townsend (played by Josie Maran), the player proves his driving prowess as he is pursued by a veteran police officer named Sergeant Cross (played by Dean McKenzie), who vows to take down the player and end street racing in Rockport.
Races seem to be in the player's favor until a particular group of racers, led by the game's antagonist, Clarence "Razor" Callahan (played by Derek Hamilton), sabotages and win the player's car in a race.

name: Necogram
summary: Necogram is a classical nonogram puzzle game in the company of beautiful neko-women

name: New Super Mario Bros. Wii: American Mario Revolution
summary: This is a custom mario game, featuring our favorite plumber saving Princess Peach yet another time! Join forces with Luigi and the blue and yellow toads to take down confederate Bowser!

name: New York City Driver
summary: Explore the streets of New York in ultra realistic detail! Cruise along Broadway, Wall Street and the famous Avenue of the Americas, including Times Square!

name: Neon Cop
summary: Drive through a neon world and catch the bad guys! Take control of the cop car as you dash, dodge and avoid obstacles! Reach the criminal and smash him out! Enjoy neon graphics, slow-mo crashes and a retro arcade feel!

name: Neji-Shiki
summary: Neji-Shiki (or Screw Style) is an adventure game loosely based on the 1968 alternative manga of the same name by Yoshiharu Tsuge. Despite the name, the game adapts the events from several of Tsuge's manga stories.

name: New Super Mario Bros. Versus: Steve's Map Pack
summary: A mod containing verious custom made maps for New Super Mario Bros. Multiplayer.

name: New Super Mario Bros. Versus: Cubby's Character Mod
summary: A mod of New Super Mario Bros. Versus that added a variety of new character options and stages.

name: New Heights
summary: New Heights is a physics-based climbing and bouldering game.

name: Nevermind This
summary: Step into the world of "Nevermind this", a hurt-pumping horror where confusion, chaos, fear, distraction and even fun come together for an unique game experience, in a cursed hut from old Lumberjack. Don't let them mess with your mind.

name: Nekopirate
summary: Nekopirate is a story driven action-platformer featuring short challenging levels, colorful graphics and a twisted sense of humor.

name: Neural Nest
summary: Neural Nest is a surreal, fluid, and fast-paced movement-shooter set in an underground brutalist megalith. Battle bizarre creatures and explore the depths of a science fiction-inspired world as you try to return to the life you once knew.

name: Necrosmith 2
summary: Like a dead man reanimated by dark sorcery, the necromancer simulator is back! Give the undead the ability to fly over mountains and swim across rivers, explore a fully generated world at night and fend off enemy hordes during the day. Start a new, uhm, life.

name: New Day
summary: Welcome to a new day, shuttle in the fantasy dreamland, different adventures, different enemies, different logic. When the boundary between reality and dream slowly blurs, when fantasy becomes the possibility of reality, use your awakened super power to investigate the truth of the world...

name: Neon Nexus
summary: Neon Nexus is a procedurally generated, sci-fi roguelike. Navigate the world, fight enemies, and work your way to the extraction zone. Try and get out alive!

name: Neo Berlin 2087
summary: A unique, Third- and First-Person Action Role-Playing Game; a deep, cinematic Detective Thriller that takes place in a dark future vision of Berlin. Solve a far-reaching conspiracy on an emotional Cyberpunk Journey about Justice, Friendship, Love, Guilt, Sacrifice and Betrayal.

name: Neko Miko Onryou Toubatsu Emaki
summary: In this side-scrolling shooter with six stages, choose three out of six different cats and utilize their unique abilities to fight back against the vengeful yokai!

name: Neon Survivors
summary: ANNIHILATE a small army's worth of ghouls, knaves and miners, with the power of lasers, missiles and kidneys! You're alone against these hordes with nothing but INCREDIBLE WEAPONRY and MURDEROUS INTENT. Can you survive for FOUR MINUTES?

name: Neurosis
summary: Neurosis is a first-person philosophical horror game that takes place inside the nightmare of a lonely child. Solve puzzles and traverse the dream world while revisiting and reliving your past to overcome your fears. Will you be able to escape the nightmare while avoiding the dangers within?

name: Neon Magic: Witch Shop
summary: Become the owner of a store selling all sorts of magical knick-knacks and earn money by selling potions, staffs, magical weapons, and other junk. Improve your shop-tower and hire assistants.

name: Neko Office: Nightlife Adventures
summary: Neko has been working hard at her job in the office and deserves to go to the bar! As you know, it is from the bar that nightly adventures begin...

name: New Club Penguin
summary: New Club Penguin is a fan made continuation of the original Club Penguin, bringing it into the future.

name: Neon Echo
summary: Neon Echo is a 3D side-scrolling action Roguelite game with an anime and tech-wear style.

name: New Super Mario Bros. U Deluxe: Spot the Difference
summary: New Super Mario Bros U Deluxe: Spot the Difference is a web game on the Play Nintendo website that made to promote the release of New Super Mario Bros. U Deluxe.

name: Neotrogla
summary:
Neotrogla is a Twine horror story about discomfort in who you are, urban decay, weird hobbies, and bugs.

Written for the SCREAM JAM 2022+1 in a little under a week.

name: NeonHClouds
summary: In this shooting game, the gorgeous effects and easy-to-use gameplay allow for a thrilling and exciting experience in every battle.

name: Neptunia GameMaker R:Evolution
summary: Hyperdimension Neptunia GameMaker R:Evolution is set during an era where game makers are competing with each other. There were three goddesses of game makers who were defeated in the race to win "market share" of game sales and perished. Will they be branded as "goddesses of failure" and disappear? However, Adult Neptune who travels many dimensions suddenly appears in their world, asked by the three goddesses to become their president in order to revive the fallen game maker.

name: NeverHome: Hall of Apathy
summary: Use your wits to solve puzzles and escape from an abstract world in this hand-drawn atmospheric horror game

name: Need for Speed: Carbon
summary: Need for Speed: Carbon, also known as NFS Carbon or NFSC, is an Electronic Arts video game in the Need for Speed series. It is the tenth installment and was the first game in the series to gain the PEGI rating of 12+. The game is a sequel to 2005's Need for Speed: Most Wanted.

name: Need for Speed: Carbon - Own the City
summary: Game Boy Advance port of Need for Speed: Carbon - Own the City.

name: Need for Speed: Carbon - Own the City
summary: Java Mobile port of Need for Speed Carbon Own The City.

name: Need for Speed: Carbon
summary: Need for Speed: Carbon, also known as NFS Carbon or NFSC, is an Electronic Arts video game in the Need for Speed series. It is the tenth installment and was the first game in the series to gain the PEGI rating of 12+. The game is a sequel to 2005's Need for Speed: Most Wanted.

name: Need for Speed: Carbon
summary: A port of Need for Speed Carbon released for Arcade machines.

name: Need for Speed: ProStreet
summary: Compete at the highest level of street racing with Need for Speed ProStreet. It’s no longer good enough to simply rule your local neighborhood; you need to dominate on a global stage. Build the ultimate battle machine, take it to multi-disciplinary showdowns and pit your skills and reputation against the world’s best street racers.

name: Need for Speed: ProStreet
summary: Compete at the highest level of street racing with Need for Speed ProStreet. It’s no longer good enough to simply rule your local neighborhood; you need to dominate on a global stage. Build the ultimate battle machine, take it to multi-disciplinary showdowns and pit your skills and reputation against the world’s best street racers.

name: Need for Speed: Nitro
summary:
Unleash your inner speed demon with Need for Speed Nitro for the Nintendo DS. This high-energy racing game delivers fast-paced, arcade-style action, letting you dominate the streets with style and speed.

Choose from a wide selection of licensed cars from top manufacturers and customize them with an array of performance upgrades and visual modifications to create your ultimate racing machine. Race through vibrant and dynamic environments inspired by real-world locations, each filled with shortcuts and hidden paths that provide strategic advantages.

Take on challenging AI opponents in various game modes, including Circuit, Elimination, and Drift. Master the art of drifting and nitro boosts to leave your rivals in the dust and achieve victory. The intuitive controls and responsive touch screen interface make car handling smooth and enjoyable.

Compete with friends in local multiplayer races via DS Download Play, and show off your racing skills and custom rides. With its colorful graphics, pulse-pounding soundtrack, and exhilarating gameplay, Need for Speed Nitro for the Nintendo DS offers a thrilling racing experience that you can take anywhere.

Get ready to rev your engines and burn rubber in a race to the finish line. Speed, style, and adrenaline await you in Need for Speed Nitro!

name: Need for Speed: The Run
summary: Nintendo 3DS port of Need for Speed: The Run.

name: Need for Speed: Shift 2 Unleashed
summary: iOS port of Need for Speed: Shift 2 Unleashed.

name: Need for Speed: Shift
summary: PlayStation Portable port of Need for Speed: Shift.

name: Need for Speed: Undercover
summary: Nintendo DS port of Need for Speed Undercover.

summary: PSP port of Need for Speed Undercover.

name: Need for Speed: Undercover
summary: Nintendo Wii port of Need for Speed Undercover.

name: Need for Speed: Undercover
summary: PlayStation 2 port of Need for Speed Undercover.

name: Need for Speed: Porsche Unleashed
summary: Game Boy Advance port of Need for Speed: Porsche Unleashed delivers the next level of open road racing experiences with an extensive collection of cars from the 50-year history of Porsche.

name: Need for Speed: Most Wanted
summary: A port of Need for Speed Most Wanted released for mobile devices.

name: Need for Speed: Most Wanted
summary: PlayStation Vita port of Need for Speed Most Wanted.

name: Need for Speed: Hot Pursuit
summary: A port of Need for Speed Hot Pursuit released for mobile devices.

name: Need for Speed: Hot Pursuit
summary: Nintendo Wii port of Need for Speed Hot Pursuit.

name: Neon Fantasy: Animals
summary: Neon Fantasy: Animals is the perfect puzzle game for a fun and rewarding pastime. Collect pictures, develop your attention, and feel like a part of the beautiful neon world.

name: Neko Doll
summary: Come and meet your neko doll, let her accompany you to complete challenging levels, unlock her mysterious realm, and experience the joy of intimate contact with neko in different scenes.

name: Necromancers' Arena
summary: Enter the Necromancers' Arena with up to three other players in this cute, dystopian, twin-stick shooter!

name: Need for Drifting
summary: "Need for Drifting" is an adrenaline-fueled game that is perfect for anyone who loves the thrill of drifting and the excitement of competition.

name: Neon City
summary: Welcome to Neon City, a virtual reality city-building game that combines the charm of block toys with cutting-edge hand-tracking technology.

name: Neon Run!
summary:
Neon Run is an fast-paced, intense infinite runner game with a cool 80s retro style and soundtrack.
Dodge and jump to avoid the hazards and fly as far as you can. Shields and time distortion pickups are scattered along the way.
Submit your high score to the world leaderboard! Can you compete with the best?

name: New Day
summary: New Day is an upcoming life simulation game where almost anything can happen! Create your own islanders, design their apartments, and get involved with their day-to-day life as they divulge into unexpected friendships, problems, and more!

name: New and Tasty
summary: A collection of 12 minigames complete with achievements and online high scores.

name: Nerd Quiz
summary: Nerd Quiz is a trivia game about video games.

name: Never Grave: The Witch and the Curse
summary: A Metroidvania x Roguelite, where you advance using a cursed hat. Use a variety of magic or possess your enemies to reach the lowest levels! Bring back loot, build new facilities in your village, make a living and strengthen yourself for the next battle! Supports up to 4-player multiplayer.

name: Nevsky Titbit
summary: Russian action FPS game. The idea and script of the game belong to Daniil Shepovalov.

name: Neva
summary:
Neva is an action-adventure game developed by Nomada Studio and published by Devolver Digital.
The gameplay combines side-scrolling platforming with environmental puzzles and combat.
Neva has been praised for its stunning art style, emotional storytelling, and refined gameplay mechanics, building upon the foundation laid by GRIS.

name: Newcomer: A Language Learning RPG
summary: Newcomer is a language learning videogame where you play and learn a second language through natural conversation.

name: Need for Drive: Car Racing
summary: "Need for Drive” is a thrilling racing game that will put your driving skills to the test. In this game, you will have access to various game modes, including drag, sprint, time trial, and racing.

name: Neon Flytron: Cyberpunk Flight
summary:
Find yourself driving a flying car, speeding through the cyberpunk city!
Dive into this fascinating neon world! Dodge traffic and moving bridges, fly between trains, and through giant fans. Use a shield to avoid obstacles. Watch neon signs passing by your side, while you rush forward.
Many dangers lie ahead, but you can do it! Prove yourself and become the best pilot in cyberpunk city!

name: Neko Secret Homecoming Light
summary: Explore Neko Town looking for hidden objects. Walk down the streets, find new places to get in. Try a variety of mini games like playing darts, picking locks, breaking safes! Try changing your style using character customization. Finally, find the way to get to the anime factory and hack all its computer's data!

name: New Nintendo 3DS Internet Browser: Breakout
summary: Breakout is a hidden Easter Egg game built into the web browser application on Japanese models of the New Nintendo 3DS. The game is accessed when tapping out the Mario theme on the bookmarks menu of the browser.

name: NESert Golfing
summary: NESert Golfing is a 2D golf game for the NES, directly inspired by Desert Golfing.

name: Neon D-Fence Remaster
summary: An AI menace is headed to your motherboard! Can you survive?

name: Neonscape
summary: Embrace Onyx, the master of the Black Lotus, in intense first-person hack n' slash combat. Maneuver compact battlegrounds, unleash spatial manipulation, and showcase unmatched agility. How long can you survive the relentless waves? Brace for an adrenaline-pumping test of mettle!

name: Neko's Rage
summary: 2D pixelart action game with many roguelite mechanics and power up. The gameplay is speed and hardcore but very addictive. You play as Nikki a female cyborg in an apocalyptic world rules by mechanicals creatures.

name: New Master Quest
summary: A mod for The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time that includes new dungeons.

name: New Super Mario Bros 3. DS
summary: An exhaustive hack of New Super Mario Bros DS, this hack replaces all of the level layouts with those of Super Mario Bros. 3, along with a couple of other miscellaneous levels from other games.

name: Neon Fantasy: Girls
summary: Neon Fantasy: Girls is the perfect puzzle game for a fun and rewarding pastime. Collect pictures, develop your attention, and feel like a part of the beautiful neon world.

name: NextNight
summary: This is a third person tower defense game where you need to use the space wisely to place defenses to kill zombies at night.

name: NetGame Adventure
summary:
NetGame Adventure is a short puzzle-horror adventure game.

Explore the 'Haunted Journey' server of a forgotten browser game.

name: Nexus 5X
summary: Stellaris Nexus is a turn-based multiplayer 4X game that respects your time, giving you the full spectrum of a thrilling, strategic 4X experience. Play as unique factions and leaders against up to 5 other players, plotting and battling your way to galactic dominance; all of it in about an hour.

name: Next: Merger with Power of 2
summary:
Swipe (Left, Right, Up, Down) to move blocks on the field and merge tiles. The field moves until reaching the Left/Right/Up/Down wall.
Plan your moves using the next tile, earn points and reach the highest level during one play.

name: New Age of Machine Warfare
summary: A turn-based strategy futuristic sci-fi robot battle chess game

name: Nedetskie Skazki
summary: Nedetskie Skazki (Unchildish Tales) is a 2D point-and-click adventure game set in a world of Russian fairy tales.

name: Nexomon 3
summary: The upcoming third entry in the Nexomon series, featuring a large, story-rich 3D open world and a new battle system.

name: Ned
summary: Blast your way through hordes of enemies in Ned! An action-packed adventure platformer set in the rich history of the Aussie outback.

name: Neverending Check-in: The Hotel Stories
summary: Immerse yourself in The Neverending Check-In: The Hotel Stories, a pixel RPG filled with mystery, quests, cats, humor and life universe. Rebuild a once-glorious hotel and uncover its secret past in this captivating journey of deep plots, lively characters, and abundant quests.

name: Neon Parkour 2
summary: Control a blue cube and complete challenging trails and puzzles to reach the target! Red cubes that will destroy you the moment you touch them! Help the blue cube reach its destination in Neon Parkour, which has a minimal design. Jump, dash and swing to solve challenging trails!

name: Never Forget to Nausicaä Game Forever
summary: The third game based off Nausicaä of the Valley of the Wind, Never Forget to Nausicaä Game Forever was released for the MSX and is the most well-known of the releases and has been frequently and erroneously referred to as a game where the player kills the Ohmu.

name: Next Sweetstop
summary: Unveil the chilling narrative of "Next SweetStop," a psychological horror game where you embody a woman enduring the nightshift at an eerie gas station. Haunted by a relentless stalker, she must conquer her deepest fears to survive the gripping suspense that unfolds in this atmospheric nightmare.

name: Nevultra
summary: Nevultra is an exciting shoot'em up that will take you back to the 8bit/16bit era. The protagonist, Nina, needs your help to reach her destination in deep space.

name: Nebula's Descent
summary: Colorful bite-sized roguelike twin-stick bullet-hell dungeon crawler! Explore a procedurally generated research lab, throw black holes at monsters, dodge lasers, and fight a final boss beyond comprehension!

name: New Lands 2
summary:
See what it’s like to be a farmer and maker of sweet treats. Grow cocoa trees, build mills and make squirrel houses. Decorate your own farmhouse. The farther you go into the new lands, the more varied your tasks will be and the harder they’ll be to complete.
Work your new lands and become the best maker of sweet treats around in new time management game New Lands 2!

name: Neon Fantasy: Birds
summary: Neon Fantasy: Birds is the perfect puzzle game for a fun and rewarding pastime. Collect pictures, develop your attention, and feel like a part of the beautiful neon world.

name: Netlooter
summary: Netlooter is a single-player offline FPS. Download the game and enjoy action-packed gameplay. Designed from the ground up for the mobile platform. From slow-motion bullet dives to intuitive controls, Netlooter is loaded with powerful weapons.

name: Need for Speed: Unbound - Robojets Swag Pack
summary: Switch lanes with the premium pack containing a one-off Legendary Custom and an incredible range of uniquely designed items.

name: Need for Speed: Unbound - Ford Mustang GT Legendary Custom Pack
summary: Elevate your style with the Legendary Custom Ford Mustang GT (2015), and get a 10-level Speed Pass boost to unlock new cosmetic or customization items. Use it wisely, as the boost kicks in as soon as the pack is purchased.

name: New Lands 3: Paradise Island
summary: Try being the owner of a whole island amid the south sea in new time management game. Gather tropical fruit and make refreshing ice cream. Develop your own resort. As you go farther into the new lands, your tasks will become ever more varied and difficult. Train your skills in the new time manager genre game!

name: Nemurenu Yoru no Chiisana Ohanashi
summary: Children's point-and-click storybook adventure based on the picture book "Short Stories for a Sleepless Night" by Yuko Hara.

name: Netannad
summary: A fan-made dystopian sci-fi visual novel with Clannad characters.

name: Neopets: Island Builders
summary: Create and decorate a town for your Neopets! Build homes, amenities, parks, and more! With hundreds of craftable items and buildable blueprints, you have everything you need to create your perfect island town.

name: Needle Of Anger
summary:
Caution! This game, please Want Please note that there is a frustration-induced and cancer induction.
This game is the perfect thread through that game to a simple person.
Success when you pass through the thin thread into the hole in the small needle!
However, please note the Tremor symptoms.
Side effects of this game, please note that there is a case in which frustrating is throw to explode.

name: Nerd Blocks
summary:
In an exciting game we combine words with passion for anime, movies, games, TV series and everything that is described as NERD!
Test yourself in remembering movie details or all the characters in your favorite series.

name: Neve
summary: Neve is a non-linear interactive fiction in which your decisions can completely change the course of history. Manage your team, race against time and unravel the mysteries surrounding your ship's crash in this suffocating retrofuturistic thriller that will have you hooked from the first second.

name: Neon Genesis Evangelion: Girlfriend of Steel - Special Edition
summary:
Neon Genesis Evangelion: Girlfriend of Steel, also known as Neon Genesis Evangelion: Iron Maiden, is a video game based on the Gainax anime/manga series Neon Genesis Evangelion.

The PS2 and PSP edition adds new scenarios, gallery and replay mode and an auto-save function.

name: Next Station: Zombies
summary: "Next Station: Zombies" is an indie-casual game that throws you into a post-apocalyptic world infested with hordes of ravenous zombies.

name: Neon Fantasy: Boys
summary: Neon Fantasy: Boys is the perfect puzzle game for a fun and rewarding pastime. Collect pictures, develop your attention, and feel like a part of the beautiful neon world.

name: New York Mysteries: Power of Art
summary: Laura is on a new mission to discover the history of the mysterious fantasy-world paintings, unaware of the monstrous plan behind this evenings mystical events. She can't handle such a difficult mission alone!

name: Neptunia: Sisters vs. Sisters - Digital Deluxe Edition
summary:
The Digital Deluxe Edition includes:
