Neko-nin ExHeart Spin!
summary: Neko-nin ExHeart Spin! is an upcoming side story of the Neko-nin ExHeart series.

name: Neko-nin ExHeart Spin!
summary: Neko-nin ExHeart Spin! is the Steam release of the upcoming side story of the Neko-nin ExHeart series.

name: New Super Mario Bros. F
summary: "New Super Mario Bros. F" is a hack remake of famous PC game Mario Forever.
publishers: The New Super Mario Bros. Hacking Domain

name: New Super Mario Castle
summary: This hack contains two new worlds and every level is a castle.
publishers: The New Super Mario Bros. Hacking Domain

name: News Reacts: Mission Impossible 2
summary: Four more News Reacts missions.

name: Needy Princess Nerd Club
summary: Kaoruko joins the nerd club full of boys so that she can receive attention from them. An nerdy princess with a strong need for approval goes wild!

name: Necrotic Haze
summary: "Survive and escape an undead nightmare in this cooperative multiplayer adventure. Join forces with others, battle hordes of undead, and find the elusive way out. Teamwork is key in this thrilling fight for survival."

name: Neogen BeatZ
summary:
Neogen Beatz is a crazy synergy of Music and a Ground Breaking Arcade Game!
Neogen Beatz is an arcade with neon lights, fluid gameplay and high speeds and all interacting as one with the mesmeric visual style and accompanying music.
Choose Your Favorite track from Your device and Feel how the Music pulses through the astonishing unique neon backgrounds, while you are playing the game.
Match the neon figures as they fallout, with the cells in the bottom, test your reaction and beat the highscores to unlock new modes.

name: Neon Fantasy: Furries
summary: Neon Fantasy: Furries is the perfect puzzle game for a fun and rewarding pastime. Collect pictures, develop your attention, and feel like a part of the beautiful neon world.

name: Ned: Iron Outlaw
summary: Ned is a doom-like 2D metroidvania platformer, based on Ned Kelly – Australia’s most infamous outlaw. Run and gun through endless swarms of enemies, wielding standard shooters alongside some truly original (and crazy) weapons; explore a twisted take on true events starring real life Aussie legends; And decide the fate of the tangled bush, with playing style determining Ned’s choice between folk-legend or corrupted beast.

name: Neonsomnia
summary: Neonsomnia is a game about exploring a strange and surreal dream world. It was developed for the Dream Diary Jam 7 and is a fangame based on Yume Nikki.

name: Neurocracy 2.049
summary: Solve a murder by diving in the Wikipedia of the future

name: Newer Mario Kart Wii
summary: A new mario kart wii mod which expands on the original and adds more! Features include 200cc, custom items and MORE! Giving the game a Newer coat of paint!!!

name: Need For Speed Pro Street Pepega Edition
summary:
The Ultimate Meme Mod is BACK!
The second installment of the Pepega Mod is finally here, taking you straight into the renewed legal street racing scene of ProStreet!
Black Box’s underappreciated gem from 2007 has been given a complete overhaul featuring an entirely new story with live action cutscenes, over 80 new cars from various regions and eras, new gameplay mechanics and much more!

name: New Years Eve Slaughter 2022
summary: This wad contains 5 short slaughter-ish maps (plus 1 bookend map) that are all fairly difficult.

name: Newtonica
summary: Newtonica is an action game where players must catch meteors by dragging and flicking a pink and purple colored sphere. The meteor's colored shadow can be seen as it approaches the sphere - simply rotate the sphere so that the correct color matches up when it lands.

name: Neural Nexus
summary: Neural Link Corporation developed a powerful AI that unexpectedly went rogue. As an employee, you must destroy the servers storing the AI's network model to mitigate the damage and uncover the reasons behind the AI's loss of control.

name: New Yankee: Mary's Dark Side
summary: The bond between John and Mary is unbreakable. They embark on adventures together, and always support each other. But their lives take an unexpected turn when Mary's memory is lost. Join John in an epic quest to restore Mary's memories now!

name: NeoCars
summary: Original and immersive cyberpunk driving game. Use your drifts to make your lines deadly for your opponents. Solo, local cooperative and online multiplayer modes. Play on a team with players of the same or different colors. Immersive soundtrack. Unique and stimulating gaming experience.

name: Neo Junk City
summary: Dive into Neo Junk City, a cyberpunk adventure where you’re an android detective unraveling your own murky past. Navigate neon streets, engage with unique characters, and race through the rain-soaked city. Uncover secrets in this twist on point-and-click gameplay.

name: New Star GP
summary: New Star GP is a fast and exciting arcade motorsport game with crisp retro visuals. Play career mode and work your way through decades of racing while upgrading your car and your support team... or chase high scores in championship mode on your own or in split-screen with up to three friends!

name: Neon Little Soul
summary: Neon Little Soul is a frenetic and fun action platformer game, a little gem of minimalist pixel art, retro style and arcade spirit.

name: Neon Runner
summary: Test yourself on the neon lit tracks of Neon Runner. A fast paced runner style game that requires speed and precision to complete all levels as quickly as possible and set a high score.

name: Nestor the Nesting Bird
summary:
Keep Nestor the Nesting Bird laying eggs on the highest nests of the tree. Use your aiming skills to shoot an egg into the nest, let it hatch, and have a new Nestor bird try for the next nest! Don't let those pesky bugs and the unpredictable wind break your egg!

Test your precision and timing in two fun game modes and challenge your friends to reach the highest branch. Keep collecting coins and unlock different types of funny eggs!

name: Neoclip
summary: An arcade-like explorative experience about revealing unique De Stijl inspired compositions. Navigate a complicated labyrinth of evolving levels using the shadows of the walls to highlight the obscured regions.

name: Nexus
summary: Nexus is a third person MOBA play-to-earn shooter. Craft a wide variety of weapons, abilities and equipment to build your own custom character. Defend your NEXUS at all costs and ruthlessly destroy your enemies in fast paced 5v5 MOBA action built on Unreal Engine 5. Equip abilities in your loadout and swap between them to adapt to your opponents and your team’s needs. This is a tournament game which will have ZERO pay-to-win elements.

name: New Leaf
summary:
A man alone in the woods, all he wanted was peace, but he caught attention of a deadly creature.

Will you survive to see the reason behind all the chaos or be swallowed by the thing manipulating the entire forest?

name: Nethernovel
summary: Fully remastered for 2018, experience the critically acclaimed game that has delighted audiences for generations.

name: Neon City of Desires
summary: The world is becoming more and more modern, but mental problems remain with humanity. Immerse yourself in this world with the main characters and find out what fate will befall them. Is this really the city of dreams?

name: Neko-sama no Kominka kara no Dasshutsu
New English Training: Learning with Tempo - Advanced Edition
New English Training: Learning with Tempo - Beginners Edition
Nectar Wars
summary:
When the kingdom of the Bees becomes consumed with greed, they declare war in their search for the all-powerful Nectar. Led by their Queen, Beeatrix, the bee army has forged alliances across the globe to expand their reign of terror. It is up to the elemental guardians, five hummingbird sisters, to fend off this attack and restore balance to the land.

An explosive Shoot ‘Em Up like no other, Nectar focuses on five hummingbird sisters, each with their own playstyle. Defeat powerful bosses, unlock new cosmetics, compete in online leaderboards, and save the world in this globe-trotting adventure!

name: Newdoom Community Project
summary: Newdoom Community Project (aka NDCP) is a 2006 megawad that contains 32 new levels, made by members of the Newdoom community. It was one of the winners of Doomworld's Cacowards in 2006, and was followed by a sequel, NewDoom Community Project II, in 2009.

name: NewDoom Community Project II
summary: NewDoom Community Project II (aka NDCP2) is a 2009 megawad that contains 32 new levels, made by members of the NewDoom community. It is a sequel to Newdoom Community Project, which was released in 2006.

name: Neopets: The Altador Plot
summary: The Altador Plot introduced to the main Neopets game the lost city of Altador. After its resurgence, none of the residents could remember about Altadorian history or why they kept hidden from Neopia. This plot serves as a prequel story to the PS2 game Neopets: The Darkest Faerie.

name: Nevryon
summary: Nevryon is a side-scrolling space shooter. At the end of every level the player fights a boss.

name: Neko Odyssey
summary: Here’s a slightly unusual Casual Adventure game where the main gameplay centers around taking pictures of cats. The pixel art graphics in a 3D setting create a charming atmosphere reminiscent of Japanese animation.

name: Nensha
summary:
Nensha is a mostly run-and-gun style loop through a grimy, demonic techbase, made in boom format (complevel 9). I've never been big on making techbases, but I had fun exploring some ideas with this one. Fingers crossed that it's bug-free and some kind of entertaining!

In terms of difficulty, I tried to aim for that Plutonia/Scythe/Valiant range (with varying degrees of success). It's not a complete pushover, but not overly punishing.

Hurt Me Plenty was what the map was built for (""intended experience""). It has some kick to it here and there, but most players shouldn't feel too out of their element. Ultra-Violence is just HMP with a few extra cheeky monsters/encounters, intended to catch the player off guard a bit more.
HNTR is now Hunted! Taking inspiration from Mutabor's "Onslaught!", this is an alternate version of the map for anyone who prefers their Doom extra spicy. Gets into slaughter territory, and I probably wouldn't recommend it as a first impression.

name: Neural Construct
summary: Neural Construct is a free, online, educational and a chaotic party game in which you design and construct your own neural network to compete with other players and score points. Quickly adapt and overcome any obstacle to win.

name: NecroAttack!
summary: The army of the undead is attacking!!! The fate of the kingdom is at stake! Faced with the tide of undead, the young princess decided to step forward and lead the people to confront the enemy, explore unknown places... perhaps even uncover the mystery behind the disaster?

name: Newspaper Toss: Paperboy Edition
summary:
In Newspaper Toss you need to throw newspapers filled with dynamite into houses and windows to cause explosive fun. Break all the windows and create combos, collect coins or avoid the obstacles. Several game styles to play and over 100 objectives to complete. You can then use your accumulated coins to upgrade your bike or obtain special items to use in the game.

The game features a huge map with additional options to collect even more coins! And lookout for further expansions of the map in future game updates. And for an extra challenge try to collect all stars in every level.

name: Network Q RAC Rally
summary: A rally game for DOS published by Europress as part of the Rally Championship series.

name: Never Ending Nightmare
summary: Life has been tough for you after the tragic incident with your parents. Your way of coping has been through reliving all the good memories with them, but all the memories had a dark turn this time... will you be able to figure out why?

name: Next Move
summary: Next Move is a VR platformer where all movement corresponds to the player's movement. Your ability to run, jump and climb will be put to the test on a journey into dreamy worlds filled with fantastic architecture. But to succeed, you must also fight off enemies and eventually even manipulate time.

name: NERF Legends: Elite Blaster Combo Pack
Neeko: Your 3D Interactive Monster
summary:
Have you ever wanted to own a monster? This is your chance.
Meet Neeko, the cutest and friendliest little monster. Tap and tickle him, make him laugh and help him on his mission to get rid of pesky bugs. If you succeed, you'll also get to know his friends - Meeko, Peeko, Jeeko, Teeko, and Chreesmo.
Neeko is a curious creature. Short-legged, large-eyed, with rubbery hair—and impossibly cute. He likes to dance, play and have fun all day long.
But he faces a challenge that only you can help him with. Annoying and irritating bugs came to Neeko's town and he's not happy about it. He needs your curiosity and fast fingers to help him get rid of all the troublemakers. When you catch enough bugs, you can play a color-matching mini-game, earn coins and unlock four of his cute monster friends: Meeko, Peeko, Jeeko, Teeko, and Chreesmo. Each of them has its own behavior, laughter, sounds and difficulty.
Neeko was designed specially for kids—with much attention going to details, colors, sounds and monster personas. This is a perfect app for your toddler or a preschooler.
However, the game is suitable for all skill levels and ages. Gradual learning curve will take you from a beginner to a master at your own pace. Built-in tutorials will help you get to know Neeko and teach you how to interact with him.
No matter what your age, you'll find hours of fun with this amazing 3D game.

name: Nemesis
summary: The North American version of Nemesis features a considerably increased difficulty compared to the Japanese and European version. To balance this, the game spawns a fleet of orange enemies when the player loses a life to provide as many power-up capsules as possible to recover as many upgrades as possible. Also the North American version presents a continue feature (but only for three times). The title screen was also updated, showing an in-game reproduction of the promotional artwork behind the logo.

name: Nemesis
summary: This version changed similar to the Famicom version but adds its slew of exclusive content to make up for the downgrade. A new stage, the bone planet was added between the Inverted Volcano stage and the Antennoid stage, featuring exclusive enemy types. There also four hidden warp zones and the ability to play as the titular ship from TwinBee if the MSX version of that game is played alongside Nemesis.

name: Nemesis: The Final Challenge
summary:
Amstrad CPC port of Gradius.

You are the last hope of the gentle people of Gradius. You've just lifted off to confront the all-out attack of the amoeboid Bacterions. Your hyper-space fighter is armed with the greatest arsenal in the galaxy. Air-to-surface and double beam laser cannons for incredible firepower. Powerful force fields for protection. Time and space warps for fleeing the dimension. You'll need it all just to survive. Because at the heart of the Bacterion Empire lies the Xaerous Superfortress - the nerve center of the all-knowing, all-seeing Bacterion Bio-Computer. It's a duel to the death, while the entire galaxy watches, waits, and hopes!

name: Nemesis: The Final Challenge
summary: ZX Spectrum port of Gradius.

name: Neo Mario Galaxy
summary: Neo Mario Galaxy is an unofficial modification of Super Mario Galaxy 2.

name: Never
summary: NEVER uses mostly vanilla assets to create an atmosphere that I think you'll find unique and oppressive (but in a fun way). There is some old-school DEHACKED nonsense to keep it fresh.

name: New World
summary: “New World” is a new survival game. Explore the world. Create your own weapons and tools. Build your own house and protect yourself from the dangers that could happen.

name: Nether Spirits: Beyond the Gate
summary: Mend your shattered soul in Nether Spirits, a tactical roguelike deckbuilder set in a dark, fantastical afterlife corrupted by sin. Choose from seven distinct classes, explore a vast world, and fight your way to salvation - alone, with friends, or in real-time PvP!

name: Nellie's Nonograms
summary: A collection of nonograms made by friends and fans of the vtuber NellieAndGrits!

name: Nemo is going to School
summary: Our main character, Nemo, goes to school. He goes up and up, which is 351m above the sky. There's nothing else to do if you fall. Just to not be late, he have to go up without a break! There are dangerous things above. You have to hold back even if you're angry. Now, head to school!

name: New York Nights 2: Friends For Life
summary: New York Nights 2: Friends For Life is an interaction-based action-adventure video game developed by Gameloft New York and published by Gameloft. It was released for button-operated mobile phones and Android and iOS devices in 2008. It is the sequel to New York Nights: Success in the City.

name: Need for Speed: Hot Pursuit
summary: Feel as a driver to be chased by a racer driving a cool car with tuning or feel the excitement of the stalker! In this new part of the super-race, you can start a career of a street racer and a policeman! Challenge the law behind the wheel of supercars of Pagani Zonda Cinque class or stop the drivers in such high-speed police interceptors as Lamborghini Gallardo LP 560-4 Spyder! Get all the achievements and awards in the saturated with adrenalin 24-hour chases and harassments!

name: New Arc Line
summary: Take a stand in the eternal conflict between Arcane Magic and Steampunk Revolution and tip the uneasy balance between sorcery, elves, dwarves and mysterious monsters on one side and steampunk gadgets, zeppelins, and tesla guns on the other in this single-player, party-based, story-rich RPG.

name: Neo Dance
summary: Discover Neo Dance, the exciting 4-point music game! Immerse yourself in a dystopian cyberpunk world and face, to the rhythm of music, hundreds of robots in this unique experience. Are you ready for the rhythmic battle?

name: Nextbots In The Backrooms
summary: They only look ridiculous at first glance, but they're not! Run. Don't stop, don't try to hide, just run!

name: Necroslayer
summary: Necroslayer is a dark fantasy styled, open world roguelite game. Play as one of several characters unlocked through the story, in first person action combat, with meta progression to improve stats and survivability each play through.

name: Net Defender
summary: Net Defender, a VR game where you play as a goalkeeper. With realistic physics, graphics, and immersive sound, experience the thrill of being on the pitch and improve your reflexes while having fun

name: Neo Sonic: God Speed 2
summary: 2005, the year Neo Sonic: God Speed 2 was released on Windows. Made and self published by Manic Team, this action game is available for free.

name: Neo Sonic 3
summary: Published in 2003, Neo Sonic 3 (aka Neo-Sonic 3: Revelations, Neo-Sonic 3: Armageddon) was an above-average platform title in its time.

name: Neo Sonic 2
summary: 2000, the year Neo Sonic 2 was released on Windows. Made and self published by Manic Team, this action game is available for free.

name: New World: Rise of the Angry Earth
summary: A new threat looms over once-familiar lands. Wield a new weapon, new ability, and new allies in the form of rideable mounts to fight a growing menace that threatens to consume all of Aeternum!

name: New Ganymede
summary: New Ganymede: an upcoming free-to-play open world indie sci-fi fantasy MMOARPG extravaganza where you can run, glide, shoot, slash, dash, roll and generally panic your way through co-op PVE with friends in a beautiful narrative driven world developed by an Australia-based team.

name: Nekketsu Monogatari Advance
summary: This is an obscure fan-made game demo made by "someone" in Japan.

name: Neurotypical
summary: You wake up as a teenager named Neo in a strange place, apparently in someones mind, and they want your help?! Collect items, fight enemies, and try not to get yourself annihilated! But always remember, nothing in this game is as "typical" as it seems.

name: NeverRage
summary: NeverRage is a third-person online role-playing game, with action & tab-targeting combat that combines theme-park and open-world experiences.

name: Neon Marble Rust
summary: Play as one of 3 Houses: Neon, Marble, or Rust! Each faction is completely unique: buildings, units, even resources are unique to each House. A two-state rollback system ensures smooth online gameplay, while a mix of challenging mechanics and automation allow you to play (and win) how you want!

name: Nectar
summary: Use nectar to restore the world and its natural beauty. Traverse a desolate post-apocalyptic landscape and bring vibrant color to the environment. Solve puzzles, grow platforms, and explore a forgotten world.

name: Neko: Insufficient FirePower
summary: Neko Insufficient Firepower is a meat pigeon 2D tablet shooting game, a cat-themed game made in a hand-drawn comic style. Quickly defeat the enemies with the cute cat!

name: Neighbours: The Adventure
summary: In this game the player takes the role of a detective trying to compile enough evidence to get Paul Robinson arrested. The game is set in Ramsey Street where the Australian soap opera of the same name is set.

name: Netto de Para
summary: A port of Nekopara: Nekosogi Paradise that removes sexual content. Released in Japan for Dreamcast and in Korea for PC.

name: NeonPowerUp!
summary: Save a city overrun by robots. Save a dystopian futuristic city overrun by mad robots

name: Neon Fantasy: Cats
summary: Neon Fantasy: Cats is the perfect puzzle game for a fun and rewarding pastime. Collect pictures, develop your attention, and feel like a part of the beautiful neon world.

name: Newcastle United Club Football 2005
summary: The follow-up edition to Codemasters' multi-title soccer franchise (each dedicated to a single team in the UK and continental European football league and featuring unique presentation and other team-specific aspects), the 2005 series is powered by an accelerated game engine and new animation system to deliver faster and more responsive gameplay for precise control on the pitch. With twice the amount of official team content in each game, great skill moves and new game modes including Career, Practice and classic Scenarios (plus new clubs added to the line-up), the new Club Football 2005 range will bring players even closer to the heart of the action and the heart of their team.

name: New Super Mario World: The Seven Crystals of Peace
Nerf N-Strike: Double Blast Bundle
summary: Electronic Arts and Hasbro's joint NERF N-Strike franchise for Wii, blends arcade style video game rail shooter action with classic NERF toy play that together are addictively fun for players of all ages. The NERF N-Strike Double Blast Bundle is the ultimate example to-date of why both video game and toy players can't get enough of Wii-based NERF N-Strike experience. Providing hours of adrenaline-charged NERF-style gameplay and fun, including multiplayer support, the bundle contains both video games NERF N-Strike and NERF N-Strike Elite on a single disc, as well as a Switch Shot Ex 3 blaster with Red Reveal decoder lens and launchable NERF darts.

name: New Unou Kids Wii
summary: New Unou Kids Wii is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by IE Institute, which was released in Japan in 2008.

name: New Dungeons
summary: A very big map for Heretic with plenty of monsters that can give you some challenge.

name: Netflix Stories: Love Is Blind
summary:
A new season of "Love Is Blind" is in flight! It's your turn to find love, romance and drama in the pods. Customize your character, choose your story and take a shot at true love in this interactive story game based on the hit series.

You're the newest contestant on "Love Is Blind." Try the social experiment for yourself and date several mystery suitors in pursuit of true love. Choose your story and decide: Is love really blind?

Customize your character before you step into the famous "Love Is Blind" pods on your journey toward love and romance. Choose your outfit, makeup, hair style and more!

From your first "Love Is Blind" date to a romantic engagement, your love story depends on your choices in this interactive story game. Will you choose to meet as many love interests as possible? Or will you spend your time building deeper connections on dates and turn up the romance?

Just like in "Love Is Blind" the show, the journey to love in this interactive game will have plenty of dramatic twists and turns. Will you help people get together? Or sabotage a relationship in the name of true love? Influence the decisions of your castmates through your choices, and watch the juicy drama unfold.

name: Near Fantasy Space
summary: Fantasy Zone fangame.

name: Neon Dash Tales
summary: Neon Dash Tales is a puzzle-game where every move is a dance of survival ! Craft your sanctuary amidst the neon chaos to outsmart relentless foes.

name: Network Adventure Bugsite: Beta
summary: Network Adventure Bugsite is a monster training Game Boy Color game exclusive to Japan. It was released in two versions, Alpha and Beta. It is an RPG where players enter a virtual world known as Bugsite which is filled with "Bugs". Bugs act as virtual pets and can be used to battle other players.

name: Neon Nirvana
summary: Become a supercharged comet in a retro universe inspired by the '80s! Find the black hole, devour asteroids, and escape destruction in "Neon Nirvana".

name: Nested Lands
summary: A ruthless settlement-survival RPG in a post-plague medieval world full of cruelty and despair. Gather survivors, build a settlement, craft, master your skills, survive, and endure alone or in online co-op.

name: Neuralgia
summary: Assume the role of Blake Jensen, the CEO of Creative Edge, a renowned company known for its groundbreaking innovations. You unknowingly stumble upon a sinister plot of revenge. Jeffrey Howes, a former employee you sacked, nurses a deep-seated grudge against you.

name: Neon City Climbing Simulator
summary: Climb tall buildings with Neon City Climbing Simulator! Prepare for an adrenaline-filled adventure with excitement, realistic graphics, and challenging missions.

name: Neil The Nail
summary: Neil the Nail is a point and click puzzle game where you play as 2 unique characters trying to escape their fate - Neil the Nail, and Mr. Magnet.

name: Necrobrood
summary: Necrobrood is a three map pack with new monsters, textures and skins. The theme follows on from Permutations of the Rotten with a very dark and morbid metal style using grotty brownish modified ID textures.

name: New Roanoke
summary: "New Roanoke" delivers an immersive narrative experience, blending elements of horror, suspense, and psychological thriller. Immerse yourself in a meticulously crafted sci-fi world, brought to life by stunning visuals, atmospheric soundscapes, and chillingly realistic character performances.

name: Neo Testament
summary: After our battle with AI, life as we knew it ended thousands of years ago. 5000 years have passed. I awoke from my sleep. My robotic body and "soul," I, "Marcus," set out to find the last organic matter for the future of humanity in a world controlled by AI. Follow my quest for salvation.

name: Neon Fantasy: Dogs
summary: Neon Fantasy: Dogs is the perfect puzzle game for a fun and rewarding pastime. Collect pictures, develop your attention, and feel like a part of the beautiful neon world.

name: Nephilim
summary: "Nephilim" is a single-player social deduction game to reveal the heretics who have infiltrated the congregations. Throw down God's judgment on the fools who rebel against the omniscient machine god "La Place".

name: Network Unreachable
summary: Smallish industrial/base map using socktech textures. It comes with two new sound effects. The map source is included.

name: Necromanicide
summary: A nicely made egyptian remix of Quake's e1m3 - The Necropolis.

name: Need for Speed Unbound: Vol.5 Customs Pack
summary: Pack your Garage with 3 new, exclusive Custom Builds: Chevrolet Corvette Grand Sport (2017), BMW i8 Coupé (2018), & Mercedes-AMG C 63 Coupe (2018).

name: Need for Speed Unbound: Trick or Street Swag Pack
summary: Make an entrance with the new Trick or Street Swag Pack, containing a one-off Legendary Custom clothing pack inspired by the golden age of American animation, a Skeleton Head mask, a driving effect, & more.

name: Need for Speed Unbound: Volkswagen Beetle (1963) - Legendary Custom Pack
summary: Be notorious & show people why you're at the top of the scene in the Legendary Custom Volkswagen Beetle (1963). Alongside the ride, enjoy a 10-level Speed Pass boost.

name: Neutron Base: The Arrival
summary: This level is a continuation of Unaided mission. Just before Duke destroyed those alien bastards launch facility he discovered a secret launchbay. He soon understood that the bosses had their own way of escaping Duke. Now he followed in their footsteps and decided to find their base!

name: Neon Genesis Evangelion: Girlfriend of Steel - Special Edition
summary:
Neon Genesis Evangelion: Girlfriend of Steel, also known as Neon Genesis Evangelion: Iron Maiden, is a video game based on the Gainax anime/manga series Neon Genesis Evangelion.

The PS2 and PSP edition adds new scenarios, gallery and replay mode and an auto-save function.

name: Need for Spirit Drink & Drive Simulator
Neppachi: 10-renchan de Las Vegas Ryokou
summary: Neppachi: 10 Ren Chande Las Vegas Ryokou is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Falcon and published by Daikoku, which was released in Japan in 1999.

name: New Leaf Traveler and Youth's Memories
summary: New Leaf Traveler and Youth's Memories "is a short story RPG that involves playing the role of a young owner of a forest tavern and trying to run your own business to repay your debts. Meeting various guests and understanding their stories...

name: Nerd Survivors
summary: Use explosive pizzas, enchanted fidget spinners or a katamari of monsters to fight countless enemies hordes! Repair the "Forge of Destiny" and craft the ultimate custom weapon in this comedy action rogue-lite survivor.

name: Nevasca
summary: Nevasca is an episode-format wad for zdoom source port, focusing on snow themes among with some ruins, hellish or techbase variants.

name: Never Alone
summary:
It is a night like any other night. get home late. roam your house. But are you really all alone?

Play my 1st game and defend your home against what may or may not be lurking in the shadows.

name: Nebel Geisterjäger: The First Lamb
summary: An NTRPG from a male POV. Use tools like heart monitoring and surveillance to shield your girlfriend, Kana, from her scheming boss. With 5 endings and choices shaping interactions, can you keep her safe? Amidst exorcism, intrigue, and personal choices, protect your bond and confront inner desires.

name: Nexa Tech Laboratory
summary: Mysterious game: puzzles, secrets, and merging technology.

name: Nestlé: The Lion King
summary: Nestlé: The Lion King was a promotional browser game based on the 2019 reboot of The Lion King created as a part of Nestlé's promotion around the movie. The game is a collection of puzzles based around the movie.

name: Nex Credo
summary: Nex Credo is 11 levels of an aborted megaWAD for vanilla

name: Nekowater
summary: You are a cat. You live in a place where small houses line the area as sea levels rise. You wake up and sleep when you like, and eat what you like.You spend your days like that."Nekowater" is an adventure game where you explore the map, interact with characters, and progress through the game.

name: Nested
summary: Explore a world through subdirectories.

name: Never Trust a Zone Warden
summary: 5-10 minutes of vibes and violence, give or take.

name: Necromorphosis
summary: In this unliving hell, become the bullet heaven. Gather the bones of fallen foes and morph into the ultimate skeleton to claim your throne of skulls as King of the Undead, if you can survive the Necromorphosis.

name: NewCity
summary: A Cyberpunk inspired city with a selection of unique buildings ready for exploration.

name: Neon Fantasy: Monkeys
summary: Neon Fantasy: Monkeys is the perfect puzzle game for a fun and rewarding pastime. Collect pictures, develop your attention, and feel like a part of the beautiful neon world.

name: New Zombie
summary: Military agent Harvey Heller, having received orders, flies with his team to protect a group of scientists who are to create a vaccine. But halfway to his goal he finds himself in a small town where he saves a little girl. From this moment begins his long and not easy journey.

name: Never Down: Only Up
summary:
In this addictive game you have to climb up by jumping and pushing off the floor. You need to be fast and agile to get to the top. The game offers many levels of varying difficulty that will allow you to upgrade your skills and become a real climbing master. In addition, the game has beautiful graphics and sound that will immerse you in the exciting world of the game.

In this game you will test your climbing skills. You must jump and push off the floor to get to the top. The game offers many levels of varying difficulty that will allow you to upgrade your skills and become a real climbing master.

You will experience a real adrenaline rush as you climb walls and jump from one platform to another. The game offers many unique tasks and levels of varying difficulty that will make you feel like a real hero.

Enjoy addictive gameplay and become the best climber! Don't miss the opportunity to experience real adrenaline and become a real climbing master!

name: New Zealand Jigsaw Puzzles
summary: Explore New Zealand's stunning landscapes in a captivating jigsaw puzzle adventure. Unravel the beauty piece by piece!

name: New America
summary: Solo or multiplayer, capture control points on an alien planet. Choose the number of enemies you face and enjoy sweet conquest.

name: Necrodepths
summary: A Dark Fantasy 2.5D Action RPG with a heavy dark atmospheric aesthetic inspired by the once greats. Character customization reminiscent of open world RPGs. Unique races and classes. An endless random, but meaningful, generation of enemies and dungeons, for everlasting Hack n' Slash gameplay.

name: Nephenthesys
summary: Blast off on a treacherous mission to recover an unidentified energy source amidst an alien onslaught! Nephenthesys is a vertical scrolling shoot’em up presented in widescreen top-down 3D style.

name: Newgothic Movement 2
summary: Newgothic Movement 2 (also known as New Gothic Movement II) is a seventeen-map Doom II megawad for Boom-compatible source ports by Christopher Shepherd (ArmouredBlood) and Arthur O. (Archi). It is a sequel to 2010's Newgothic Movement 1 and features a similar slaughter map style of gameplay.

name: New Earth
summary: This visual novel contains a lot of sexual scenes. There are many routes. You can have a happy ending (Harem Ending), a neutral ending (Sharing Ending) or a sad ending (Netorare Ending) depending on how you play. As for BDSM & Pregnancy, these kinks are also avoidable like NTR (Netorare).

name: Neon Fuga
summary: The spaceship pulls into a kaleidoscope of bizarre and dangerous worlds full of aggressive creatures. Will it be possible to break through the waves of enemies, and return back to the familiar space?

name: Nexus Defenders
summary: Tower Defense meets a Visual Novel narrative. Place an arsenal of towers to halt the invading enemy. Use special abilities such as napalm strikes, EMP blasts, and orbital lasers. A sci-fi space drama, filled with dialogue choices.

name: Nexus Code
summary: A suspense adventure visual novel.

name: Negima! Magister Negi Magi: Kagai Jugyou - Otome no Doki-doki Beachside
summary: This extracurricular lesson from Negima universe takes place in a paradise resort and is a side-story from Negima series based on the manga with the same title.

name: Negima!? Chou Mahora Taisen Chuu: Check-iin Zenin Shuugou! Yappari Onsen Kichaimashitaa
summary: A Nintendo DS game based on the anime series Negima

name: Negima!? Magister Negi Magi: Dream Tactic Yumemiru Otome Princess
summary: A turn-based strategy game based on the Negima anime & manga series.

name: Netflix Stories: Money Heist
summary: Join the heist that started it all in Netflix Stories: Money Heist. Enter La Perla Museo de Barcelona alongside the Money Heist crew, but tread carefully! Your choices will determine the success of the Professor’s perfect plan.

name: Netflix Stories: Virgin River
summary: Netflix Stories: Virgin River is a interactive narrative game that was announced in August 2023 along with Netflix Stories: Love is Blind and Netflix Stories: Money Heist from the developer Boss Fight Entertainment exclusively for the Netflix Games service.

name: Nezumi Man
summary:
Nezumi Man is a homage to/parody of the classic NES Mega Man games, starring a rat who can run, slide, jump and shoot like the Blue Bomber himself. His goal is to stop the plans of Dr. Gyoniku and his henchmen, along with seven other rat and ratlike characters.

The game was an entrant in the 2009 HSP Program Contest. It is notable for its humorous characters and situations.

name: Ned Flanders Kills the Simpsons!
summary: Must...Kill...Best...Friend! It was bound to happen. Somewhere deep inside everyone's favorite neighbor-ino, a darkness has bubbled to the surface, and now Ned Flanders is on a killing spree! Hey, they warned me that Satan would be seductive!

name: New Zealand Jigsaw Puzzles: Expansion Pack 1
summary: Explore New Zealand's beauty with "New Zealand Jigsaw Puzzles - Expansion Pack 1." More captivating puzzles to enjoy!

name: New Zealand Jigsaw Puzzles: Expansion Pack 2
summary: Explore New Zealand's beauty with "New Zealand Jigsaw Puzzles - Expansion Pack 2." More captivating puzzles to enjoy!

name: New Zealand Jigsaw Puzzles: Expansion Pack 3
summary: Explore New Zealand's beauty with "New Zealand Jigsaw Puzzles - Expansion Pack 3." More captivating puzzles to enjoy!

name: Netdreams Sudoku
summary: Netdreams Sudoku ist das klassische Sudoku-Spiel, das viele Stunden lang an verschiedenen Schwierigkeitsgraden teilnimmt. Als Chef, der ein Experte ist, ist Netdreams Sudoku das perfekte Spiel für alle Spieler.

name: Net-tac-toe
summary: Online tic-tac-toe for Playdate!

name: Neon Clash: Echoes of the Lost
summary: Young members of the Mafia fight, rebel, and entrust their hopes to their friends to fight corruption, confront evil, and challenge fate.

name: Nettai Teikiatsu Shoujo
summary: Nettai Teikiatsu Shoujo is an visual novel, developed and published by Oaks Soft, which was released in Japan in 2008.

name: Next Floor
summary: Next Floor is a score attack, fast-paced, difficult, gory fps, with a simple objective, reach the highest floor you can. Take all your stress out on enemies and make the most creative kills to get as many points as possible, however, higher the floor, more difficult it will be. How far can you go?

name: Never be Afraid: Slam Dunk!
summary: Never be afraid to Slam Dunk!

name: New Life of Aged Town
summary: Be the mayor of this super aging town and fulfill the wishes of the old people.

name: Necrophoresis
summary: Necrophoresis is a co-op horror game for 1-4 players. Explore a haunted morgue to find its dark secrets. Use what you can find to make your way through the morgue and find your way out.

name: Newcomer: Intermediate Immersion
summary: A fantasy language learning adventure for intermediate language learners. Practice and improve your ability to speak in your target language to save the the kingdom and befriend its people!

name: Neon River
summary: Long distances into future there is nothing left to have but one thing: fun. Endless battles in endlessly generated worlds is the only thing you will find in this arcade-inspired rouguelike action bullet hell. Fight your way through, live as much as you can or just have fun, die and restart.

name: Neon Heights
summary: In this 3D precision platformer jump and climb your way thorough various obstacles while trying to reach the top of the level. Be sure to use all the tools and skills you gain along the way to help aid you in reaching the goal at the end of the level. One misstep and you'll fall back to the bottom.

name: Neoathlon
summary: A sci-fi racing title aimed at being a highly polished and fun experience for players and spectators alike. Neoathlon utilizes style and substance with its custom physics mechanics to make the most robust and enjoyable hover racing experience possible.

name: Neon Fantasy: Predators
summary: Neon Fantasy: Predators is the perfect puzzle game for a fun and rewarding pastime. Collect pictures, develop your attention, and feel like a part of the beautiful neon world.

name: Neuro Hacker
summary: "Neuro Hacker" is a VR game that combines escape room and detective puzzle elements.You will play as a "detective" skilled in hacking into people's minds and solving complex cases. You are about to enter the brain of a survivor of a plane crash, and uncover the dark truth behind the case.

name: Neon Goddess
summary: Explore a cyberpunk world filled with cosmic horrors as Astrid, a mercenary, confronts the moral dilemmas of this dystopian reality. Your choices shape the destiny in this retro 3D horror game.

name: Nexus Travelers: Hero of Elocea
summary: Travel to another world and save it! Will you be able to win the favor of the princess and her people and get some well-deserved 'rewards'? Visual Novel with quests, turn-based combat and animated, interactive scenes.

name: Neon Geometry Dash
summary: Rhythm-based action game with challenging levels and awesome music.

name: Neptunia Game Maker R:Evolution - Day One Edition
Neon Odyssey
summary: Players will solve complex mazes, interact with intense arcade action, and rescue Dr. Harris aboard an AI controlled space station.

name: Neko Atsume Purrfect
summary: Neko Atsume Purrfect is a cat collecting VR game. Players will be able to collect and interact with VR cats from petting, playing, and more in augmented reality.

name: Newly Wed AV Debut - Cuckoldry Honeymoon-
summary:
Shion was the beautiful, tidy bride of a happy protagonist.
But on their honeymoon, she got plucked from his embrace in more ways than one!
In an instant, she fell from loving pure wife to filthy porn slut.

name: Newly-wedded Woman Stealing Life
summary:
Yukino has a boyfriend named Makoto whom she promised to marry.
However, Makoto is a man from a good family and they refuse the marriage with Yukino.
Then, Makoto's uncle, Masao, comes up with a deal. He would arrange things to make the marriage possible if Yukino agreed to spend a night with him.
Yukino hesitantly accepts the condition.
However, it's the beginning of a devastating life...

name: Neon Life
summary: [Neon Life] is Aoki Studio's first self-developed 3D project, an anime cyberpunk-style open-city role-playing game.

name: Neverending Light
summary: A guided tour goes horribly wrong when monsters eat everyone!

name: NeoDuel: Backpack Monsters
summary: NeoDuel: Backpack Monsters is a PvP inventory auto-battler with a monster-trainer twist! Collect Cosmions and items, and strategically manage your backpack to create unbeatable combos in tactical duels. Rise through the leagues to become the ultimate Cosmion master!

name: Neongarten
summary: Neongarten is a minimalist cyberpunk city builder where you build from the ground up! Find synergies between buildings to maximize taxes, pit mega-corps against illegal hackers, and place toxic waste dumps over coffee shops. Chill out to lo-fi tunes while your city block grows one cube at a time.

name: News Reacts: Special Operation 1
summary: One more mission,

name: Neural Parasite
summary: Experimental survival horror game where every action is controlled by your mouse.

name: New Vegas Bounties I
summary:
New Vegas Bounties I is the first chapter in a series set in the Mojave Wasteland of Fallout: New Vegas. The player is tasked with finding and eliminating the region's most nefarious outlaws, killers, and thieves. Along the way, the player will encounter a collection of unique, fully voiced characters, including the gregarious Steven Randall.

The player can also expect violent confrontations, numerous cultural references, and an abundance of colorful dialogue. New Vegas Bounties also includes a narrative that unfolds as the player completes more missions, culminating in a climactic showdown with a shadowy nemesis.

name: New Vegas Bounties II
summary:
New Vegas Bounties II is the second installment in my bounty hunting series, and picks up immediately after the uncertain ending of New Vegas Bounties I.

Deprived of the sponsorship of Randall & Associates, the player must now assert himself (or herself) as a solo contractor for the NCR. As such, the player can now pursue bounties in any order, and is not obligated to follow a linear questline.

Gunfighters, thieves, rapists, and traitors are among the quarries available to an enterprising bounty hunter. However, the player can also expect a new bevy of ambushers and assassins bent on reckoning with the player for past deeds.

With Marko still at large, the player will be compelled to track down former associates and relatives of the nefarious renegade. In doing so, he/she will ultimately find himself/herself in a rugged world space outside the Mojave, face to face with his/her most dangerous target yet.

name: New Vegas Killer
summary: New Vegas Killer features a zany, compact questline that is geared towards players with bad karma. Specifically, it offers a questline based on the premise that the player has joined Judge Richter at the conclusion of New Vegas Bounties I. It is not an official addition to my quest mod series, but is merely the equivalent of a What If? spinoff.

name: New Vegas Bounties III
summary:
With the Mojave Wasteland purged of its most dangerous elements, the Courier is soon contacted by a mysterious figure, setting in motion a chain of events that will challenge the player as never before.

Largely set in the snow-laden Deep Creek Mountains of Utah, New Vegas Bounties III pits the player against a range of new enemies, all while compelling him/her to work with new and familiar allies alike. The mod concludes with a legendary showdown between the player and the most dangerous man alive: Marko.

name: Neon Heist: Cyber Drive chase
summary:
Welcome to the world of "Neon Heist: Cyber Drive chase" - an exciting arcade race in the style of cyberpunk, where adrenaline and drift are combined with an endless chase from the police. In this exciting game you have to enter a dangerous race for freedom, on the sparkling streets of a neon city.

Get into the driver's seat of a racing car of the future, ready to do anything for the sake of escape. You will have to perform epic drift maneuvers, compete in races on the edge of possibilities, skillfully dodge police patrols and maneuver between obstacles that arise on the way.

With each race, your courage will be tested: the adrenaline chase will begin, where your virtuoso driving and drifting skills will be real tests. You are waiting for an arcade race in the style of cyberpunk, where you will be surrounded by bright neon lights and electronic music will raise the adrenaline to the limit.

The main goal is to escape as far as possible until the police overtake you. The chase will be continuous, and the game will last until your virtuoso driving fails you. Your score will grow with every meter of the way, and you will be able to exchange the points earned for new cars in the store. There is no limit to competitions and chases, and your skill will determine how far you can advance.

"Neon Heist: Cyber Drive chase" is a game that will give you adrenaline and tension, remaining in your memory as an exciting experience of arcade racing and skillful drift in the world of cyberpunk. Enter the race, dodge the cops and show your skills in this dynamic game that promises to never stop.

name: Neon Dan
summary: I built this in Scratch in Highscool during 2021 for my final project, and wanted my friends to be able to truly show off their love for it.

name: Nephew's Vendetta
summary: Embark on a relentless journey, vanquish powerful bosses, and wield incredible upgrades in this intense action-packed game. Do you have what it takes to conquer the shadows and emerge victorious?

name: New Immortal
summary: A text placement game with a cultivation theme, featuring 64 cultivation systems, 24 independent dungeons, multiple interactive modes, and various combat economy modes.

name: Negligee
summary: Manage a lingerie shop in this visual novel

name: Neon Drifter: Cyber Racing
summary: Speed through a Neon-drenched cyberpunk world: Dominate the streets and master the art of drifting in a futuristic showdown!

name: NetWalk
summary: NetWalk is a puzzle game developed and published by Gamos in 1996.

name: Neptunia: Sisters vs. Sisters - Day One Edition
summary:
The Day One Edition of Neptunia: Sisters vs. Sisters includes:
- The Game
- Reversible Cover Sleeve
- Set of 5 Post Cards
- Set of 4 Stickers
- B2 Cloth Poster
- Collector's Box

name: Neon Shift
summary: Neon Shift is a speedrun-focused, side-scrolling platformer with a twist! Run, jump and slide your way through both official and player-created levels as fast as possible, then shift into a phantom that can uncover new routes with a dash and chase yourself down to secure a spot on the leaderboard.

name: Neptunia: Sisters vs. Sisters - Limited Edition
summary:
The Limited Edition includes:
• Game (with reversible cover sleeve)
NOTE: For Steam version, game code will be sent via email (game key is for standard version of the game and does not include the Deluxe Edition)
• Steel Game Case
• "The Planeptower Archives" Hardcover Artbook
• Next-Gen Tunes Official Soundtrack
• Large Neptunia: Sisters VS Sisters Mousepad
• Collector's Box
• Exclusive Trading Card

name: Neogeo Pocket Color Selection Vol. 2: Steelbook Bundle
NeverDone
summary: NeverDone is a random room dungeon rogue-lite where a hero believes their journey is done. They defeated the Lich and located her last phylactery in the center of this dungeon. Alas, it was a trap and now the hero has to escape an ever expanding dungeon with the phylactery and withstand the lich’s minions.

name: Neon Intrusion
summary: Become the ultimate agent in a world blending medieval intrigue with high-tech infiltration. Steal valuable treasures, assassinate targets, uncover hidden secrets and master the shadows. Augment your body to improve stealth, traversal and combat characteristics to become the ultimate killing machine

name: Nebula Flow
summary: Nebula Flow is a music game where you follow the melodic trail charted by your dog across colorful pixel art landscapes. Stock up on notes to power your canine companion to the end of each song!

name: Neon Auto Party
summary: Build a party to auto-battle through waves of enemies in a futuristic fantasy setting. Each unit has its own deck of cards that determines their performance in battle. Find and buy items while leveling up units to take advantage of powerful synergies and reach the end of the dungeon!

name: Neboslav
summary: Neboslav is a relaxing roguelite action game. Using a jetpack, explore the procedurally generated, surreal world of floating islands. Defeat enemies and find epic upgrades! Win to reveal the strange history of the game world.

name: Net Yaroze: 2014 Collection

name: Neet Girl Rehabilitation Plan: Guutara-ko Saisei Kikaku
summary: No matter how many times I get rejected, I will continue supporting them... Until the day they find employment!

name: Near
summary:
Shiina is an aspiring manga artist.
He's been drawing for fun for a long time, but his efforts just wouldn't pay off.
Just as he was about to stop, he remembered he had a fan.
Near, a boy so beautiful he might as well not have been real.

name: Network Engineer Simulator
summary: In Network Engineer Simulator you are hired to do the unenviable job of cleaning up data closets. You will visit various locations from small closets to large data centers where you will need to untangle and organize these server racks and ensure various services are operational.

name: Necro Rumble
summary: Master the dark art of necromancy in a 2D top-down strategy game. Unleash and lead your undead legions to defeat and dominate enemy waves in this action-packed adventure.

name: Necrophosis
summary: Necrophosis is a first-person horror adventure that immerses you in a nightmarish-hellish world filled with bizarre forms and somber visuals. Explore eerie-surreal landscapes and unravel mysteries in this atmospheric journey through the macabre.

name: Neuronaut
summary: The protagonist of this story is an office clerk who has the ability to leave his body for the astral plane and put his consciousness into other people.

name: Neon Race
summary: In this car-racing game similar to Tron you'll drive a fast neon car and will have to crash into the red vehicles to destroy them. Avoid the purple ones and reach the goal in as little time as possible to unlock the next level and upgrade your car.

name: Neon Race 2
summary: Race at super speeds through futuristic landscapes. More speed, more upgrades, more unlocks, more TURBO!

name: Neko-Girl Play
summary: Sweet, half-naked, hot cat girls are waiting for your presence.

name: Neon Nova
summary: Dive into the adrenaline-fueled world of Neon Nova, a cutting-edge Neon Arena Ship Shooter! Experience intense arena battles, unlock customizable ships with vibrant neon skins, and dominate diverse game modes. Are you ready to be the master of the neon universe? Jump in now!

name: Nemesis Z
summary: Nemesis Z is an immersive FPS horror survival multiplayer game set in a post-apocalyptic world.

name: Never wake up
summary: psychological survival horror

name: Need for Speed: Undercover
summary: Get behind the wheel of the world's #1 racing franchise, rebuilt from the tires-up just for your mobile devices. Take on cops in raging, realistic street battles as you corner and drift through fire and smoke at 150mph+. Drive the world's fastest, hottest cars through gnarly crash scenes enhanced with 3D graphics. Music keeps you pumped while you tear up the road in this action-packed adventure of hot pursuit and betrayal!

name: Neko Atsume 2
summary: Sequel to the mobile game Neko Atsume.

name: Necroforge
summary: Battle monsters using spells and weapons. Each wave gets tougher, requiring strategy. Inspired by Hexen and Heretic games, this games features dynamic enemy waves, providing a unique survival experience.

name: Nerf: Superblast
summary: Action-packed Multiplayer PvP Arena Shooter with realistic NERF Blasters. Ready for the ultimate NERF experience? NERF: Superblast brings the excitement of NERF battles to life in a fast-paced multiplayer FPS game! Dominate the arena with your friends and prove your skills in real-time PvP matches!

name: Neon Runners
summary: Select a runner with special abilities, create a power-up deck, and race! Craft your custom tracks using a user-friendly map editor. Explore various game modes such as Co-Op, Boss Battles, Floor is Lava, and Puzzle Rush. And it's free! Play cross-platform on PC & Mobile.

name: Nerdle
summary: Nerdle challenges you to find the hidden calculation in just six guesses. In the wider nerdleverse, you'll roam an entire galaxy of puzzles, including number-based crosswords, anagrams, and so much more. Whether you're a math enthusiast or just looking for a daily brain workout, the nerdleverse has something special for you. Join us and let your mind explore the wonders of the nerdleverse!

name: Next King
summary: RPG. Play with mouse only. A screen resolution - 1280*720 or 1920*1080

name: Nexus PI
summary: In a reality stuck in a technologically unadvanced society stricken with the negative impacts of a worldwide climate disaster, you are a uniquely powered private investigator tasked with uncovering advanced technology from another reality with the potential to save your whole world.

name: Nekokami: The Human Restoration Project
summary: Start a relaxing world-building adventure with Nekokami! Architect beautiful, peaceful worlds in a far-future where Cats rule the universe. Befriend wonderous yet whimsical spirits of nature. Manage Humans. With Cats in charge, what could POSSIBLY go wrong?

name: Nebula Nomads
summary: Embark on a spacefaring odyssey in Nebula Nomads! Pilot your cargo haulers through the cosmic expanse, mastering thrust vectoring as you deliver valuable packages between space stations. Earn credits, upgrade your fleet, and explore a captivating 2.5D universe. Launch into Nebula Nomads now!

name: Never Gives Up Her Dead
summary:
Time is running out after a meteor strikes your interstellar starship. While the crew is under full alert, only you seem to notice the strange red portals opening up throughout the ship.

Explore ten different worlds, learn the truth of your destiny, and confront the mysterious figure who has been haunting you from the start in this epic sci-fi adventure.

name: Neon On!
summary: Wanna see something amazing? Like, really electrifying? The ultimate neon puzzle game is here!

name: Neoproxima
summary: Investigating a time-loop during the Cold War, light years away from Earth. Neoproxima is a text-based adventure game that combines exploration and simple RPG and survival mechanics. Plan your next loop carefully, and go as far as possible before time catches up with you.

name: Neon Rush
summary: Speed through a neon city in this 2D retro racing game. Outsmart cops and rivals with skillful maneuvers. Immerse yourself in illegal racing, fueled by synthwave beats, and dominate as the underworld's top racer!

name: Netcode Warriors
summary: ⁤Dive into the datascape of 'Netcode Warriors', an anime-style arena fighter designed from the ground up to take competitive play to its limits. Engage in intense 1-v-1 fights, master unique characters and playstyles, then take your skills to the arena. ⁤

name: Neon Rider Classic
summary: Race your bike through cybernetic landscapes, switch your color to navigate between glowing neon tracks and perform crazy flips in Neon Rider Classic. With upgraded graphics, this nostalgic collection Includes Neon Rider and Neon Rider World.

name: Nevermind
summary: Nevermind - is a visual novel, which takes place in a post-apocalyptic world in Russia. You will have to fight for survival, collecting resources and exploring destroyed cities, but the most important thing is to learn what it means to be human.

name: Nephilim Uprising
summary: Embark on an adrenaline-fueled journey in "Nephilim Uprising," an early access celestial third-person shooter. Navigate procedurally generated labyrinths, face intense combat scenarios, and conquer divine challenges to prove yourself in the celestial arena!

name: Neon Net
summary: Dive into the neon-lit virtual world as a hacker detective fighting rebellious AI programs, inspired by the "Tron" movie. Unleash hacking skills in a 'Minesweeper'-style game with RPG elements, save the virtual world from chaos while questioning who you are - human or another AI?

name: New World
summary: Colonize and exploit the New World.

name: Necroking
summary: Necroking is a turn-based tactics roguelite with pixel art graphics. You play as a Master of Necromancy. Build your sculls deck, rise skeletons and other scum to defeat settlements desecrated by life.

name: Neanderthal
summary: Humanity's evolution as a species has accelerated over the last 30,000-40,000 years unparalleled in evolution of life on Earth. What triggered this change? Play as the Archaic Man (Player Green), Neanderthal (Player Yellow), or Cro-Magnon (Player Red) species fighting to survive .

name: Next Room
summary: It is a single-player 3D scene puzzle type game that interacts with objects in a room from a first-person perspective to find a way to the next room. The game is made up of high-quality models, bright skies and warm sunlight, so find your way to the next room in this cozy room!

name: Neural Shock
summary: In Neural Shock, you must cleanse the world of horrid and bloodthirsty creatures by utilizing turrets, traps, wits and weapons. Choose from different class choices with unique playstyles and over 20+ different turrets and traps in this unique sci-fi Tower Defense / Action RPG.

name: NewMe NuMe LuMe: Alien Wars
summary: Summoned into the otherworldly realm of 'NewMe NuMe LuMe', the protagonist Kim Ttolttol must aid the gods who summoned him to defeat enemies and return home in this 2D top-down action game. Utilize a variety of weapons to vanquish diverse foes!

name: Neon Rumble
summary: In Neon Rumble, players face off in electrifying puzzle-match arenas where skill, strategy, and experience ultimately lead to victory. Clear your board with lighting speed, destroy junk blocks, unleash combo attacks, and activate your Neonite's power to clinch the win.

name: Neon Fantasy: Horses
summary: Neon Fantasy: Horses is the perfect puzzle game for a fun and rewarding pastime. Collect pictures, develop your attention, and feel like a part of the beautiful neon world.

name: Neon Fantasy: Butterflies
summary: Neon Fantasy: Butterflies is the perfect puzzle game for a fun and rewarding pastime. Collect pictures, develop your attention, and feel like a part of the beautiful neon world.

name: Neon Fantasy: Rodents
summary: Neon Fantasy: Rodents is the perfect puzzle game for a fun and rewarding pastime. Collect pictures, develop your attention, and feel like a part of the beautiful neon world.

name: Netghost
summary: Netghost is a Crime Drama visual novel with a mystery-driven story full of intrigue, twists and turns. The story follows Ian Newfield, a cyber security engineer who transforms into a cold-blooded criminal in his struggle to protect the company he works for and aid his ailing sister.

name: Necromon
summary: Collect souls, unlock your minions and fight with supreme necromancer bosses! Necromon is a rogue-lite game where you adventure as a chosen one, going against worlds reigning necromancers.

name: Necks Please...
summary: Fight crabs and sharks on your way to defeat the vampire Batula.

name: New York Shark
summary: New York Shark is another episode of the Shark series. Control the shark and destroy New York!

name: New Super Mario Bros. DS Co-Op
Newer Super Luigi Wii: Dark Moon - Reverse
summary: Newer Super Luigi Wii: Dark Moon Reverse, an alternate version of Newer Super Luigi Wii: Dark Moon, is a mod based on the framework of Newer Super Mario Bros. Wii. The hack features mirrored levels, a mirrored World Map, a new music selection, alternate player costumes, and more.

name: New Adventure All-Stars
summary: New Adventure All-Stars is a custom track distribution created by Mystora, Cats4Life, Potatoman44, and Fynn93. It is a combination of New Mario Kart Fun, Adventure CT Pack and Mario Kart All-Stars. This distribution includes track edits and custom tracks that are generally not included in other distributions during its creation.

name: Neko Girls Puzzle
summary: Rotate the puzzles and enjoy the beauty of the images of neko girls.

name: Nexus Wars
summary: Embark on early Nexus Wars, an enthralling auto-battler set: 4970 years in the future, before the galactic calamity. Command a mech army across 9 factions with 180+ units: customizable gear and skills. Master strategic gameplay and PvP battles, laying the groundwork for an expansive PvE storyline.

name: NeoSprint
summary: The exhilarating Atari racing classic “Sprint” series returns! NeoSprint zooms back to life as a single screen arcade racer for up to 8 players, paired with a robust track builder and intuitive sharing tools, ensuring a racing experience that satisfies speed demons and architects alike.

name: Nerdtastic Norman & The Soul Fragments
summary: Nerdtastic Norman is a 2d scrolling puzzle platformer set in purgatory based on Dante's Inferno. Over 70 unique levels, dangerously hard boss battles, and 1 unique story. Help Norman gather the missing pieces of his shattered soul, and help him return to the land of the living.

name: Necrophobia
summary: Start your life anew at Heaven's Gates Academy. Learn new subjects, make new friends, experience what you've never before deemed possible. Change your fate, and the fate of those around you- your decisions matter greatly.

name: Nekoto
summary: Customize your cat in detail and live with it! In a town where only people who live with cats can live, you'll enhance your life by working to find lost cats. All cats have different characteristics and about 26,000 patterns! The town is also randomly generated, so the structure changes every time!

name: Newlywed Happy Couple Family
summary: For those who loved playing family games, this is a treat to play Newlyweds Happy Couple Wedding Games. You’ve carried your love story a long way now in new fashion trends in your wedding games. It’s time to get married this summer in wedding games 2022. Let’s play the role in happy couple games soon to married in couple games and marriage games. You own a house in the middle of the city just like in the adventure games. You’ve spent quite a time as a bachelor so finally, you decide to marry your girlfriend. Buy your Indian girlfriend expensive presents just like in the dress up games and make up games and take her out for a party in Indian wedding games. Spend life with your love and let’s build a happy family Indian wedding games.

name: Never Alone 2
summary:
Discover a world of fierce, frozen beauty in Never Alone 2, the upcoming 3D sequel to the BAFTA award-winning adventure drawn from the Iñupiaq storytelling tradition. Journey through the breathtaking Alaska wilderness as Nuna and Fox, her spirit companion, along the way unearthing an epic mystery that threatens your entire community.

Never Alone 2 is being developed using an Inclusive Development process with the Alaska Native community. It tells an original story from an award-winning Iñupiaq writer and draws from tradition and stories that have been shared across generations. Designed to be played co-op (online and couch), Never Alone 2 invites you to explore environments ranging from the harsh frozen tundra to forest valleys filled with ancient willows as you traverse beautifully realized landscapes that are filled with wonder. Together you will work to navigate these wilds, forge connections with the spirits, and experience how the Alaska Native people have survived and thrived for over 10,000 years in one of the harshest and most breathtaking parts of the world.

name: Nectarmare
summary: Nectarmare is a single player game where you control a bee collecting nectar for the winter. But watch out there are many things that will hurt or even eat a small bee out in the wild. The environment is full of dangers so take care while chasing for nectar.

name: Need for Speed Unbound: Vol.6 - Premium Speed Pass
summary: The Vol. 6 Premium Speed Pass immediately grants the new Audi RS 6 Avant (2020) and opens up your access to its bodykits, along with 3 Rare Custom versions of the new Audis, and more.

name: Neocon Tower Defence 3
summary: A finger-blisteringly action-packed Tower Defence advanture!

name: Neonexus Wars
summary: Dive into the cyberpunk world of Neonexus Wars, where you'll navigate treacherous sectors as a Nexus Runner. Craft your deck, tackle challenging runs, and face off against powerful foes in this roguelike deckbuilder. Can you survive the Neonexus?

name: Neural Synapse
summary: Become a bounty hunter in a cyberpunk city of the future. Explore neon streets, talk to people, hack into corporations. Use all your skills to survive and become a hero.

name: Neoclyps
summary: Horizontal space shooter

name: Neo City Express
summary:
Neo City Express is a madcap arcade game about making extremely poor decisions while driving.

You play as Daggers McBlack, the heir to his family's delivery company. Guide him through 6 top-down arcade racing levels, dodging cars and sorting out his personal affairs. In order to take the company to new heights, Daggers will push himself to questionable limits. But he's traveling with the loving memory of his grandma, so perhaps with her guidance everything will turn out alright.

name: Neko Simulator NekoZ
summary: This is a simulator of realistic cat

name: Neon Flight
summary: Speed through space, narrowly dodging obstacles in this high-speed endless runner. Compete for the top spot on the leaderboard and collect ship customizations.

name: Neon Grid Defenders
summary: Neon Grid Defenders is a sci-fi/Tron theme inspired tower defense game with roguelite elements to make each run unique. Build your path, place your towers, hook them up with unique upgrades and let the enemies have it!

name: New Brooklyn Bridge Tycoon
summary: New York City just turned the Brooklyn bridge into a park, and the visitors are in desperate need of food! Now’s your chance to make it big in the Big Apple! Build food booths, grow produce, or locally source ingredients until you're the only competition left in New Brooklyn Bridge Tycoon!

name: New Heaven
summary: In this first-person shooter (FPS) adventure set in the wake of a devastating meteor shower, players are thrust into the heart of a desperate struggle for survival against hordes of undead monstrosities.

name: Nexus Knights
summary: In "Nexus Knights," players embark on an exhilarating journey through time and dimensions, battling against the forces of chaos to preserve the stability of the universe. As Nexus Knights, they must hone their skills, forge alliances, and unravel the secrets of the multiverse.

name: NeverGoingHome
summary: Ready for a fast paced rogue-like action shooter with upgrades, abilities and loads of weapons?, well you found it!

name: Necromantic
summary: Start out as a lowly freshman at Valorborn Academy and prove yourself to the school and other students – or don’t, and repeatedly fall to the legions of horrors that await in Necromantic. Study up to survive in this dark and dangerous fantasy Bullet Heaven ... solo or by online co-op.

name: Neighbor's Wife
summary: Your neighbor is always busy and doesn't have much time to spend with his wife, which makes her feel lonely and sad. You are the only one who can save their marriage!

name: Nearly Friendly Tribes
summary: Join the action-packed world of Nearly Friendly Tribes (NFT), the low-poly First-Person Shooter by Block Bastards. Battle it out in beautifully designed arenas, armed with Interoperable weapons. Are you ready to dominate the competition?

name: Neo Sonic Universe
summary: Neo Sonic Universe is an action game developed and published by Alexandre Martins in 2003.

name: Nerobi
summary:
This indie game is a 2D scrolling platformer with several elements typical of a graphic adventure, featuring some cinematic sequences. It is all hand-drawn.
The gameplay is definitely challenging. It requires coordination and timing, and you have to use your wits. Different powers are unlocked as you go along, expanding the gameplay experience.
In addition, scattered around the world, there are several hidden cards to collect.

name: Neptunia Game Maker R:Evolution / Neptunia: Sisters vs. Sisters: Day One Edition - Dual Pack Plus
Neverdaunt:8Bit
summary:
Neverdaunt:8Bit (N8) was an online massively multiplayer virtual sandbox created by Robot Loves Kitty. In the game, players would explore a "dreamlike world of floating islands and fallen stars where nearly anything can happen." Players could fight, build, socialize, and shop. The game also included a visual programming language called Tronics that allowed players to program devices within the game.
N8's servers were shut down in May 2012.

name: Need for Speed: Most Wanted Demo
summary: The PlayStation 2 demo disc for Need for Speed: Most Wanted features 3 unique events that are not found in the main game, including a race against Rog, Blacklist rival #16.

name: New HR Job
summary: You're a new employee at a remote only job. You must find out which handles match which employees in the company chat program.

name: Nemesis Tamatou
summary:
You play a character named "7735", thrown into a deadly Game Show known as "Nemesis Tamatou" for the entertainment of the enigmatic "BLB Crew" and their stream viewers. On your way, you can buy upgrades in the shop aiding you on your journey, meet new friends along the way (or kill them for cash) and experience the overall insanity (along with a subtle identity crisis).
This game is based on the personalities and the humor of the BLB Show Youtube Channel.

name: Neden
summary: Step into the fantastic world of Neden and create your unique character! You can meet new friends and explore thrilling game modes like deathmatch, battle royale, survival, and much more. But what exactly is Neden?

name: Neverseas
summary:
Ahoy, captain! Welcome and join us to find out the untold tale of Neverseas, where time and space is a dream and you are a sand grain in an endless lost sea that careless wanderer can fall into. The main question is are you brave enough to dive into it?

Neversas is an open-world sandbox action RPG from a third-person perspective. The game takes place in the era of graceful sailing ships and pirate romance, and you are invited to try yourself in the role of a real captain of a sailing ship. Here you have to manage a team, monitor the condition of ships, improve and modernize them, and you must also not forget about individual equipment, because on land you will not protect several of the modern capabilities of your ship.

name: Need for Speed: Unbound - Vol. 7 Premium Speed Pass
summary: The Vol. 7 Premium Speed Pass immediately grants the new Ford Mustang Dark Horse ‘24 and opens up access to its bodykits plus 3 Custom versions of the new Vol. 7 cars. You'll also gain access to sick, new customizations — over 30 content tiers.

name: Necromancer's Revenge
summary: Become a necromancer betrayed by the Demon King. In this game combining survival, roguelite, and tower defense elements, defeat monsters, collect souls, and place totems. Summon the Demon King for revenge!

name: Neon Nexus
summary: Little techbase map with lots of neon!

name: Necromancia
summary: NECROMANCIA! A skele-puzzle type game where your bones and your wit may guide ye through the delving of the dungeons and catacombs. Take command of your undead hordes and collect the spreads to form the ultimate sandwich!! The only brain your minions will be eating is yours!

name: Neon Village
summary: This game is a fusion of a "roguelike deck-builder" and "match-3 puzzle". Collect unique residents to create explosive synergies and develop a village glittering with neon!

name: New Year, New Nanos
summary: In Fusionfall Retro the New Year, New Nanos update was released to celebrate FusionFall's 11th anniversary. This update added a wave of 4 new World Nanos and their respective Nano Missions. All of these Nanos were based on characters only found in FusionFall.

name: Nemo
summary: A collection of picross puzzles for PICO-8.

name: Nemo: Puzzle Pack II
summary: More picross puzzles for PICO-8.

name: Nether Heroes
summary: Immerse yourself in Nether Heroes, an intense action-platform roguelike game. Conquer challenging dungeons, face menacing creatures, and defeat powerful bosses on your epic adventure.

name: Necromancer for a Week
summary: Reanimate monsters, choose their ideal moveset and form the perfect 3-monster-team to dominate the competition in this turn-based strategy roguelike. Use action points each turn on brutal combos and strategic positioning to be crowned champion of the annual Necromancer Tournament!

name: Necronator
summary:
Necronator is a zombie-based strategy game, developed by TogeProductions.
Players summon and control the undead forces, conquering the world by killing any human who stands in the way.

name: Necronator 2
summary: This is the sequel of the hit RTS game, Necronator. Complete 6 different campaigns from 6 different races. Fight on forests, mountains, and wastelands. Upgrade your army, learn new spells, unlock special heroes and much more in this epic fantasy strategy game by Toge Productions.

name: New Hope
summary:
New Hope is an LGBTQI+ inclusive story starring Justin, an 18-year-old high school senior with two very big secrets. He's gay and trying to hold onto his secrets until finally finishing senior year and moving off to college. But when he loses his songbook, things take an unexpected turn as Justin begins to message a mystery guy who shares the same secret.

Being gay isn't the only thing Justin's trying to hide, however.

name: Neon Puzzle Ball
summary: Neon Puzzle Ball is a fun and challenging 2D action puzzle platformer. Navigate each level unlocking doors and mastering new modifiers and hazards, while striving for quicker completion times.

name: Neon Doctrine's Greatest Hits Vol. 1
summary: Lost Castle, The Legend of Tianding, and Yuppie Psycho. Three different games with almost nothing in common. Nothing that is, except they all captured your hearts.

name: Nexus Rumble: The Ultimate Showdown
summary: Welcome to Nexus Rumble, the ultimate showdown where champions clash in a fierce competition for survival! Prepare to embark on an adrenaline-fueled journey through diverse landscapes and exhilarating challenges in this heart-pounding multiplayer extravaganza.

name: NebuLeet
summary: A tactical auto-battler with programming: design and program combat vessels, research new technologies, colonize planets, and defeat enemies in space and on planets!

name: Neon Squad Tactics
summary: An electrifying turn-based tactics experience where you, your friends and online allies work together to complete missions for the powerful corporations using a captivating holographic table, projecting part of your consciousness into a cybernetic team of heroes called 'NEON Squad'.

name: New World: Aeternum
summary: Aeternum is separate from the original New World but also contains everything from New World and its Rise of the Angry Earth expansion, retooled for consoles, and featuring a slew of changes and additions that go beyond what you'd expect in just an update.

name: Netflix Stories: Emily in Paris
summary: Say “oui” to possibility. Follow your heart and live out your own story set in the City of Love in this interactive story based on the hit series.

name: Neon Rain
summary: Neon Rain is a hybrid between a Metroidvania and a Boomershooter.

name: Neon Fantasy: Mushrooms
summary: Neon Fantasy: Mushrooms is the perfect puzzle game for a fun and rewarding pastime. Collect pictures, develop your attention, and feel like a part of the beautiful neon world.

name: Necromage
summary: Be a necromancer who can learn to summon any creature from the world. Level up and equip your minions by crafting enchanted spells to use on them. All this takes place in an isometric action-RPG with intense combat and powerful bosses that will require your army of minions to defeat.

name: Neon World Maker
summary: Neon World Maker is a platformer and game creation system. Players can design their own levels and maps using the editor and share with friends.

name: Neopets: Tales of Dacardia
summary:
Embark on an unforgettable journey in Dacardia, an idyllic island devastated by a mysterious storm, in Neopets: Tales of Dacardia.
