As the new Town Planner, you'll work alongside the Dacardian community to restore the land they call home and uncover clues to reveal the truth behind the storm. Was it a natural disaster, or is there something more sinister at play?

Uncover the strange and surprising secrets of this remote corner of Neopia!

name: Next of Kin
summary: Next of Kin is an emotional story about Thomas's endeavors to find his lost wife, Martha. Solve puzzles, find clues, and uncover the truth of Martha's disappearance.

name: New Super Mario Bros. Versus: Doodler's Mayhem
summary: A mod for Mario Vs Luigi that adds multiple new stages and characters ft. Green Greens and many others

name: Nehonobasa
summary:
This is a bullet hell shooter. It might be hard.
Defeat all 4 stages + the final boss.
Shoot bombs with the X key. Shooting a bomb into a bomb
will increase the attack range and wipe out all bullets and enemies on the screen.
Also, if you have at least one bomb
even if you get hit, you won't miss because it will be an auto bomb.

name: Never Really Alone
summary: A stressful day is not always saved by a good night's sleep. A girl alone in her new foster home finds any excuse not to go to bed. A short horror RPG made for an alternative game development class at the University of Utah.

name: Neon Genesis Evitalian
summary: Relive the story of Neon Genesis Evangelion in the world of the Mushroom Kingdom. Features custom cutscenes, cinematics, and an entirely new control system with the Evitalian.

name: Nekopara After
summary: A new chapter begins with the arrival of the catgirl, Fraise! She seeks advice from his little sister, Shigure and while Fraise feels the relationship between siblings is most important, Shigure priorities the happiness of her catgirls. This sets the stage in the battle between catgirl and girl!

name: Nekopara Love Project Vol. 1
summary:
NEKOPARA, the popular visual novel series that has sold over 6.5 million copies worldwide, now has a remake version for smartphones!

With enhanced graphics, fresh recordings from a new cast of voice actors, and exclusive episodes, this powered-up remake is ready for Masters all around the world!

name: NextWorld2
summary:
NextWorld2 is a fantasy MMORPG set in the divided world of Kigan, where two rival kingdoms, Selakim and Quila, struggle for dominance. Players can choose from four classes: Warrior, Shaman, Assassin, and Ezra, and explore a vast open world filled with quests, mounts, dungeons, and large-scale community events.

The game emphasizes real-time combat, crafting, exploration, and both PvE and PvP content. Currently available in Hungary, NextWorld2 has thousands of active players and continues to grow with new content and future international expansion plans.

name: Neckbreak
summary: Fight your way out in this dirty retro-styled tactical FPS.

name: Neverness to Everness
summary: Supernatural urban open-world RPG

name: (Neg)Entropic Wandering
summary: (Neg)Entropic Wandering is a short visual novel for Insomniacs. Wander through the depths of space to empty your mind and finally get some sleep.

name: Need for Speed: High Stakes
summary: The PC version has differences in the modes that there are, in addition to an exclusive feature with the credits that the PlayStation version doesn’t have.

name: Neighbor Next Door
summary: Someone just moved into the apartment next to you. He appears to be an elderly gentleman, radiating kindness and a gentle demeanor. His warm smile and soft-spoken nature make him seem trustworthy and amiable, so when he asks you for a favor, you agree without hesitation, but that will cost you everything...

name: Neon Phonk Robots
summary: A game for real phonk fans! Infectious beats, explosions, robots, neon, basses, guns, funk!!! Create your own drone army and tear your enemies to shreds! And of course, turn the volume up to full! After all, these are neon phonk

name: Necuratu
summary: Vampire real-time strategy game. Players take on the role of the ancient vampire who has been looted and must find his loved one - and potentially cause havoc.

name: Net.Crawl
summary: Net.Crawl is a puzzle rogue-like about White Rabbit lost in the unfriendly cyberspace. Dive deep into the bizarre digital world and outsmart dozens of unique Cores(mini-bosses). Short runs, deep strategies, crazy combos and a ton of replayability.

name: Never Play Evil
summary: Step into the dark and twisted world of "Never Play Evil," an action horror noir game that combines puzzle-solving, exploration, and thrilling combat. You will have to unravel every mystery hidden within the eerie mansion as you navigate its corridors and confront the forces that lurk within.

name: Neon Express
summary: Take the helm in this cyberpunk uber driver narrative mystery. Traverse the city delivering contraband and nefarious passengers. Rekindle old contacts and reconnect with an underworld you were trying to leave behind.

name: Neurose Neurones
summary: It's time to play catch-up! Can you bring home the cute kitty safely and find out the truth about the death of the ghosts and the cause of the Neuron family's insanity?

name: Never Be Alone
summary: Dive into the post-apocalyptic realm of 'Never Be Alone,' an expansive open-world game designed for both solo and multiplayer experiences. In this zombie survival adventure, you can seamlessly team up with friends or brave the dangers alone.

name: NecroStone
summary: Embark on an action RPG journey as a necromancer, summoning champions and casting powerful necromancy to defeat wicked spirits. It features sandbox elements allowing you to collect various monsters and craft your own powerful champions by directly disassembling and assembling bodies.

name: Neo Ha_Bits
summary: Neo Ha_Bits plunges players into a chilling journey of psychological horror and mystery within a cyberpunk setting.

name: Nezha Crossing the Sea
summary: With more arms and weapons, you will be able to defeat many opponents at the same time - this game will bring you a unique multi-arm combat experience.

name: Nerl's Crazy C"rough"t!
summary: A falling block merge puzzle game starring the wizard Nail. Drop blocks from above and evolve them... but there are three evolution paths! Each block has a freshness level, and if left unattended, it will turn into trash!?

name: Nev's Socks
summary: Help Nev catch all the socks that are falling from the washing line into his basket.

name: New Life
summary: A creepy story about a guy who went to a calm and remote city to forget his past and start a new life. But this place turned out to be not as nice and safe as it seemed at first glance.

name: Neon Ladder
summary: Prepare to reclaim the overtaken earth from manifestations of the seven deadly sins and their ominous leader. Choose your upgrades and paths' carefully - with the assistance of your AI ship you can reset the timeline and fight once again until you stop the sins in their tracks.

name: Neon Blitz
summary: Neon Blitz is an electrifying roguelike where you stand your ground against waves of glowing adversaries. Strategically spend your hard-earned cash on synergistic laser and gun upgrades, crafting the perfect defense to outlast the relentless neon onslaught.

name: Necrosphere64
summary: A 64×64 Metroidvania with only 2 buttons (neither of them jumps)

name: Never Stop Rolling
summary: Never Stop Rolling is a single-player 2d platformer with a heavy focus on precisely timed jumps. Players will need to navigate through spikes, cannons, and more to reach the end.

name: Neighbors
summary: Neighbors is an intriguing life simulation and dating game. Start a new life and shape your destiny in the mysterious town of Sierra. Build meaningful relationships, experience thrilling paranormal events, uncover dark secrets, and transform your home into a haven of safety and peace.

name: Nerd Simulator
summary: It’s never too late to turn your life around! Step into the shoes of a 40-year-old finally ready to leave the nest in this hilarious RPG-Life Simulation mix. Tackle wacky challenges, embrace absurd adventures, and prove that with determination (and a bit of chaos), you can start fresh at any age.

name: Neon Fever
summary: Jump, slide and shoot! Kill a player or wipe the entire enemy team with your one-shot-no-scope-super-laser-aiming skills and use gadgets to your advantage, in a 5v5 arena shooter with dynamic game modes and fast paced movement mechanics. May the better team win!

name: Neo Harbor Rescue Squad
summary: Live the life of a rookie paramedic through frantic minigame action and a wild, funny story. Juggle waves of patients with a battle-like triage system; master dozens of treatment minigames; and win the city's recognition from the rival fire department!

name: Neon Wars
summary: Neon Wars is an arcade game where vivid graphics, great music and exciting game play combine to create an amazingly new yet classic experience for the next generation of players. It's a simple game of collecting stars and staying one step ahead of the action. Plus there's access to powerful "special" weapons that even the odds with massive pyrotechnic special effects. The easy controls will delight the young at heart, but the action on higher difficulty levels is sure to create intense competition for the highest score.

name: New Campaign Trail
summary: New Campaign Trail is an expanded version of Campaign Trail by Dan Bryan, now with mod support and added scenarios.

name: New Super Mario Bros. U: Return to Pumpkin Boneyard
New Super Mario Bros. U: Insane Edition
New Super Mario Bros. Wii: The Prankster Comets
Neptune
summary: The first of PLANETARIA series.

name: Neonova
summary: As an Administration A.I. of a deep space probe, you're tasked with scanning and reporting back about a new galaxy. You'll weather cosmic events, witness oddities of the universe, and fly through points of interest to find answers for the base station.

name: Necromancer
summary:
If you go around the stage, you can meet various monsters.
My summoner is various monsters ranging from cute squirrels, rabbits to dragon, angels, and ancient gods!
Increase your hunting efficiency by using appropriate skills, such as lightning, blizzards, pushers, and attack buffs.
Summoning monsters of the highest grade (G) will register with the Hall of Fame.
Monsters registered in the Hall of Fame can grow beyond the level limit.
Keep your favorite monster stronger!
Challenge the boss.
Or try to avoid bossing around and feel the pleasure of Mole hunting!

name: New Super Mario Bros. Wii: The Galaxy Expansion
Neogen Fallout
summary:
Neogen Fallout is truly something different and we have raised the bar for what arcade games can be like.
Match the neon figures as they fallout, with the cells in the bottom and test your reaction in the abstract city of neon lights, shadows and glorious effects.

name: Nemesis '90 Kai
summary: Nemesis '90 Kai is an enhanced remake of Nemesis 2. The main difference lies in presentation, with higher-quality music and significantly more detailed graphics. The gameplay is mostly unchanged, with the exception of the possibility to equip four options on the player-controlled ship (as opposed to only two in the original version) and a few tweaks to secondary weapons and power-ups. Two new stages and four boss enemies have been added to this version.

name: Nenene Noble
summary:
“If you fail to realize your happiness, you will step into despair. Like poison corroding a flower..."

Nenene's point of view, of her past and behind the scenes of Menherafflesia.

name: Net.Attack()
summary: Unleash your inner hacker skills and code your way to victory in a game where complex algorithms meet intuitive gameplay. Net.Attack() is a dynamic top-down survivor-like roguelite where you create your own abilities with a node-based coding mechanic. Go and dominate the virtual battleboards.

name: Near Mint
summary: A roguelike deckbuilder where your cards have been torn into pieces

name: NeveRossa: Mille e una notte
summary: That day, the sky was also snowing scarlet— Classic PC game from Firedog Studio in 2005 "NeveRossa~Mille e una notte" Remastered! Nurture a pretty girl Lilies, the "Goddess Seed", through trainings, adventures, and battles, into a true Goddess within a thousand nights!

name: Never Stop Never Stopping
summary: Never Stop Never Stopping is a Boom Compatible level where the idea is to keep moving at all time. It's a relatively short adrenaline rush designed to keep you on your feet. It also uses @Tango's excellent minicharge mod as a base.

name: Neutral Mini Escape: Midsummer Night ver.
summary: A banner-sized summer-themed escape game

name: Need 4 Meat
summary:
10,000 B.C. Primitive man walks the earth, proud but vulnerable. His only desire is that most scarce and precious resource: MEAT.

Take up your spears and establish yourself as the true apex predator. Pick off skittish rabbits if you can. But beware the crafty wolves, who pursue rabbits and humans both. For all are made of meat, and must return to meat in the bitter end.

Will the hunter become the hunted? Will you finally succumb to the relentless logic of natural selection? Or will you finally fulfill your….NEED 4 MEAT?

name: Neptunia Riders vs. Dogoos
summary: Neptunia Riders vs Dogoos is a bike action game in the Hyperdimension Neptunia series. This game follows Uzume and the four Goddesses on motorcycles in a fight against the Dogoo army and collecting them.

name: Netherworld Covenant
summary: In the abyss where the mortal realm and netherworld intertwine, becoming a warrior wielding the power of the Ethereal Torch to fight along with the fallen souls. With hardcore action and intriguing roguelike builds, shatter the cursed barriers and unveil the truth woven from blood and soul.

name: Necrocat
summary: In a card field, choose wisely your next move on the grid, for every item collected and every monster defeated brings you one step closer to death. Answer the call and uncover Necrocat's schemes that disrupt the cycle of life!

name: Nebula Strike
summary: Nebula Strike is a space shooting game that is still in its very early stages. We hope you have fun.

name: Nerd: Tracing Dayline
summary: An adventure game created with the concept of "a game for a single song."

name: New Fief
summary: A relaxed and peaceful territorial management game, without the interference of hostile/competitive forces, allowing you to farm with peace of mind.

name: Neural Dominion
summary: A brutal cyberpunk 4X turn-based strategy game with JRPG combat. Take control of one of 5 gangs in Technograd — a dark, crime-ridden city where getting to the top is the only thing that matters.

name: Nexus Station
summary: Nexus Station is a cross-platform Social Sandbox MMO. With endless possibilities; from world creation, crafting, co-op PvE dungeons, PvP brawler, competitive gameplay and more, Nexus Station is going to have endless amounts of exciting and varied content that you can be part of creating.

name: Nettle
summary: A survival RTS game about exploring the vast cosmos, the many planets inhabiting it and their countless secrets. You'll need to explore, gather resources and research new technologies in order to survive, thrive, and eventually build a colony on a bizarre, foreign world.

name: Nebelmer
summary: Discover the unknown land of Nebelmer, a small open world game about exploration, movements and mysteries. Leave your village to uncover the wonders and secrets hidden beneath the mist.

name: Neptune Island
summary: Neptune Island is a short puzzle game where you have been tasked with repairing the light of a lighthouse. The light has been out for some time, and the owner hasn't done anything to fix it. Unbeknownst to you, you have a much more difficult job ahead of you than you anticipated...

name: Newspaper Day
summary: Take on the role of a newspaper delivery person in a seemingly quiet neighborhood. Every morning, you carry out your job, delivering the day's news to your neighbors' doors. However, you soon realize that things are not what they seem.

name: New Ghostbusters II Plus
summary:
A rom hack of "New Ghostbusters II". After making a patch to recolor the Ghostbusters to allow Winston a more natural skin tone, many other alterations were made in an attempt to make an already great game even better.

Major changes:
- Ghostbusters recolored
- Improved Ghostbuster sprites (Proton packs, legs, Peter’s hairline, Egon’s glasses, etc…)
- Color palette tweaks to enemies and a few minor tweaks to level palettes
- Shrunk giant chair on character select screen
- Minor sprite/tile edits and fixes
- Added names to credits
- Vigo’s hair outlined, making it much more visible (no more bald Vigo)
- Improved Janosz’s sprite
- Major color palette tweaks on every level to create better contrast and compliment the new-colored ghostbusters
- Improved legs
- Color changes to character select (reverted) and level 2 (for variety)
- Few other minor tweaks

name: New Journey to the West
summary: "New Journey to the West" is a multiplayer RPG. Form a four-player team to defeat demons, explore poetic landscapes, and enjoy scenic beauty. The revolutionary aerial combat system allows you to enjoy smooth and graceful battles. Join this with friends!

name: Nehan: Kanzenban
summary: A horror adventure game made with RPG Maker, with enphashis on cosmic horror and body horror. There are no battles with minor enemies, only event battles. It is more of an adventure-like content, where you explore the ruins with your survival on the line.

name: Nehan 2: Darkness Fantasy
summary: The Sequel to Nahen. Whereas the previous version was a direct panic horror where you escape from the mansion, this one has a psychological sense of fear as the strangeness of the surroundings gradually emerges. Its an RPG Maker 2000 game with cosmic horror and body horror elements.

name: Neurokino Retrograde
summary: A melancholic/esoteric sci-fi visual novel; reconnect with a being that (you hope...?) might be your missing/returned ex-girlfriend.

name: Necromantic Thirst
summary: Necromantic Thirst is a Boom compatible (-complevel 9) 32-map megawad developed by the French Doom Community (and friends), inspired by some well-known classic wads of yesteryear, and featuring a new take on the standard progression : classic UAC techbases slowly but surely blend into a new, twisted, green and black hellish world. Beware of the evil spirit that inhabits these industrial and medieval worlds, or you might end up losing your sanity.

name: Negative Reverie
summary:
Negative Reverie is a retro-handheld-inspired RPG about technology, violence and animal intelligence... or the lack thereof.

Face the darkest side of Corporate America with Vuota, a young woman with a natural talent for violence, a hacksaw, and a mission to take down the CEO of the FamilyTech Corporation. With the right skills, tactics, outfits and allies, she might be able to overcome the oppression of modern technology culture... and possibly discover something even darker waiting below...

name: Need for speed: Mobile
summary: At sunset in Hot Bay World, Ajie and Vera stood at the highest point of Hot Bay, looking at this endless racing paradise.

name: Neon City Hacker
summary: Point and click adult game in a cyberpunk city.

name: Neon Inferno
summary: NYC 2055: a city beyond salvation. Blast your way through this dense cyberpunk jungle in NEON INFERNO, an explosive fusion of 2D run-and-gun and gallery-shooter, and help the Family dominate its streets!

name: New Super Luigi U Remastered Edition
summary: New Super Luigi U Remastered Edition is a fangame created by the Core Dev Team in order to bring the Mario community together in a fun way.

name: Never 7: The End of Infinity
summary: A remastered version of Never7: The End of Infinity for PlayStation 4, Nintendo Switch and PC.

name: Nekron: 24
summary: A fast paced FPS Roguelike where you, a rogue AI created by the last Supercomputerist, are tasked with forging connections between programs. On your mission you will also destroy unthinking machine men and rescue relics of humanity.

name: Nether Dungeons
summary: Nether Dungeons is an action-packed dungeon crawler. Battle through procedurally generated dungeons, face relentless enemies, and defeat epic bosses. Customize your hero, wield diverse weapons, and survive intense challenges as you descend into ever-changing, dangerous depths.

name: Nephilim Resurrection
summary: Embark on a furious journey, protecting precious cargo in a perilous world. Boomer shooter mechanics blend with puzzles and strategic encounters. Engage in PvE action, solve puzzles, and battle foes to a heavy metal soundtrack, immersing you in the adrenaline-fueled atmosphere.

name: New Moons
summary: New Moons is a free-to-play third-person and first-person action shooter powered by Unreal Engine 5. Master legendary characters, explore a rich campaign, and dominate modes like Battle Royale, Tactical 5v5, MOBA and many more. Wishlist now for Closed Beta access and exclusive rewards!

name: Nexus M4
summary: Nexus M4 is an oriental fantasy MMORPG featuring stunning graphics and dynamic combat. Explore a vast open world filled with adventures, face challenging enemies, gather valuable resources, and level up your character. Join clans, engage in epic wars, and claim your place in this unique universe.

name: Neon Blood: Limited Edition
summary:
Neon Blood is a neo-noir cyberpunk RPG / Graphic Adventure with a striking 2.5D aesthetic, based on the use of PixelArt 2D sprites with 3D modeled environments. Prepare to embark on a thrilling adventure where you will help Axel McCoin, an idealistic detective, start a revolution to change the world. In this video game, developed by ChaoticBrain Studios and published by Meridiem, you will experience a variety of puzzles and classic turn-based combat with precise Quick Time Events.
The physical Limited Edition of Neon Blood for PlayStation 5 and Nintendo Switch includes a metallic textured sleeve, art book, city guide and downloadable soundtrack.

name: Neko Bento
summary: Your perfect, cat-themed lunchbox puzzle is here!

name: Newton
summary: Newton is a pixel art platformer. Collect apples, master gravity and set high scores in this simple but challenging adventure!

name: Never Shall We Die
summary: Sail your ship in this 2D world, in search of treasures and secrets, which pays homage to classic Pixel Art games. Gather your crew to reach your goal stronger.

name: Nedra
summary: NEDRA is a story-driven, atmospheric action-adventure blending survival horror with cosmic terror. Set in a Soviet-era Antarctic station, all the explorers have vanished without a trace, leaving you to uncover the chilling truth.

name: Newsun
summary:
Newsun is a short Disco Elysium inspired project for a Programming Languages college course Final Project.

The nameless amnesiac Protagonist experiences a day Newsun Hotel, a weirdly familiar 5-story establishment.

name: Nedy's Adventure: The Curse of Vera Deluxe
summary: The Carbon captain has kidnapped you to have someone to resolve the cursed island mistery, she makes you jump from the airplane with your parachute, and then you must guide Nedy to escape from the island. You'll get into trouble and it won't be easy to escape...

name: Need for Speed Unbound: Ultimate Collection
summary:
Unleash the ultimate Need for Speed Unbound experience in one package with the Ultimate Collection. Enjoy instant access to all post-launch premium content, and the Vol. 9 Premium Speed Pass. Get access to 9 fully customizable cars, over 45 Customs, and 100+ additional cosmetics.

INCLUDES:
- Keys to the Map
- Vol. 9 Premium Speed Pass** (upon release)
- Vol. 8 Premium Speed Pass
- Vol. 8 Dynamic Catch-Up Pack** (Including Premium Speed Pass Content, upon release)
- Vol. 7 Dynamic Catch-Up Pack (Including Premium Speed Pass Content)
- Vol. 6 Dynamic Catch-Up Pack (Including Premium Speed Pass Content)
- Vol. 5 Catch-Up Pack
- Vol. 5 Customs Pack
- Trick or Street Swag Pack
- Vol. 4 Catch-Up Pack
- Hip Hop Origin Swag Pack
- Vol. 4 Customs Pack
- Vol. 3 Catch-Up Pack
- Robojets Swag Pack
- Vol. 3 Customs Pack

name: Needy Streamer Overload: Typing of The Net
summary: "Needy Streamer Overload: Typing of The Net" is a typing game in which you enter internet lingo in a call-and-response format with a girl (OMGkawaiiAngel) who has a strong need for approval.

name: Neon Abyss 2
summary: Plunge into the chaotic cybermyth roguelike world of Neon Abyss 2! With diverse combat styles and unlimited item synergies, every run delivers a dramatic and action-packed experience you won't forget.

name: Nekomancer of Nowhere
summary: Draw spells on your screen as the Nekomancer! Swap between the realms of life and death, revive ghosts, and uncover Tombstone Tower's haunting truth!

name: Need Two Survive
summary: horror co-op game, try to escape from the horrible death trap of the mad scientist: Pas Fin. A portal and SAW inspired game that will put your nerves and trust in your friend at edge. good luck you stinky peasents

name: New Active Object
summary: New Active Object is a genre-hopping game and multimedia experience synced to the 40-minute genre-hopping Jay Tholen (Dropsy, Hypnospace Outlaw) album of the same name. It is inspired by auto-playing CD-ROM applications and amateur games made by 14-year-olds.

name: New Year Simulator 2025
summary: In the game you will have to survive the pre-holiday bustle, celebrate the New Year, and then enjoy the peace after the New Year's lull. Relax and feel the atmosphere of the most important holiday of the year!

name: Nekura na Classmate ga Ore no Ibukuro wo Tsukande Hanashite Kurenai
New Super Mario Bros. 2: WillyMaker's Level Pack
summary: A 1-world level pack for New Super Mario Bros. 2 created by WillyMaker.

name: New Super Mario Bros. 3DS
summary: A 2-world mod for New Super Mario Bros. 2 created by BrewNick!

name: Neva: Devolver Deluxe Edition
summary:
Neva: Devolver Deluxe will include the following exclusive items, besides the physical game:
· A stunning softbound 88-page artbook showcasing concept art and game art.
· A copy of the game’s original soundtrack by Berlinist, on a CD and as digital download.
· A collector’s tuck-in box housing all the contents.

Neva is an emotionally charged action-adventure from the team behind GRIS.

name: Neon Doomer 85
summary: Dive into the life of a retrowave doomer for a while. Just click the TV screen to control your virtual car, the design of which is inspired by classic '80s automobiles and the vivid imagination of the creators. Each click brings you closer to new levels and unlocks unique references to iconic cultural events of the past.

name: Net Raiders
summary: Net Raiders is a single-player game that combines RPG, deck-building, and roguelike elements. In order to survive the dangers of the ruined virtual world, you must synthesize the cards in your hand to find the best move and defeat the enemies you encounter!

name: Nevermore 3
summary: A cute flash game made and painted by Adam Westerman in which we incarnate Olek, an intrepid little hero, as he ventures deeper into the beautiful, wonderful world of Nevermore. He's looking for treasure don't you know - not just any kind - but the sort of treasure that will save his village!

name: Need for Speed: Shift
summary: Mobile Port of Need for Speed: Shift

name: Need For Race: Street King
summary: Fuel your ambition, ignite the streets, and race beyond the horizon!

name: Nezumidash
summary: A minimal action platformer

name: Newton's Fourth Law
summary: Fight against brain-rot in this story-driven educational physics puzzle game. You will need to learn and apply high school physics concepts to solve increasingly challenging problems and uncover a galaxy spanning plot. When you have finished, you will be able to take a college level physics course.

name: New Meat
summary: New Meat is a fast-paced horror-comedy roguelite about burgers, monsters and dead-end jobs.

name: Nebula
summary: Redirect the cosmic starlet through deep dark space.

name: Near-Death-Expedition
summary: After quitting the job, you were casually browsing a video site when you saw a strange video with a blank thumbnail. "Can you hear me? Can you see me...?" The next day, you receive a message requesting you to be the manager of the mysterious VTuber "Owarino Rinne". The endless journey begins.

name: Neptunian Nightmare
summary: Neptunian Nightmare is a vanilla mapset and partial conversion for The Ultimate Doom (-complevel 3). It's an atmospheric romp heavily inspired by the Doom Bible and its associated prototypes, as well as Team TNT's TNT: Evilution and Icarus: Alien Vanguard.

name: Neon Spellstorm
summary: Neon Spellstorm is an action roguelite where you race along a crumbling neon path as a powerful wizard, wielding limitless magic. Unleash devastating spells, stack wild synergies, and reshape a destructible, otherworldly terrain that falls away behind you!

name: Neighbors
summary: A folk noir detective horror game. An old time detective trying to find out the truth behind a missing girl in a mysterious place.

name: Necrosis: Dawn of Dread
summary: Necrosis: Dawn of Dread is a FPS co-op survival horror game.

name: NekoSpin
summary: The gaming-obsessed magical girl decides to save a world corrupted by monsters. Pull the cat charm, spin the slot machine on her wand, and defeat the dark creatures!

name: Needle & Thread
summary: A tiny game about sewing.

name: Neptunia Riders vs. Dogoos: Deluxe Edition
summary: Make sure you gear up with the Goddesses with the Deluxe Edition! The Deluxe Edition also includes the Neptunia Riders VS Dogoos Costume Set!

name: Neodori Infinity
summary: Choose your ’80s ride and start the journey! Neodori Infinity is a high speed road trip inspired by retro arcade classics, with powerful electronic beats and incredible drifts.

name: NeoFables
summary: First fully AI generated VR (WebXR) storytelling experience. Create your own storyline, character, and world, with total freedom to explore and interact.

name: Neffy: Moonlight Labyrinth
summary: Neffy -Moonlight Labyrinth- is a single-player action-puzzle game created specifically for the VR platform. Summoned to the VR world, you control Neffy, a girl who can transform into a cat, while manipulating the labyrinth's gimmicks to reach the labyrinth's exit.

name: Nefarious Dreams
summary:
Nefarious Dreams is a game that has Mario navigating a brand-new semi-linear set of 25 levels, boasting new graphics, enemy behaviour and environments plus some minor audio changes. It’s sure to keep both inexperienced and well-versed Mario players engaged as they try to puzzle out the path to the ending and find every secret level.

Oh yeah… and Mario goes to space. That is pretty cool.

name: Neon Hearts City
summary: A private investigator, tracking a missing person, uncovers a conspiracy between humans and androids and a secret that could change everything. Neon Hearts City is a retro point-and-click adventure that thrusts you into a grungy cyberpunk city of the future.

name: Nefiriya and the Sands of Eternity
summary: Nefiriya has just awakened from her 3,000-year slumber. Help her find a way out of the pyramid and begin a new life in the contemporary world! But beware—her destiny is in your hands. Collect gemstones along the way so she can live a wealthy and luxurious life.

name: Nefiriya x Super Astro Cat Bundle
summary: Nefiriya and the Sands of Eternity + Super Astro Cat Bundle

name: Need for Speed Deluxe Bundle
summary:
Get the complete Need for Speed experience with the Need for Speed Deluxe bundle. The Bundle includes:
- Need for Speed (2016) Deluxe Edition
- Need for Speed Rivals: Complete Edition

name: Neon Wasteland
summary:
In a desolate, windswept wasteland, a lone fast-food joint stands as the last bastion of hope. The Last Fry Stand. Once a bustling hub of neon-lit indulgence, it's now a deserted outpost, a relic of a bygone era.

You, a lone survivor, find yourself trapped within its confines. A mysterious corporation, intent on maintaining its iron grip, has unleashed a swarm of robotic crows to eliminate any potential threats. Armed with nothing but a trusty pistol, you must navigate the treacherous terrain, outsmart the relentless avian drones, and activate the dormant antenna on the roof.

Your mission: Send a desperate SOS, a beacon of hope for a long-awaited rescue. As you fight for survival, you'll uncover the dark secrets behind the desolate landscape and the corporation's sinister motives.

name: Neofall
summary: Neofall is a RPG-PLATFORMER combo. You make friends, solve puzzles, beat bosses, and overcome your inner demons.

name: Near the Sun: Chapter 1
summary: God's punishment burns the earth to ashes, and eventually consumes the underground world as well. A stylish 2D stealth action game where how you explore determines your fate. A boy carries his sister on his back and races through the underground world.

name: Necros no Yousai
summary: Coming from a promotional Candy Toy Made by Lotte Group, Necros no Yōsai is a JRPG set in an anime / manga, fantasy, turn-based with licensed title themes.

name: Neverwinter Nights: Enhanced Edition - Doom of Icewind Dale
summary:
After more than 20 years, the story of the Hero of Neverwinter finally continues in this epic new adventure from Luke Scull, fantasy author and lead designer of Tyrants of the Moonsea!

In the Ten Towns of Icewind Dale, the Hero of Neverwinter awakens. Stripped of their recent memories and left to die by a mysterious power, they must survive a dire threat to the dale as they seek the truth behind their abduction. The answers they discover will shape the very fate of the Forgotten Realms.

name: Never Experiment On Cats!
summary: The test cats have broken free! They're getting into all the equipment, from jetpacks to lawnmowers and paintball guns! Bounce, bash, and blast your way to the top of the scoreboard! Is there more to the lab? Who's behind it all? A family-friendly game you can play by yourself or with friends.

name: Necropolis Nights
summary: "Necropolis Nights" is a survival card game where you gather resources, craft, farm, and hunt by day, then fend off zombies at night. Strategize to survive and thrive in a world overrun by the undead.

name: Neon Apex: Beyond the Limit
summary: Earth 2124. Race for the soul of humanity. Take to the streets to earn cash, upgrade your ride and prove you’ve got what it takes to go beyond the limit of the Neon Apex.

name: NecroWorld
summary: NecroWorld is a RPG that takes place in the NecroCatic Games world with many unique characters, enemies, upgrades and collectibles!

name: Nelumbra
summary: Trapped in a timeloop with no memories, you are the Light Bearer, fighting to uncover the truth - but at what cost? Harness rhytmic auto-attacks and dashes as light fades around you, raising tension with every move. Shape your power, rewrite your path, and embrace eternity or break free.

name: Need for Kill
summary: Quake 3 but in 2D dimension, Launched in 2001 for Computers by the "NFK team"

name: Negative Energy
summary: Negative Energy is a tower defense game with basic RTS mechanics, where your goal is to defend the construction of a Dyson sphere, while fighting against waves of hundreds of enemies ships.

name: Nebulock
summary: Nebulock is a short bullet-hell game with intense gameplay, where the player must destroy bosses made of blocks, collect resources and upgrade his spaceship.

name: Necroflora
summary: A new evil has taken root - you. Become an ever-growing many-headed hydra. Feed upon your enemies, acquire powerful mutations and defeat the 4 kings and their armies.

name: Never Fall
summary: "Relax, listen to music, and guide the ball to reach the highest position in this physics-based adventure. Can you master the climb?"

name: Never Second in Rome
summary:
Never Second in Rome is a turn-based historical game with RPG and management elements. You take the role of a Roman centurion in the army of Julius Caesar.

Starting right before the beginning of the Gallic War, you will assume command of a century in a newly raised legion.

name: Nezha Legend
summary: This is an action shooting game. There will be 50 people on the game battlefield, including the player, but only one person can win in the end. The last remaining person can receive generous rewards. All in all, this game allows players to experience the thrilling atmosphere of the battlefield.

name: New Kids Nitro Racer
summary:
"New Kids Nitro Racer" is a racing game based on the Dutch movie "New Kids Nitro".

The game's levels are based on Maaskantje, the Dutch Village the New Kids series is based on, and the Dutch A2 motorway.

name: Newton Coin
summary: Newton Coin This is a clicker game. In the game, you need to click on the Coin. You'll get a random Newton - themed gold coin every three hours. With effort and luck, you can continuously expand your gold coin collection!

name: NetEscape
summary: Once a thriving 90s MMO, NetEscape now stands as a time capsule, housing a dark secret beneath its bright, colorful surface. With the server shutdown looming at midnight, explore, gather clues, and uncover the mystery hidden within NetEscape before the game—and its secrets—are lost forever.

name: Nerve
summary: Nerve is a 3D strategy game where you build and defend an expanding city under siege. Choose from 9 upgradeable building types and battle invaders in 4 game modes. Earn points, climb ranks, and lead your city to victory. Hold your nerve!

name: Netabare ga Hageshisugiru RPG: Saigo no Teki no Shoutai ha Yuusha no Chichi
summary: Netabare ga Hageshisugiru RPG is a Japanese RPG released in 2023. The game features spoilers throughout the story.

name: Netabare ga Hageshisugiru RPG 2: Shinyuu no Shin no Sugata ha Daimaou
summary: Netabare ga Hageshisugiru RPG 2 is a Japanese RPG released in 2024. The game features spoilers throughout the story.

name: Nebula Ball 3D
summary: It's 2250. Aliens and humans pack together in the Nebula Arena for the craziest sport in the galaxy: Bowling! From the dude that’s making Brooke Vs. World Doom comes an absolutely insane bowling game. Each game of bowling is played in a unique level with 10 different lanes, each one trickier than the last. Unlock crazy bowling balls by gaining experience points, which you can earn by scoring high and completing mini objectives that can differ per level.

name: New World: The Ideal World
summary: This world is crazy. This is the story of a cute ASCII art character living in a harsh world. A simple command-based RPG. ASCII Art charactor is from 2chan, but knowledge of 2chan is not required. Only Japanese is supported.

name: Nemiza's Verdict
summary: Nemiza's Verdict is a cooperative roguelite dungeon crawler where your soul takes over various monstrosities. Hunt down Nemiza and challenge their verdict in the twisted labyrinth of Lovence by evolving your monstrous abilities and remember skills from your past life.

name: Nexonauts
summary: Use your ship to explore a massive galaxy. Land on planets and gather resources to maintain and upgrade your ship! Invite your friends to help and set up jobs and missions.

name: Neo Static
summary: A simple 2D platformer about keeping your speed as much as possible. Use your parries to hit off walls and foes to traverse each stage's obstacles with style! Get familiar with each stage to shrink your time lower and lower 'till you reach the highest rank you can!

name: New Warfare
summary: New Warfare is a modern/sci-fi competitive stylised multiplayer first person shooter with multiple game modes. Use extremely fast arcade movements to annihilate your enemies !

name: Nephelia: Through the Clouds
summary: Take control of your own airship, hire people for your crew, help them on their personal stories, follow the trail of a whimsical inventor of the colonisation era, trade, fight, discover, and try to stay afloat.

name: Neon Ascending
summary: Grid management roguelike tower defense that emphasizes mechanics and features dazzling visual effects. Don't overthink it, just stack and play! Enhancement modules boost your attributes, affix modules change the mechanics, and more... all within the grid. Time to create a new and improved build!

name: NecroNegate
summary: A mysterious mansion where he arrives in pursuit of his missing lover In order to fight against the threats that are coming your way, you must collect the necessary items and and solve various tricks to open the closed door. What is the shocking truth that awaits you after overcoming various fears

name: New Yankee: The Way of the Knight - Collector's Edition
Necromancy for Homies
summary: Necromancy for Homies is a non-linear, black comedy surrealist visual novel, inspired by the legacy of punk band Sektor Gaza.

name: Necropolis Isle
summary: In this pulse-pounding multiplayer zombie wave game, players are thrust into a relentless battle for survival against hordes of the undead.

name: Next Player
summary: Next Player is a first-person psychological horror experience that starts as an ordinary platformer and drags you into a tension-filled nightmare.

name: New XCommander
summary: A Multiplayer 2-4 players Ship shooter game previoulys launched as a extension on Chrome addon market in 2004 but now have his own page on Itch.io on 2021.

name: Neogeo Arcade 1
summary: Explore one of the greatest arcade systems of all time with this collection of NEOGEO hits for Evercade. Includes METAL SLUG, THE KING OF FIGHTERS 2000, SHOCK TROOPERS, MAGICIAN LORD, SENGOKU and IRONCLAD.

name: Next Week at Freddy's
summary: Welcome to “Next Week at Freddy's”, a realism-based, fan-made reimagining of “Five Nights at Freddy's”. Powered by Unreal Engine 5, the game features enhanced graphics and spatial audio to immerse you in its atmosphere.

name: Neon Merger
summary: Click, Drag, and Drop shapes into each-other to merge them! A relaxing physics-based shape merging game. Play with a variety of colorful shapes in a limited play area with this simple yet addicting puzzle game. Get the highest score you can!

name: New Home
summary: During very tough times of being lonely and depressed, you feel like you have nothing left to lose anymore... until a new friend comes along...

name: Neverway
summary: After quitting her dead-end job, Fiona starts over on a farm and becomes the immortal herald of a dead god. Make friends, fight through horrors and pay your debt in this nightmarish life sim RPG.

name: New York Mysteries: Power of Art - Collector's Edition
Neon Knights
summary: Neon Knights is an action-packed, neon-drenched brawler that’s all about local & online multiplayer madness.

name: Neuro Nightmare
summary: Neuro Nightmare is a horror game that utilizes brain-computer interface technology to maximize immersion. Run all the levers and escape from boarding schools, running away from monsters. Your concentration and stability directly affect gameplay.

name: Nestlé: Mais Divertido
summary: Microsite launched by Nestle for brazil in 2003

name: Necro Blade
summary: Enter the world of darkness and save the town from damnation, as their only salvation! Will you save your village, or get consumed by death's grasp?

name: NecroCatic Clicker
summary: Increase the number of clicks while stylized miniatures fall from the sky and the background changes color in this brand new CLICKING game!! Features "peaceful & colorful clicking action", a NecroCat icon, rotating characters, music (from other amazing NecroCatic Games) and more!!

name: NEET Nectar's Abysmally Small Assortment
summary: A collection of very simple 1-3 input games.

name: Nemesis: Final Dragon Tower
summary: In Nemesis - FDT, build your team of 4 heroes from 7 unique classes and set off to climb an infinite tower where the fights intensify on each floor. No story, no ending: the goal is simple, go as far as possible to get the best score!

name: Nephilim
summary: Battle Angels and Demons alike as Strider Lazarus - a fighter born again to master Darkness and Light - in this student-made isometric combat game.

name: Nephilim
summary: The sun has set, and the long night begins.

name: Netveil
summary: A pixel art psychological horror game with a point-and-click system that takes the style of an interactive desktop environment.

name: Network Euphoria
summary: An erotic open-world "science adventure" in which you must solve mysteries by completing quests and forging relationships.

name: New Battle of Shanghai Beach
summary: Blood Battle Shanghai Beach is a shooting game! In the game, players will play the role of an anti Japanese hero named Hua Chenglong and complete a series of unlikely missions deep behind enemy lines

name: New Yankee: Through the History Mirror
summary: Guide John and Mary and their friends on two thrilling parallel escapades filled with excitement, perils, and regular errands! Explore mysterious lands and times, navigate mystical phenomena as you join them in traversing space and time.

name: Neocron Evolution
summary: Play with and against other players online in the post apocalyptic world of the 28th century. You become a citizen of one of the last mega cities on Earth (Neocron) and it is up to you whether you want to experience exciting adventures or just lead a normal life in this virtual world.

name: Neverwards
summary: Enter a world where the darkness consumes all. Choose your path as One of four classes and master powerful spells in a battle against the damed. Unravel the mysteries of Nevafall, collect loot and become stronger. Will you conquer the Evil that has risen or be lost to it forever?

name: Neon Overdrive
summary:
Neon Overdrive is an MBF21 project featuring 15 meticulously crafted maps by a talented team of eight mappers.
Explore various challenges, ranging from "classic" to "slaughter" styles, all infused with Vapor/Synthwave and Cyberpunk aesthetics.

The year is 198X. After chasing the fading sunset for what seems like a lifetime, you find yourself at the gates of Neon City:
A place for those who subconsciously yearn for the comfort of something long gone, where nostalgia and aesthetics collide into an array of pulsating lights.
Tired but hopeful, you enter these half-forgotten halls.

name: Neko Bakery
summary: The ultimate cat-baker puzzle is served – fresh and purr-fectly sweet!

name: NekoNeko Girls
summary: Many cute NekoNekoGirls appear! An easy puzzle game anyone can play!

name: Nephelem: A Path of Vice and Virtue
summary: A dark fantasy action roguelite where you battle through the afterlife. Embrace powerful virtues, face the consequences of vices, and uncover the truth behind personal tragedy. Play solo or online co-op in a world torn by eternal conflict.

name: Neko no Sentouki
summary: An Adventure Visual Novel where you can choose your protagonist – Play as Aiko or Hikaru as they try to uncover the secrets that lurk all around them in this character-driven story. Every choice you make will have an impact on the story.

name: Neon Roller
summary: The ultimate physics runner game set in a vibrant, neon-themed world! Navigate through dazzling landscapes filled with glowing obstacles, collect shimmering coins, and unlock a variety of exciting new themes and balls.

name: Negative Space
summary: A whimsical roguelike deckbuilder with rich card interactions and deep synergies. Strategize through perilous space missions by assembling powerful crewmates and gadgets. Can you beat your objectives before time runs out?

name: Necro Siege
summary: Battle the relentless horde of zombies, demons, and other horrors as you struggle to survive. Will you withstand the madness, or will it consume you?

name: Network Nodes
summary: Connect glowing nodes in this mesmerizing neon puzzle game. Design perfect networks across 30+ challenging levels with increasing complexity.

name: Need For Scream
summary: The year is 2010. You're going on a study exchange to Russia from the United States. You're also running your own blog, and everything is going great—until 2014... that is, until you learn about the cursed village and decide to go there to film a video for your followers.

name: Neither Dead nor Alive
summary: In Neither Dead or Alive, you awaken as a skeleton brought back to life by a young, overzealous necromancer. But something went wrong—you retained your will, your mind, and your burning desire for freedom. Trapped within the ominous castle of your creator, your journey to escape begins.

name: Netoff
summary: Focuses on Online Game style RPG parts that can be enjoyed with simple operations and Offline Meeting parts that allow you to enjoy the scenario of people inside. In the Offline Meeting part, you can set your character's room to the home screen, and you can go to the Offline Meeting or launch a game and select various actions. Since the conversation of the Offline Meeting is seen only monologue of the chosen character, it is also one of the highlight that the way of seeing the scenario differs depending on the operation character.

name: Neon Eclipse: Dominium
summary: “Neon Eclipse: Dominium” is a 2D cyberpunk metroidvania where you play as a ninja fighting against mega-corporations. Choose between 2 heroes, use genetic, cybernetic or traditional abilities. Explore interconnected worlds, unlock skills, produce weapons and face biomechanical bosses.

name: Nemesis Shock
summary: Nemesis Shock is a twin stick shooter rogue-lite. Take control of your prototype mech, the Nemesis, and cut though hordes of enemies. Use your quick movements and overwhelming firepower to survive.

name: Neohell
summary: A fast-paced survivors-like shooter with roguelite elements and round-based progression. Blast your way through demonic hordes in a futuristic post-apocalyptic world, fight bosses, upgrade your weapons and abilities, and survive the chaos of the NEOHELL

name: Nemorsys
summary:
Nemorsys is a punishing stealth-action RPG where frontal assaults are fatal.

Forge a dark pact with an ancient wraith and hunt down the corrupted King Murab. But be warned: the power to kill comes at the cost of your humanity.

Outwit relentless enemies, manipulate light sources to create your path, and manage scarce resources in a world where every mistake is fatal.

Your light is fading. Can you master the darkness before it consumes you?

name: Neogeo Arcade 2
summary: Enjoy six more classics from the golden age of pixel art! Includes GAROU: MARK OF THE WOLVES, ART OF FIGHTING 2, METAL SLUG 2, CROSSED SWORDS, NINJA COMMANDO and SENGOKU 2.

name: Neogeo Arcade 3
summary: NEOGEO Arcade 3 brings six more NEOGEO legends to Evercade for the first time. Prove your martial prowess in the fighting game classics THE KING OF FIGHTERS ’97 and SAMURAI SHODOWN II, fend off alien mischief in METAL SLUG 3, master the innovative competitive shoot ’em up action of TWINKLE STAR SPRITES, and more!

name: Never's End
summary: Never's End is a turn-based tactical RPG where you return from death into the midst of a global cataclysm. Possess townsfolk to use them as living weapons, wield the forces of nature to reshape the battlefield, and lead mankind back from the brink of extinction.

name: Next Business Trip
summary: You will be spending a horror filled 3 nights at the hotel. Your room this time around, is a rather large one complete with a bed and bath.

name: Necromancer Nonsense
summary:
It's the blood moon! Time to take over the world... or it would be if every other half baked necromancer and vampire wasn't trying the same thing.

Capture buildings and locations full of bits and bobs you can use to build your army, and conquer all!

Made in 1 month for the "Games for Blind Gamers" game jam! So should be fully blind accessible.

name: Necrofane
summary: A dark power is rising. Defeat the necromancer and his generals before they conquer the kingdom. In this old school dark fantasy RPG, explore cursed dungeons, battle monstrous foes, master forbidden magic, and gather powerful loot in a world teetering on the edge of ruin.

name: Necromance
summary: A brave hero and a bound lich rescue a legendary warrior from a forgotten tomb and put the romance back in necromancy. Necromance is a dark fantasy comedy visual novel with light puzzle elements, 3 endings, and 15 ways to die!

name: Neoclassical: Chromaticist
summary: Playing Classical Music and Classical gameplay in a new way. An alternative aesthetic and classical Feeling. A great chance to reach the first step of classical music. Rotate the falling blocks, and master the color and music. By the way, it could save your neck somehow!

name: NecroMerc
summary: Play as X a mercenary whose job is being replaced by robots and is reskilling into necromancy.

name: Neon Striker
summary: Configure the weaponry on your ship to blast away enemies as you navigate through swarms of bullets and space battles. Each ship has unique customization options and playstyles.

name: Neither Cross Nor Crown
summary: A colorful souls-like late medieval power fantasy. Duel knights and strange creatures in a world loosely based on the Peasants' War of 1525. Collect unique weapons and armor and visit striking, atmospheric places!

name: Neon Cipher
summary: Neon Cipher is an action-packed puzzle-platformer designed for smooth and engaging gameplay. Across 50 levels, you'll use third- and first-person mechanics to solve intricate puzzles and battle enemies blocking your path.

name: Neko Neko Love
summary: Have you ever wanted to be a cat? To eat, sleep and play without a care in the world? Well, wish granted! There's just a tiny catch - you have to get adopted before a deadly Magic Storm.. Fortunately, you're the cutest. Unfortunately... you're also the meanest.

name: Neon Highways
summary: Welcome to a retro-futuristic '80s world of supercars, neon-lit cities, and synthwave beats. Neon Highways is an arcade racer where you cruise through vibrant cityscapes and endless highways, all set to an iconic synthwave soundtrack.

name: Neon Knives
summary: Two of you do not belong. Neon Knives is an award-winning couch multiplayer game of stealth and deception. Blend into the crowd, hunt down your opponent, and take them out—all while being hunted yourself. Trust no one.

name: Neon Colony
summary: Neon Colony is an isometric tower defense game where you build your own road to access and harvest the resources of an alien planet. Deal with the resistance of the local population and fulfill this noble mission for your generous corporate benefactors.

name: Neon Warfield
summary: A casual-style tower battle game with eight unique forces, each with distinct combat mechanics. To defeat different enemy forces, you'll need to adapt your strategy and pay attention to the moment you activate skills. Defeating enemys in battle allows you to unlock new forces.

name: Nethermage
summary: Brave the depths of the Nether, confronting relentless hordes of monstrous foes and the madness of ancient elder gods, in this thrilling survival roguelite!

name: Neko Ningen Eugene
summary:
The year is 2020, and it is off the coast of the Sea of ​​Okhotsk.

A "portal" suddenly appears on the bottom of the sea, leading to a different space-time.
The unknown wilderness beyond it is called the "Demon World."

name: Nebs' Island Adventure
summary:
Nebs' Island Adventure is a 3D platformer where you play as a leopard gecko girl Nebs. Her goal is to reach the top of a mountain in a small island to find the golden cricket and prove leopard geckos are great climbers too.

While exploring the island Nebs can also collect normal crickets. Can she find them all?

name: Netherwake
summary: Experience a nerve-racking adventure as a thick, dark fog begins to roll into the small town from the surrounding forests, and with it come ancient, cosmic beings from outside our reality. Try to survive and pray that you will one day see the sunlight again.

name: NeverHome: Tower of Vanity
summary: NeverHome - Tower of Vanity is the second chapter of the NeverHome horror anthology. Explore an abstract new world and use your wits to solve its mysteries and find a way out.

name: Never7: Kurumi Cure
summary: Fan-made rewrite of the Kurumi Route of Never7: The End of Infinity

name: Nested
summary: Nested is a cute grid-based puzzle game made around the concept of russian nesting dolls. Come twist your brain as you stack, push and interact with the various objects you'll find in each levels. Let's see if you can reach the right combination of nesting dolls to solve every one of them!

name: Nezori
summary: Embark on a cute action RPG adventure as a fox girl searching for the legendary hot springs in a land of fox and wolf girls!

name: Nekomin Kittens Invasion
summary: Nekomin is a cute puzzle action game where you use a cat toy to guide kittens into a hole! Solve puzzles with items and tricks within the time limit or simply enjoy watching the kittens play. Collect sneaky thief cats and complete your Neko List Collection!

name: Neoblazer
summary: Blast through the galaxy as Drax Gorbuloid, a grumpy space janitor of mega-corp Binary Express, tangled in a deadly corporate conspiracy. Clean up cosmic messes, uncover secrets, and try to survive across hostile planets in this darkly comedic sci-fi action adventure created by Pantelis Kassotis.

name: Nekogumi
summary:
Join Bruce, a tuxie who loves to cosplay and roam around town. Spruce up the cat café and buy all sorts of wardrobe items you want. Gather your brigade and let your curiosity guide you, you get a free pass as a cat boss~

Nekogumi is a single player, third person cafe-adventure game. It is a cozy game where you’d find companions among silly and funny animals and work together to protect and bring prosper to the neighbourhood.

name: Neverland: Aeterna Chronicles
summary:
A fantastic adventure awaits—are you ready, adventurers?

Journey through an ancient world with fellow and uncover its countless wonders!

Experience thrilling encounters, forge new friendships, and battle alongside adventurer.

Brave the lands of mythical beasts, capture and tame them to fight by your side.

Embark on the Neverland, and carve your chronicle!

name: Nelli the Seer
summary: Nelli The Seer is a third-person platformer and memory game. Jump, glide and see the future to collect the treasures present in the Templo Mayor. Collect the fragments of the obsidian mirror to show the future to your people.

name: Neko Gelato
summary: Puzzle out your sweetest confectionery!

name: New Era Old World
summary: This mod is set in the post-apocalyptic Old World, in the year 2555. Play in North Africa, Europe and as far east as Japan or Darwin Australia, trying to build an Empire in these unfamiliar times. New music from Derek and Brandon Fietcher.

name: Neon Hyperdrive
summary: A rhythm racer like you've never seen before: drift corners, surf waves, and fly through neon skies to the rhythm of the music.

name: Nectaris: Military Madness
summary:
An updated version of Military Madness (known in Japan as Nectaris) for PlayStation.

The game modes featured include Main Campaign, Original Campaign, Mini-Campaigns, and Single Scenario.

name: Nectaris Cellular
summary: Developed & published by Hudson Soft. Hudson ported the original 1989 PC-Engine Nectaris to several cell phone gaming platforms: i-mode ( NTT / DoCoMo ), AU / KDDI, and most recently, Vodafone. Note: Nectaris was one of many titles in Hudson's back-catalogue that have been ported for cellular gaming including a significant number of other hits (and misses) from the PC-Engine library.

name: Netcode The Protogen
summary:
Prologue – Awakening in Neon
The world is no longer what it was. Once shaped by the rise of human civilization, Earth has splintered into a chaotic blend of overgrown ruins and evolving machines. Climate collapse, digital wars, and lost centuries have left behind a ravaged planet—one now consumed by diverse, unpredictable biomes: toxic deserts, jungles laced with nanite storms, shattered cities reclaimed by rogue flora, and oceans shimmering with radioactive shimmersteel.

Floating above this scarred planet is Neovara—a breathtaking metropolis built and maintained by the Protogens, cybernetically enhanced synthetic beings born of humanity’s final technological era. Sleek, intelligent, and partially organic, Protogens constructed Neovara to preserve advanced life and knowledge. Towering spires of chromed glass, living machines, and holographic networks define its skyline. Within it, everything is calculated, optimized, and connected. The city pulses like a living circuit board in the sky.

You awaken in one of its containment facilities, unaware of who you are or how you got there. Rebuilt with artificial limbs, a reinforced spine, and a data-linked brain, you are no longer entirely human. They call you the Anomaly—a being that shouldn’t exist. Protogens reconstructed your dying body with forbidden technology after recovering you from an unregistered crash site on the surface. They won’t say why they did it. They won’t explain what they fear. But you can see it in their eyes—coded eyes that flicker when they speak to you.

They’re hiding something.

name: New Yankee: Through the History Mirror - Collector's Edition
summary: Save John and Mary from the time loop they've gotten themselves into. The collector's edition includes 15 additional levels, a strategy guide, 2 mini games and more.

name: Nekro3
summary:
NEKRO3 is a dark 2D horror-puzzle game with stealth elements.
You are terminally ill. Somewhere in the depths lies a stone that can heal.
But the deeper you go, the more you die. And every death becomes your enemy.

name: Neo: The Rainbow Sorcerer
summary: A 2D bullet hell plane shooter game with a creative twist in gameplay—instead of shooting down enemies, pick a matching color and swipe them.

name: New York Mysteries: The Outbreak - Collector's Edition
summary: Laura and her trusty workmate Will are investigating the complex case of a bizarre disease that’s plaguing the city. They discover that it might have something to do with a mysterious artifact preserved in the archives of a secret order. There is a shadow hanging over New York City and time is running out. The collector's edition includes a bonus gameplay chapter, ingame strategy guide and other goodies.

name: Netflix Stories: Sex Education
summary: Netflix Stories game based on the popular Netflix series Sex Education.

name: Necrodungeon
summary: Fight the undead scorge. Upgrade your powers. Retrieve holy relics. Free the world. NECRODUNGEON is a procedural retro first-person dungeon crawler where you can combine countless powers to raise against the forces of evil.

name: Netflix Stories
summary: Find adventure in "Outer Banks," romance with “Emily in Paris,” or unexpected choices in the “Love Is Blind” pods. Between “Perfect Match” shenanigans and “Selling Sunset” drama, there are so many options in this collection — which story will you choose? You’re the main character in this interactive story game featuring an array of stories based on Netflix's hit shows and films.

name: NetDive
summary: NetDive is a short, experimental incremental game about an AI learning what makes a human human.

name: Nekurogahara: Psycho Ronins
summary: First entry in the Nekurogahara trilogy: a Techno-Horror 3D Fighter Sandbox about 110912122515211819051206 160905030515061908092006210311251521

name: New Lands 4: Legends of Tenkai
summary: John Brave and Ronan O'Keir set off in search of the lost Empire of Tenkai. Become part of history and leave your mark for centuries to come!

name: Neon Divide
summary: An action RPG blending mechanical Cthulhu aesthetics with class-based storytelling. Players control a genius girl who, armed with a modular weapon system, fights against three major factions and uncovers the truth behind the breakdown of the pact across two parallel worlds.

name: Necomen
summary: Find cats that live in the city and befriend them! This game is about exploring one city and befriending the cats. 5 days later, invite many cats to a festival day.

name: Neko Kitchen
summary: To survive, you sign a contract: in a world where animals have become catgirls, bring one catgirl the greatest happiness within a month, and you'll receive 600,000 to save your life.

name: Necrotyper
summary:
Necrotyper is a typing-based action-adventure game with elements of RPG and strategy. The player controls an undead army indirectly by typing spells to support it. There is no direct unit control; gameplay focuses on typing to influence battles.

Typing speed is important to avoid being overwhelmed by enemies, but accuracy also plays a role—mistake-free typing increases spell effectiveness. Spells can be upgraded over time to help manage the increasing number of enemies.

name: NectorX
summary: NectorX is an arcade rail shooter inspired by games from the 80s and 90s. Control a spaceship and fight against rogue machines.

name: Neon Overdrive
summary: Neon Overdrive is a procedural generated, rogue-like, VR shooter set in an 80s-inspired Retro Futuristic Sci-Fi world. Fight your way through hordes of Exo Bots utilizing four unique character classes, special abilities and a variety of perk combinations.

name: Neko Bento 2
summary: Get ready to stretch your brain and your belly — the cutest lunchbox puzzle is back with even more satisfying challenges!

name: Neo: The World Ends with You x Field Walk RPG
summary:
NEO: The World Ends with You x FIELD WALK RPG is a spin-off mobile title set in the TWEWY series, that was an Augmented Reality Game combining an in-game experience in the mobile title with a real world event around Shibuya, Tokyo.

Running in 2021, FIELD WALK RPG set the player within the universe of NEO: The World Ends with You and had them collaborate with the characters from the original game to escape the Reapers Game. Using hints inside the game, players would physically travel around Shibuya and interact with QR codes and other scannable items to progress the story, interact with characters standing around the city, and engage in battles against the Noise.

By progressing through the app and completing major Missions and special EX Missions, players could also receive exclusive themed merchandise as free rewards by checking in with the location and confirming progress, such as special pins and cards.

name: Neon Shot
summary: A neon-themed physics puzzle game where you flick a glowing square through challenging levels. Launch, bounce, and strategize your way through stylish mazes filled with momentum-based mechanics and time-based goals.

name: Nettle Slasher
summary: Slash, poke, and blast your way through a backyard overrun with stinging nettles. Armed with makeshift stick weapons, reclaim the garden like you're a kid again. Step past the old mysterious gate into a place best left undisturbed – but make sure you're back before dinnertime... in one piece.

name: Neon Raiders
summary: From the creators of Mutant Year Zero comes a bold new take on turn-based tactics: a fast-paced, 1-4 player co-op heist game where you and your crew act as one. Build your team of raiders, take on high-stakes raids, and experience tactical combat like never before, no waiting, just pure action.

name: Neon Tea
summary: Fight Monsters, bake Cookies and cook Tea for the exatraordinary visitors of the Teahouse, and make dubious Trades - do not get cursed, though!

name: Necromental
summary: An incremental RPG about unholy, untamed, uncontrollable... necromancy.

name: Neuroarena: Black Duel Master
summary: Neuroarena is a free online card game featuring unique generated cards that evolve over time. Engage in PvP duels, explore a vast card universe, and enjoy strategic battles in an ever-evolving world. Perfect for fans of collectible card games and epic hero clashes!

name: Neon Exploding Bread
summary: NEON EXPLODING BREAD is a rhythm game where you sync your mouse to hit every glowing beat flying towards you!

name: Neptune
summary: This was originally going to be a twine text game, but i realized i forgot most of what little html i knew so i made it in construct3 which in the end gave me more freedom to try fun stuff

name: Neuroxus
summary: A third-person, mech-powered, fast-paced shooter with roguelite elements—Doom-like intensity in a lifeless machine-ruled world.

name: Nemesis Galaxy at War
summary: An endless sci-fi asteroid shooter where each level gets harder. Battle enemies, collect upgrades, and survive infinite waves of intense space combat!

name: Netflix Puzzled
summary: Netflix Puzzled brings together classic and all new puzzle games on Tudum. Engage your mind with daily puzzles for Bonza, Jigsaw, Sudoku, and more – and explore puzzle collections featuring your favorite Netflix worlds.

name: Nex-Ara
summary: Nex-Ara is a tactical sci-fi strategy game where you command a fleet of ships in order to protect your home system from an alien threat. Forge interplanetary connections and select between 3 upgrades because it is a roguelike to defeat your enemies across a shifting galactic battlefield.

name: NewMonster
summary: This is typical Survivor Rogue Like game with diffrent heroes , skills and controls for your best experience.

name: New Times
summary: You are a rebel in the citadel about to become a stalker, until the citadel collapsed. After you broke free, you need to escape the citadel, and then escape City 17!

name: New Supper Banana!
summary: Adventure! Drama! New Supper Banana! is a funny adventure platformer drawn entirely in a notebook!

name: Next In Line
summary: Become a cashier at a charming local supermarket! Scan, bag, and total up groceries for a quirky stream of customers. Each checkout is cozy, complete with mini-games. Carefully bag your customer’s items, keep the line moving, manage special requests and upgrade your cashier station.

name: Neko Waifu
summary: Move all parts to form the complete image.

name: Neon Idle
summary: Buy the neons and earn money as much as you can! - Enjoy the enthusiasm of the neon design. - Enjoy the chain effect of skills, terrains, and upgrades. - Calculate which upgrade can effectively increase the normal earning of money!

name: Need to Go Deeper
summary: a short horror game where you have to dive into the unknown abyss and set beacons at the specified coordinates.

name: NewHrdGame
summary:
Huarongdao is an ancient Chinese folk puzzle game. It is synonymous with traditional Chinese educational toys such as Tangram and Puzzle ring, and is called "China's problem".

By moving each slider, help Cao Cao move the lowest middle of the layout panel from the initial position and escape from the exit. It is not allowed to cross the slider, and try to move Cao Cao to the exit with the least number of steps.

name: Ne Padai!
summary: Very simple but colorful arcade with great music and stylish graphics.

name: Nekomimi Nikki
summary: Nekomimi Nikki is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls. The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: Neko Girls
summary: This game is a classic memory game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts. Enjoy ;-)

name: Neon Digital
summary: Shoot portals and curve grenades through them in this fast-paced 1v1 or 3v3 arena shooter. Place portals strategically to outmaneuver opponents on the battlefield. Win by scoring in the net, controlling objective points, or eliminating the enemy team. Master portal tactics to dominate the arena.

name: Nexo
summary: Troublemaker new cops Lia and Nia wake up an unidentified core during the operation. "Fight to protect the city!"

name: Neave
summary: Neave is an atmospheric parkour game. The world is made up of beautiful vistas and narrow alleyways that come together to create moments of intense beauty and fast paced platforming.

name: Neko Ramen
summary: Get ready to stretch your brain and your belly — the cutest ramen puzzler is piping hot!

name: New Lands: Legends of Tenkai - Collector's Edition
Neffy: Moonlight Labyrinth X
summary: Neffy -Moonlight Labyrinth X- is an action puzzle game where you team up with the young shrine maiden Neffy to solve riddles and overcome traps in a fantasy maze.Originally developed for VR, the game has been carefully optimized for consoles—now more accessible than ever!

name: NeverAwake Flashback
summary: The side story to the nightmare shooter NeverAwake is here! Why is this young girl being tormented by nightmares once again? Dive into a roguelite reimagination of the original with all-new features!

name: Negotiation Love
summary: 'It's a hundred years early to go out with me!' One day after school, I was treated coldly by her for never confessing! She tried to leave, but without giving up, I approached her to negotiate. Will I be able to become Hogetsu's lover beyond the tremendous time of 100 years...?

name: Neon Nexus
summary: Neon Nexus is a beat em' up game where you ride a skateboard and attack with your yoyo that takes place in a world with infected people, one day our protagonist MAX! wakes up by a loud noise coming from the backyard, when he goes to check he sees that... SOMEONE IS STEALING HIS FAVORITE SKATEBOARD! When Max finds out about this, he gets ready to go in search of his favorite skateboard! but there is one issue... he is going to have to use his 2nd favorite skateboard, which let's just say... is not the best of all

name: Neko Café Stories
summary: Sweet atmosphere, charming girls, and bubbles.

name: Neural Tanks
summary: Neural Tanks is a third-person tank combat game that takes AI to the next level by leveraging Neural Networking. Neural Networking allows enemy tanks to learn and adapt over time, making them smarter, faster, and more efficient as they navigate the battlefield.

name: Necroa Village
summary: Welcome to the Necroa village, a place that was once a beautiful & thriving with life. Unfortunately it has been struck with a painful and terrifying plague that is consuming life and beginning to spread. You must find all survivors and fight your way out the Dead Necroa before.... *signal Lost*

name: Neko Tissue
summary: NEKO TISSUE — A surreal, relaxing clicker game. Become a cat and scatter tissues endlessly. No need to think about meaning — just enjoy it. Happiness, spread across the floor.

name: NecroKitty
summary: Precision platformer set in a gothic minimalist shadow world. Cut down a path, defy gravity, and unleash your inner strength to find your way out.

name: Next of Kin: Fidelity
summary:
Do you remember your worst nightmare?

In Next of Kin: Fidelity, you follow Bjorn, a man haunted by a past that refuses to let go. A single event from his childhood still clings to him like a shadow.

Every night, he wakes up drenched in sweat, trapped in the same nightmare over and over again. But what is it that's haunting him – and how, or who, can set him free?

name: Neverless Academy
summary: Neverless Academy is a multiplayer-ish, singleplayer-ish, horror-ish, school-ish, life-choice-ish game. Basically, you wander a cursed academy while NPCs pretend to have lives and a monster ruins yours.

name: Neptune Spear
summary: Team up with a female sniper to take out the terrorists! Share the Joy-Con controller for an arcade-style two-player experience!

name: Netbreak
summary: Welcome to Netbreak, a horror-puzzle experience. When a mysterious USB drive arrives on your desk, your curiosity drags you into a nightmare. Piece together clues, watch forbidden videos, and take down an underground SNUFF marketplace, that allows you to see interactive torture and murder.

name: New Yankee: Pirate Trap
summary: Just when King Arthur's heroes thought they'd earned a break, the Gremlin pulled a mysterious chest from the sea. Captain Ghost, the chest’s owner, casts Camelot’s heroes to an uninhabited island, where they must compete for their freedom!

name: Neon Paddles: Revenge of the Ball
summary: Become a thirsty for revenge pong ball, reverse the situation, and destroy paddles that used you as their plaything, shatter anything that stands in your way! Neon paddles: Revenge of the Ball is a reverse pong game with rogue-like elements.

name: New Yankee: The Way of the Knight
summary: King Arthur has called upon his two most trusted heroes, Sir John and Lady Mary, for another mission. Finally, Merlin's lies have been revealed. Now, the time has come to set things right.

name: Necrologium
summary: Seven corrupted souls died in one fateful night. Discover their sins and unravel the mystery that surrounds their mortal shells.

name: Neuter Master
summary: A lighthearted roguelite breeding game where you match animals on a customizable grid, earn gold with slot-machine-style combos, and balance breeding, sterilizing, and upgrades to keep your herd thriving year after year.

name: Next Run
summary: Fantasy strategy RPG with roguelike elements. A game about choice: every mechanic is an alternative to another. Fight or bribe, craft or trade, build or cast. Find your own path and reach victory.

name: Never Trust a Fox: Pink Poison
summary: One rainy day you come home from the store and find a wounded fox on the road. In spite of your strict parents who forbid you to have pets, you decide to take her in.

name: Nekomimi Destruction
summary: The main character is an extraordinary transfer student! A 3D action game in which a martial arts schoolgirl goes on a rampage at school! Anyway, beat them all up!

name: Nearly Impossible Odds
summary: Nearly Impossible Odds is an idle game where you increase the chances of unlikely events happening at the same time!

name: Next of Kin Duo Bundle
summary: This bundle includes the first two entries in the Next of Kin series: *Next of Kin *Next of Kin: Fidelity

name: Nebula Cleanup Crew
summary: Nebula Cleanup Crew is a short top down action roguelite shooter with a focus on hot and cold weaponry. Rescue your crew members as you blast enemies and bosses away with super heated and chilled weapons — freeze foes, overheat them and unleash powerful supertemp special attacks!

name: NeoHack
summary: "NeoHack" features a unique hacking-themed elimination gameplay—take down major security systems!

name: Neighborhood Video
summary: Solve puzzles, comb the store database, and stock shelves, and maybe Mr. Manager will consider letting you go home after your first shift at the eternally understaffed local video rental, Neighborhood Video. Did you think clocking out would be easy? As if!

name: Negotiations Have Failed!
summary: Fight off the Aetheryx invasion in brutal, turn-based card battles across civilization's ruins. Choose your targets wisely as dice rolls and the luck of the draw determine attack damage. Master three unique classes, endure waves of enemies, and prepare to invade and destroy the Aetheryx Lair!

name: Neuromira: First Death
summary: "Can you reach Level 0?" Trapped in an endless loop, you must descend through a decaying, shifting building. Reality distorts, NPCs glitch, and something is watching. Find anomalies and escape before the system corrects you. A cyber-horror survival mystery awaits.

name: New Eyes Cycle
summary: A ten minute mystery.

name: NEPO Missions
summary: In NEPO Missions players can go on a mission to Mars with the rover "Rosa". They learn how to use the graphical block-based programming language "NEPO" from Fraunhofer IAIS to control the rover.

name: Neon Strike
summary: Quick reflexes, color swaps, and instant retries! Neon Strike is an easy to control action-puzzler set in a vibrant neon world. Easy to play, tough to master.

name: Nemunai
