summary: Experience the essence of the 90s in this survival horror game, a tribute to classic horror and fighting games. Explore labyrinths, solve puzzles, battle otherworldly entities, and survive the curse that manifests itself in spirals throughout the town of Nemunai.

name: News Company Simulator
summary: Become a journalist in a dynamic newsroom where every call is a new lead. Investigate news, capture breaking stories with your camera, and expand your newspaper business in a living, breathing city. Will you chase sensational headlines or uphold journalistic integrity?

name: New Folder
summary:
New Folder is a short mystery, puzzle narrative with a twist!

Explore the computer and uncover the secrets hidden within.

name: Nekopara Love Project Vol. 2
summary:
NEKOPARA, the popular visual novel series that has sold over 6.5 million copies worldwide, now has a remake version for smartphones!

With enhanced graphics, fresh recordings from a new cast of voice actors, and exclusive episodes, this powered-up remake is ready for Masters all around the world!

name: Nekopara Love Project Vol. 3
summary:
NEKOPARA, the popular visual novel series that has sold over 6.5 million copies worldwide, now has a remake version for smartphones!

With enhanced graphics, fresh recordings from a new cast of voice actors, and exclusive episodes, this powered-up remake is ready for Masters all around the world!

name: Neon Abyss 2: Archenemy Returns
summary: All 34 bosses from the original Neon Abyss have returned! After skill optimizations, visual effects upgrades, and complete reworks of some manager bosses, they've fully evolved! Are you ready to face their wrath?

name: Nexen
summary: A first-person horror action game set inside a shifting neon maze where the player must collect orbs, complete objectives, and survive. In NEXEN, you navigate dark corridors while being hunted by a relentless entity that reacts to sound and movement. Each mode changes the rules—Classic focuses on survival and orb collection, while Task Mode adds objectives and hazards. Blending retro visuals, industrial sound design, and high-intensity chases, the game challenges players to stay calm, adapt, and escape before the maze consumes them.

name: NebulaStrike
summary: Nebula Strike is a space-themed 2.5D top-down twin-stick shooter game. This is the first game I independently developed, and I hope you have fun playing it. If you have any comments or suggestions, please leave them in the comment section. Thank you again for playing my game.

name: New Lands: The Shadow of Alvaria
summary: Messages in bottles become a map leading to a great mystery!

name: Neoditronix
summary: The dreamcore rhythm experience.

name: Necromancer
summary: This is a single-player strategy management simulation game where players assume the role of a powerful necromancer. Through special events or battles, players acquire various resources to build a massive undead army that overwhelms enemies.

name: Nephila
summary: For as long as memory serves, a tower reaching all the way to heaven has served as the center of human civilization, its upper floors shrouded in mystery. But recently, legions of monsters have been unleashed upon the world, sent by Aeus, the lord of Pandemonium. Now you must arm yourself, and find a way to reach him. Explore the world, battle monsters, find upgrades, and learn the ancient secrets.

name: Neko Commando
summary: Neko Commando is an Anime MMOFPS that features the ability to switch between Ranged and Melee. In ranged form you have a vast assortment of weapons at your disposal, giving you an advantage at a distance. Melee form has no ranged attacks but is faster, stronger, and more robust.

name: New York Mysteries
summary: A story of a fearless journalist who confronts the supernatural forces threatening New York.

name: NEH
summary: noEndHOUSE is a cooperative horror game where players explore dark, monster-filled environments, solve deadly puzzles, and face moral choices. Trust your team — unless one of them is infected.

name: Ned's Garden
summary: The player helps Ned tidy up his garden which involves avoiding various creatures while navigating the maze. Once all items are collected, Ned must find the shed key and lock the shed. This adds an additional layer of challenge as players must remember the key's location and manage their movements wisely.

name: Nekomimi Days: 365 Days With You
summary:
On a rainy night, Yuto, a freelance illustrator, encounters a mysterious girl named Milk with cat ears in a back alley. After taking in the non-human girl, Yuto’s once-quiet daily life becomes lively and warm. Milk's pure and innocent reactions to modern civilization gently heal Yuto's heart. As they spend time together, the two gradually form a bond as if they were a true family.
This is a heartwarming visual novel about the gentle connections that transcend species and background.

name: Neath
summary: Manipulate the turns of friend and foe alike in this Eldritch roguelike tactical RPG by the makers of Rogue Legacy. Ascend the inverted tower. Kill an indolent god. Control every "moment".

name: Neodarlo
summary:
Race a hover car around 2 tracks with 3 modes: normal race where you have to come first in 2 laps, royale where you win when you reach first place against a large number of cars and bomb where you race around 1 lap dodging balls which are dropped by a large hovercar which stays in the lead at all times.
4 people can play all the above modes against each other in local split screen multiplayer.

name: Neverending AI Storybook
summary: Personalized AI-powered storytelling, built for you. Runs entirely on your machine with no online servers and no data collection, for the ultimate privacy.

name: Necrology
summary: Waking up in Terra-Nova, you find a dying colony ruled by cybernetic drones and a rogue machine mind. Necrology is a fast, brutal retro FPS inspired by the 90s. Grab your shotgun and rocket launcher and fight your way through the metal horde.

name: Neuralimina
summary: A point-and-click descent into dreams. Explore what remains when the others never woke up.

name: Neidfyre
summary: Neidfyre is a turn-based duel game forged in fire and steel. Step into a cursed land of no escape. Survive against those who stand in your way and fulfill your purpose.

name: Necromaster
summary: The Necromaster rises again! Raise the dead and reclaim your kingdom from the man who murdered you in this tactical RPG.

name: New Yankee: Under the Genie's Thumb - Collector's Edition
New Yankee: Battle for the Bride - Collector's Edition
Neon Orbit
summary: Neon Orbit is a radial gravity puzzle roguelite. Rotate the world 360°, stack blocks toward the core, and break the rules of the game by building your own deck of upgrades. Drill through defenses, manipulate time, and survive the collapse of the system. Rotate, stack, upgrade, repeat.

name: Nebula Veil
summary: Only tiny, fragile shuttle between you and open space. Beyond it, wreckages drift in blood-red fog. The longer you’re alone, the less dead the cosmos around feel. Survival isn’t enough. Seek answers, analyze data, examine anomalies. To unveil fog’s secret, every detail matters.

name: Neighbor Master
summary: Your neighbor just bought a SPORTS CAR. You? You're broke. But you have a shovel and a backyard full of... opportunity. Dig, melt, and bottle snow to build a "Premium Glacier Water" empire. Send in the drones, upgrade your gear, and save up for a ride that will make his car look like a cheap toy.

name: Nest of Dust
summary: A mouse alone in a poisoned house. Free the ghosts of your colony, protect your brothers, and uncover what the fog left behind.

name: Neon City
summary: Build your empire in the futuristic city where light and shadow intertwine - "Neon City" will bring you an unprecedented strategic management experience. As an independent game that combines cyberpunk style with gorgeous pixels, the realistic light and shadow effects will immerse you in it.

name: Neko-Nin exHeart Spin! Love+Plus
summary: Kikumaru and his ninja compatriots are back in this fan disc to NEKO-NIN exHeart SPIN! Enjoy a relaxing episode with each of the heroines of this series. Nin nin!

name: Neon Mind
summary: A single-player turn-based puzzle game that will thoroughly tease your brain

name: Nerve Damage
summary: A fun first person shooter that also makes you feel horrible. Try to get combos while coping with loud noises, overwhelming visuals and hordes of enemies. Pain = gain.

name: NemoSphere
summary: This is the easy-play shooter

name: Need for Race Street King & Formula Auto Sport Racing Pack
summary: From the streets to the circuit - master them both.

name: Neuron Activation
summary: A frantic rhythm-puzzle game filled with micro-challenges. Push buttons, flip switches, shoot targets and more in search of high scores to appease your overlords.

name: News Roll
summary: An educational dice-rolling board game where you answer real news quiz questions while traveling through the calendar. Roll, learn, and test your knowledge across 9 categories in 4 languages.

name: Neurosis
summary: A psychological horror anomaly horror puzzle game where the player explores looping corridors, observes environmental details, and solves puzzles to escape the endless repetition.

name: Neaten Up!
summary: Neaten Up! is a game where you vacuum up clutter, finding new furniture, and uncover hidden messes in maze-like rooms that unfold as you go.

name: Nekomichi
summary: Build and manage a cozy Meiji-era street for cats. customize buildings, balance tradition and modernity, and create a peaceful cat community

name: Neko Station
summary: Sit back and relax with Neko Station, a cozy 2D Pixel Art Desktop Idle Game! Manage your very own 'cat train,' decorating it with the perfect furniture to attract a diverse cast of feline customers. Pick them up at various stations and build friendships in this heartwarming adventure.

name: Neopets: Mega Mini Games Collection - The Neopian Arcade Odyssey
summary: Journey back to Neopia with 26 classic games, brought back to life for new and returning fans!

name: Never Safe in Delaware
summary:
Never Safe in Delaware is built on a kinetic combat system inspired by games such as Max Payne, Hotline Miami, and Brutal Doom. We've taken notes from the best games in the action genre to achieve precise gunplay and satisfying melee combat.

Take control of three of America’s most dangerous fugitives in a breakneck, intense battle against the scum and criminals infesting the city.

name: Next Patient
summary: During a pandemic, you are a medical distribution officer at a controlled checkpoint. Review IDs, medical reports, and blood tests; approve or deny requests. Supplies are limited. Procedures are strict. The decision is yours.

name: Necrotic Nightmare
summary: Nightmare has descended on the starship Starfarer ETOS-1. Battle the hoards, defend the crew, resist the infection and uncover the truth in this first-person Sci-Fi horror shooter, harnessing powers, upgrading weapons, and battling to survive. The voices are calling you. Will you listen?

name: Never Ending Corridor
summary: A First-person horror game with multiple endings. Endings and Events might change Every time you Replay it.

name: Nero
summary: Become a chain-smoking, tax-dodging restaurateur on the brink of ruin. Sail blood-churned seas to feed starving killers who demand fine dining. Expand your empire from beach shack to world-class dining, or die trying.
